tika-abh07t0:10: 3. Tattha cittaṃ tāva catubbidhaṃ hoti kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañceti.
tika-abh07t0:12_0: 4. Tattha katamaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ? Somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:12_3: diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekanti imāni aṭṭhapi lobhasahagatacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:13: 5. Domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekanti imāni dvepi paṭighasampayuttacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:14: 6. Upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttamekaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttamekanti imāni dvepi momūhacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:19_0: 9. Upekkhāsahagataṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tathā sotaviññāṇaṃ, ghānaviññāṇaṃ, jivhāviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:20_0: 10. Upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalavipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tathā sotaviññāṇaṃ, ghānaviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:20_2: somanassasahagataṃ santīraṇacittaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ santīraṇacittañceti imāni aṭṭhapi
tika-abh07t0:21: 11. Upekkhāsahagataṃ pañcadvārāvajjanacittaṃ, tathā manodvārāvajjanacittaṃ, somanassasahagataṃ hasituppādacittañceti imāni tīṇipi ahetukakiriyacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:45: 26. Ākāsānañcāyatanakusalacittaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanakusalacittaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanakusalacittaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalacittañceti imāni cattāripi arūpāvacarakusalacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:46: 27. Ākāsānañcāyatanavipākacittaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanavipākacittaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanavipākacittaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavipākacittañceti imāni cattāripi arūpāvacaravipākacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:47: 28. Ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyacittaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanakiriyacittaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanakiriyacittaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyacittañceti imāni cattāripi arūpāvacarakiriyacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:52: 31. Sotāpattimaggacittaṃ, sakadāgāmimaggacittaṃ, anāgāmimaggacittaṃ, arahattamaggacittañceti imāni cattāripi lokuttarakusalacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:53: 32. Sotāpattiphalacittaṃ, sakadāgāmiphalacittaṃ, anāgāmiphalacittaṃ, arahattaphalacittañceti imāni cattāripi lokuttaravipākacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:65_3: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānasotāpattimaggacittañceti imāni pañcapi sotāpattimaggacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:67: 40. Tathā phalacittāni ceti samacattālīsa lokuttaracittāni bhavantīti.
tika-abh07t0:83: 2. Kathaṃ? Phasso vedanā saññā cetanā ekaggatā jīvitindriyaṃ manasikāro ceti sattime cetasikā sabbacittasādhāraṇā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:84: 3. Vitakko vicāro adhimokkho vīriyaṃ pīti chando cāti cha ime cetasikā pakiṇṇakā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:87: 5. Moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccaṃ lobho diṭṭhi māno doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ vicikicchā ceti cuddasime cetasikā akusalā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:89_0: 6. Saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso tatramajjhattatā kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi
tika-abh07t0:89_1: kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā
tika-abh07t0:89_2: cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā ceti ekūnavīsatime cetasikā sobhanasādhāraṇā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:90: 7. Sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo ceti tisso viratiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:91: 8. Karuṇā muditā appamaññāyo nāmāti sabbathāpi paññindriyena saddhiṃ pañcavīsatime cetasikā sobhanāti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:101: 12. Kathaṃ? Sabbacittasādhāraṇā tāva sattime cetasikā sabbesupi ekūnanavuticittuppādesu labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:102: 13. Pakiṇṇakesu pana vitakko tāva dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaracittesu ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu ceti pañcapaññāsacittesu uppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:103: 14. Vicāro pana tesu ceva ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu.
tika-abh07t0:114: 20. Akusalesu pana moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccañcāti cattārome cetasikā sabbākusalasādhāraṇā nāma, sabbesupi dvādasā kusalesu labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:118: 24. Doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccañcāti dvīsu paṭighasampayuttacittesu.
tika-abh07t0:128: 28. Sobhanesu pana sobhanasādhāraṇā tāva ekūnavīsatime cetasikā sabbesupi ekūnasaṭṭhisobhanacittesu saṃvijjanti.
tika-abh07t0:129: 29. Viratiyo pana tissopi lokuttaracittesu sabbathāpi niyatā ekatova labbhanti, lokiyesu pana kāmāvacarakusalesveva kadāci sandissanti visuṃ visuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:130_0: 30. Appamaññāyo pana dvādasasu pañcamajjhānavajjitamahaggatacittesu ceva kāmāvacarakusalesu
tika-abh07t0:130_1: ca sahetukakāmāvacarakiriyacittesu cāti aṭṭhavīsaticittesveva kadāci nānā hutvā jāyanti,
tika-abh07t0:130_2: upekkhāsahagatesu panettha karuṇāmuditā na santīti keci vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:131: 31. Paññā pana dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaracittesu ceva sabbesupi pañcatiṃsamahaggatalokuttaracittesu cāti sattacattālīsacittesu sampayogaṃ gacchatīti.
tika-abh07t0:137: Nānā kadāci māno ca, thina middhaṃ tathā saha.
tika-abh07t0:146_0: 36. Kathaṃ? Lokuttaresu tāva aṭṭhasu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t0:146_1: appamaññāvajjitā tevīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti chattiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh07t0:146_4: te eva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu pañcakajjhānavasena pañcadhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
tika-abh07t0:150_0: 38. Mahaggatesu pana tīsu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu tāva aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t0:150_1: viratittayavajjitā dvāvīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti pañcatiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh07t0:150_2: karuṇāmuditā panettha paccekameva yojetabbā, tathā dutiyajjhānikacittesu vitakkavajjā,
tika-abh07t0:150_4: pañcamajjhānikacittesu pana pannarasasu appamaññāyo na labbhantīti sabbathāpi sattavīsatimahaggatacittesu
tika-abh07t0:154_0: 40. Kāmāvacarasobhanesu pana kusalesu tāva paṭhamadvaye aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t0:154_1: pañcavīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti aṭṭhatiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, appamaññāviratiyo
tika-abh07t0:154_2: panettha pañcapi paccekameva yojetabbā, tathā dutiyadvaye ñāṇavajjitā, tatiyadvaye
tika-abh07t0:154_3: ñāṇasampayuttā pītivajjitā, catutthadvaye ñāṇapītivajjitā te eva saṅgayhanti. Kiriyacittesupi
tika-abh07t0:154_4: virativajjitā tatheva catūsupi dukesu catudhāva saṅgayhanti. Tathā vipākesu ca appamaññāvirativajjitā
tika-abh07t0:154_5: te eva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi catuvīsatikāmāvacarasobhanacittesu dukavasena dvādasadhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
tika-abh07t0:164_0: 43. Akusalesu pana lobhamūlesu tāva paṭhame asaṅkhārike aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t0:164_1: akusalasādhāraṇā cattāro cāti sattarasa lobhadiṭṭhīhi saddhiṃ ekūnavīsati dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:166: 45. Tatiye tatheva pītivajjitā lobhadiṭṭhīhi saha aṭṭhārasa.
tika-abh07t0:168_0: 47. Pañcame pana paṭighasampayutte asaṅkhārike doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccañcāti
tika-abh07t0:168_1: catūhi saddhiṃ pītivajjitā te eva vīsati dhammā saṅgayhanti, issāmacchariyakukkuccāni
tika-abh07t0:170: 49. Chandapītivajjitā pana aññasamānā ekādasa, akusalasādhāraṇā cattāro cāti pannarasa dhammā uddhaccasahagate sampayujjanti.
tika-abh07t0:171_0: 50. Vicikicchāsahagatacitte ca adhimokkhavirahitā vicikicchāsahagatā tatheva pannarasa
tika-abh07t0:171_1: dhammā samupalabbhantīti sabbathāpi dvādasākusalacittuppādesu paccekaṃ yojiyamānāpi
tika-abh07t0:174: 52. Sādhāraṇā ca cattāro, samānā ca dasāpare.
tika-abh07t0:177: 53. Ahetukesu pana hasanacitte tāva chandavajjitā aññasamānā dvādasa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:181: 57. Dvipañcaviññāṇe pakiṇṇakavajjitā teyeva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi aṭṭhārasasu ahetukesu gaṇanavasena catudhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
tika-abh07t0:196: 3. Tattha vedanāsaṅgahe tāva tividhā vedanā sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukhā ceti, sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhāti ca bhedena pana pañcadhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:197: 4. Tattha sukhasahagataṃ kusalavipākaṃ kāyaviññāṇamekameva, tathā dukkhasahagataṃ akusalavipākaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:198_0: 5. Somanassasahagatacittāni pana lobhamūlāni cattāri, dvādasa kāmāvacarasobhanāni,
tika-abh07t0:198_1: sukhasantīraṇahasanāni ca dveti aṭṭhārasa kāmāvacarasomanassasahagatacittāni ceva
tika-abh07t0:206: 10. Hetusaṅgahe hetū nāma lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho cāti chabbidhā bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:210: 14. Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni ceva ñāṇavippayuttāni dvādasa kāmāvacarasobhanāni ceti dvāvīsati dvihetukacittāni.
tika-abh07t0:211: 15. Dvādasa ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarasobhanāni ceva pañcatiṃsa mahaggatalokuttaracittāni ceti sattacattālīsa tihetukacittānīti.
tika-abh07t0:221: 20. Tattha dve upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇāni ceva aṭṭha mahāvipākāni ca nava rūpārūpavipākāni ceti ekūnavīsati cittāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutikiccāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:227: 26. Aṭṭha mahāvipākāni ceva santīraṇattayañceti ekādasa tadārammaṇakiccāni.
tika-abh07t0:228: 27. Tesu pana dve upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇacittāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇasantīraṇavasena pañcakiccāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:236: 34. Aṭṭhasaṭṭhi tathā dve ca, navāṭṭha dve yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:239: 35. Dvārasaṅgahe dvārāni nāma cakkhudvāraṃ sotadvāraṃ ghānadvāraṃ jivhādvāraṃ kāyadvāraṃ manodvārañceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:243_1: chacattālīsa cittāni cakkhudvāre yathārahaṃ uppajjanti, tathā pañcadvārāvajjanasotaviññāṇādivasena
tika-abh07t0:243_2: sotadvārādīsupi chacattālīseva bhavantīti sabbathāpi pañcadvāre catupaññāsa cittāni kāmāvacarāneva.
tika-abh07t0:246: 42. Tesu pana pañcaviññāṇāni ceva mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni ceti chattiṃsa yathārahamekadvārikacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:256: 48. Ālambaṇasaṅgahe ārammaṇāni nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ rasārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ dhammārammaṇañceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:257: 49. Tattha rūpameva rūpārammaṇaṃ, tathā saddādayo saddārammaṇādīni.
tika-abh07t0:259: 51. Tattha cakkhudvārikacittānaṃ sabbesampi rūpameva ārammaṇaṃ, tañca paccuppannaṃ. Tathā sotadvārikacittādīnampi saddādīni, tāni ca paccuppannāniyeva.
tika-abh07t0:260: 52. Manodvārikacittānaṃ pana chabbidhampi paccuppannamatītaṃ anāgataṃ kālavimuttañca yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:261_1: yebhuyyena bhavantare chadvāraggahitaṃ paccuppannamatītaṃ paññattibhūtaṃ vā kammakammanimittagatinimittasammataṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:274: Pañca sabbattha chacceti, sattadhā tattha saṅgaho.
tika-abh07t0:276: 64. Vatthusaṅgahe vatthūni nāma cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyahadayavatthu ceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:280: 68. Tattha pañcaviññāṇadhātuyo yathākkamaṃ ekantena pañca pasādavatthūni nissāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:281: 69. Pañcadvārāvajjanasampaṭicchanasaṅkhātā pana manodhātu ca hadayaṃ nissitāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:282: 70. Avasesā pana manoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātā ca santīraṇamahāvipākapaṭighadvayapaṭhamamaggahasanarūpāvacaravasena hadayaṃ nissāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:283: 71. Avasesā kusalākusalakiriyānuttaravasena pana nissāya vā anissāya vā.
tika-abh07t0:285: 73. Chavatthuṃ nissitā kāme, satta rūpe catubbidhā.
tika-abh07t0:296: 2.. Vīthimuttānaṃ pana kammakammanimittagatinimittavasena tividhā hoti visayappavatti.
tika-abh07t0:299: 5. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇañceti cha viññāṇāni.
tika-abh07t0:301_0: 6. Cha vīthiyo pana cakkhudvāravīthi sotadvāravīthi ghānadvāravīthi jivhādvāravīthi
tika-abh07t0:301_1: kāyadvāravīthi manodvāravīthi ceti dvāravasena vā, cakkhuviññāṇavīthi sotaviññāṇavīthi
tika-abh07t0:301_2: ghānaviññāṇavīthi jivhāviññāṇavīthi kāyaviññāṇavīthi manoviññāṇavīthi ceti viññāṇavasena
tika-abh07t0:303: 7. Atimahantaṃ mahantaṃ parittaṃ atiparittañceti pañcadvāre manodvāre pana vibhūtamavibhūtañceti chadhā visayappavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:307_0: 10. Ekacittakkhaṇātītāni vā bahucittakkhaṇātītāni vā ṭhitippattāneva pañcārammaṇāni
tika-abh07t0:307_1: pañcadvāre āpāthamāgacchanti. Tasmā yadi ekacittakkhaṇātītakaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa
tika-abh07t0:307_2: āpāthamāgacchati, tato dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge calite bhavaṅgasotaṃ vocchinditvā tameva
tika-abh07t0:307_3: rūpārammaṇaṃ āvajjantaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanacittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tato tassānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:307_4: tameva rūpaṃ passantaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sampaṭicchantaṃ sampaṭicchanacittaṃ, santīrayamānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:307_5: santīraṇacittaṃ, vavatthapentaṃ voṭṭhabbanacittañceti yathākkamaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanti,
tika-abh07t0:307_6: tato paraṃ ekūnatiṃsa kāmāvacarajavanesu yaṃkiñci laddhapaccayaṃ yebhuyyena sattakkhattuṃ
tika-abh07t0:307_7: javati, javanānubandhāni ca dve tadārammaṇapākāni yathārahaṃ pavattanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
tika-abh07t0:308_0: 11. Ettāvatā cuddasa vīthicittuppādā, dve bhavaṅgacalanāni, pubbevātītakamekacittakkhaṇanti
tika-abh07t0:308_1: katvā sattarasa cittakkhaṇāni paripūrenti, tato paraṃ nirujjhati, ārammaṇametaṃ atimahantaṃ nāma gocaraṃ.
tika-abh07t0:309: 12. Yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ mahantaṃ nāma, tattha javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti, natthi tadārammaṇuppādo.
tika-abh07t0:310_0: 13. Yāva javanuppādāpi appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ parittaṃ nāma, tattha
tika-abh07t0:310_1: javanampi anuppajjitvā dvattikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanameva pavattati, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
tika-abh07t0:311: 14. Yāva voṭṭhabbanuppādā ca pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ nirodhāsannamārammaṇaṃ atiparittaṃ nāma, tattha bhavaṅgacalanameva hoti, natthi vīthicittuppādo.
tika-abh07t0:312_0: 15. Iccevaṃ cakkhudvāre, tathā sotadvārādīsu ceti sabbathāpi pañcadvāre tadārammaṇajavanavoṭṭhabbanamoghavārasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:312_1: catunnaṃ vārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā visayappavatti catudhā veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:317: 17. Manodvāre pana yadi vibhūtamārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgacalanamanodvārāvajjanajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇapākāni pavattanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
tika-abh07t0:318: 18. Avibhūte panārammaṇe javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti, natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti.
tika-abh07t0:323: 20. Appanājavanavāre pana vibhūtāvibhūtabhedo natthi, tathā tadārammaṇuppādo ca.
tika-abh07t0:324_1: catukkhattuṃ tikkhattumeva vā yathākkamaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhānantarameva yathārahaṃ
tika-abh07t0:324_3: yaṃ kiñci javanaṃ appanāvīthimotarati, tato paraṃ appanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
tika-abh07t0:334_0: 27. Atiiṭṭhe pana somanassasahagatāneva santīraṇatadārammaṇāni, tatthāpi somanassasahagatakiriyajavanāvasāne
tika-abh07t0:335_0: 28. Domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne ca pana tadārammaṇāniceva bhavaṅgāni ca upekkhāsahagatāneva
tika-abh07t0:335_1: bhavanti, tasmā yadi somanassapaṭisandhikassa domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇasambhavo
tika-abh07t0:335_2: natthi, tadā yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ parittārammaṇamārabbha upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:335_3: uppajjati, tamanantaritvā bhavaṅgapātova hotīti vadanti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:336: 29. Tathā kāmāvacarajavanāvasāne kāmāvacarasattānaṃ kāmāvacaradhammesveva ārammaṇabhūtesu tadārammaṇaṃ icchantīti.
tika-abh07t0:341: 31. Javanesu ca parittajavanavīthiyaṃ kāmāvacarajavanāni sattakkhattuṃ chakkhattumeva vā javanti.
tika-abh07t0:343: 33. Bhagavato pana yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu lahukappavattiyaṃ cattāripañca vā paccavekkhaṇacittāni bhavantītipi vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:344: 34. Ādikammikassa pana paṭhamakappanāyaṃ mahaggatajavanāniabhiññājavanāni ca sabbadāpi ekavārameva javanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
tika-abh07t0:345: 35. Cattāro pana magguppādā ekacittakkhaṇikā, tato paraṃ dve tīṇi phalacittāni yathārahaṃ uppajjanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
tika-abh07t0:346: 36. Nirodhasamāpattikāle dvikkhattuṃ catutthāruppajavanaṃ javati, tato paraṃ nirodhaṃ phusati.
tika-abh07t0:347: 37. Vuṭṭhānakāle ca anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā yathārahamekavāraṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
tika-abh07t0:348: 38. Sabbatthāpi samāpattivīthiyaṃ bhavaṅgasoto viya vīthiniyamo natthīti katvā bahūnipi labbhantīti.
tika-abh07t0:353: 40. Duhetukānamahetukānañca panettha kiriyajavanāni ceva appanājavanāni ca labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:355: 42. Duggatiyaṃ pana ñāṇavippayuttāni ca mahāvipākāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:356: 43. Tihetukesu ca khīṇāsavānaṃ kusalākusalajavanāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:359: 46. Anāgāmipuggalānaṃ pana paṭighajavanāni ca na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:368: 52. Sabbatthāpi ca taṃtaṃpasādarahitānaṃ taṃtaṃdvārikavīthicittāni na labbhanteva.
tika-abh07t0:373: 55. Iccevaṃ chadvārikacittappavatti yathāsambhavaṃ bhavaṅgantaritā yāvatāyukamabbocchinnā pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:379: 2. Catasso bhūmiyo, catubbidhā paṭisandhi, cattāri kammāni, catudhā maraṇuppatti ceti vīthimuttasaṅgahe cattāri catukkāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:381: 3. Tattha apāyabhūmi kāmasugatibhūmi rūpāvacarabhūmi arūpāvacarabhūmi ceti catasso bhūmiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:382: 4. Tāsu nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo asurakāyo ceti apāyabhūmi catubbidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:383: 5. Manussā cātumahārājikā tāvatiṃsā yāmā tusitā nimmānarati paranimmitavasavattī ceti kāmasugatibhūmi sattavidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:388: 10. Vehapphalā asaññasattā suddhāvāsā ceti catutthajjhānabhūmīti rūpāvacarabhūmi soḷasavidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:389: 11. Avihā atappā sudassā sudassī akaniṭṭhā ceti suddhāvāsabhūmi pañcavidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:390: 12. Ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi viññāṇañcāyatanabhūmi ākiñcaññāyatanabhūmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūmi ceti arūpabhūmi catubbidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:397: 15. Apāyapaṭisandhi kāmasugatipaṭisandhi rūpāvacarapaṭisandhi arūpāvacarapaṭisandhi ceti catubbidhā paṭisandhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:398: 16. Tattha akusalavipākopekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ apāyabhūmiyaṃ okkantikkhaṇe paṭisandhi hutvā tato paraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ pariyosāne cavanaṃ hutvā vocchijjati, ayamekāpāyapaṭisandhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:399: 17. Kusalavipākopekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ pana kāmasugatiyaṃ manussānañceva jaccandhādīnaṃ bhummassitānañca vinipātikāsurānaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:400: 18. Mahāvipākāni pana aṭṭha sabbatthāpi kāmasugatiyaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:402: 20. Sā panāyaṃ dasavidhāpi kāmāvacarapaṭisandhicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:403: 21. Tesu catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ manussānaṃ vinipātikāsurānañca āyuppamāṇagaṇanāya niyamo natthi.
tika-abh07t0:404_0: 22. Cātumahārājikānaṃ pana devānaṃ dibbāni pañcavassasatāni āyuppamāṇaṃ, manussagaṇanāya
tika-abh07t0:404_1: navutivassasatasahassappamāṇaṃ hoti, tato catugguṇaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ, tato catugguṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:404_2: yāmānaṃ, tato catugguṇaṃ tusitānaṃ, tato catugguṇaṃ nimmānaratīnaṃ, tato catugguṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:411: 28. Asaññasattānaṃ pana rūpameva paṭisandhi hoti. Tathā tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ cavanakāle ca rūpameva pavattitvā nirujjhati, imā cha rūpāvacarapaṭisandhiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:412: 29. Tesu brahmapārisajjānaṃ devānaṃ kappassa tatiyo bhāgo āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:427: 44. Paṭhamāruppādivipākāni paṭhamāruppādibhūmīsu yathākkamaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanti. Imā catasso arūpapaṭisandhiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:428: 45. Tesu pana ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ vīsatikappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:438: 52. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ ahosikammañceti pākakālavasena cattāri kammāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:439: 53. Tathā akusalaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ arūpāvacarakusalañceti pākaṭhānavasena.
tika-abh07t0:440: 54. Tattha akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammañceti kammadvāravasena tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:441: 55. Kathaṃ? Pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro ceti kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte kāyadvāre bāhullavuttito kāyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:442: 56. Musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo ceti vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacīdvāre bāhullavuttito vacīkammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:443: 57. Abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhi ceti aññatrāpi viññattiyā manasmiṃyeva bāhullavuttito manokammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:444: 58. Tesu pāṇātipāto pharusavācā byāpādo ca dosamūlena jāyanti.
tika-abh07t0:447: 61. Cittuppādavasena panetaṃ akusalaṃ sabbathāpi dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:448: 62. Kāmāvacarakusalampi kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vacīdvāre pavattaṃ vacīkammaṃ, manodvāre pavattaṃ manokammañceti kammadvāravasena tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:452: 66. Taṃ panetaṃ vīsatividhampi kāmāvacarakammamicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:453: 67. Rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pana manokammameva, tañca bhāvanāmayaṃ appanāppattaṃ, jhānaṅgabhedena pañcavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:454: 68. Tathā arūpāvacarakusalañca manokammaṃ, tampi bhāvanāmayaṃ appanāppattaṃ. Ārammaṇabhedena catubbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:455_1: pana sabbampi dvādasavidhaṃ sattākusalapākāni sabbatthāpi kāmaloke rūpaloke ca yathārahaṃ vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:456: 70. Kāmāvacarakusalampi kāmasugatiyameva paṭisandhiṃ janeti, tathā pavattiyañca mahāvipākāni, ahetukavipākāni pana aṭṭhapi sabbatthāpi kāmaloke rūpaloke ca yathārahaṃ vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:457: 71. Tatthāpi tihetukamukkaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ tihetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte soḷasa vipākāni vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:458: 72. Tihetukamomakaṃ dvihetukamukkaṭṭhañca kusalaṃ dvihetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte tihetukarahitāni dvādasa vipākāni vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:459: 73. Dvihetukamomakaṃ pana kusalaṃ ahetukameva paṭisandhiṃ deti, pavatte ca ahetukavipākāneva vipaccati.
tika-abh07t0:462: Tesaṃ dvādasa pākāni, dasāṭṭha ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh07t0:464: 75. Rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pana paṭhamajjhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā brahmapārisajjesu uppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:467: 78. Tathā dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānañca parittaṃ bhāvetvā parittābhesu.
tika-abh07t0:481: 89. Āyukkhayena kammakkhayena ubhayakkhayena upacchedakakammunā ceti catudhā maraṇuppatti nāma.
tika-abh07t0:482_0: 90. Tathā ca marantānaṃ pana maraṇakāle yathārahaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ bhavantare paṭisandhijanakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:482_2: vā, anantaramuppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbamupabhogabhūtañca gatinimittaṃ vā kammabalena
tika-abh07t0:482_3: channaṃ dvārānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhāti, tato paraṃ tameva tathopaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:482_4: ārabbha vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ parisuddhaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā upalabhitabbabhavānurūpaṃ
tika-abh07t0:482_5: tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pavattati bāhullena, tameva vā pana janakabhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t0:483_0: 91. Paccāsannamaraṇassa tassa vīthicittāvasāne bhavaṅgakkhaye vā cavanavasena paccuppannabhavapariyosānabhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t0:483_1: cuticittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tasmiṃ niruddhāvasāne tassānantarameva tathāgahitaṃ
tika-abh07t0:483_2: ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha savatthukaṃ avatthukameva vā yathārahaṃ avijjānusayaparikkhittena
tika-abh07t0:483_3: taṇhānusayamūlakena saṅkhārena janiyamānaṃ sampayuttehi pariggayhamānaṃ sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:484_0: 92. Maraṇāsannavīthiyaṃ panettha mandappavattāni pañceva javanāni pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni,
tika-abh07t0:484_1: tasmā yadi paccuppannārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu dharantesveva maraṇaṃ hoti, tadā paṭisandhibhavaṅgānampi
tika-abh07t0:484_2: paccuppannārammaṇatā labbhatīti katvā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhiyā chadvāraggahitaṃ kammanimittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:484_3: gatinimittañca paccuppannamatītārammaṇaṃ upalabbhati, kammaṃ pana atītameva, tañca
tika-abh07t0:486: 94. Tathā arūpapaṭisandhiyā ca mahaggatabhūtaṃ paññattibhūtañca kammanimittameva yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:487: 95. Asaññasattānaṃ pana jīvitanavakameva paṭisandhibhāvena patiṭṭhāti, tasmā te rūpapaṭisandhikā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:495_0: 99. Iccevaṃ gahitapaṭisandhikānaṃ pana paṭisandhinirodhānantarato pabhuti tamevārammaṇamārabbha
tika-abh07t0:495_1: tadeva cittaṃ yāva cuticittuppādā asati vīthicittuppāde bhavassa aṅgabhāvena bhavaṅgasantatisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh07t0:496: 100. Pariyosāne ca cavanavasena cuticittaṃ hutvā nirujjhati.
tika-abh07t0:497: 101. Tato parañca paṭisandhādayo rathacakkamiva yathākkamaṃ eva parivattantā pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:510: 3. Cattāri mahābhūtāni, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpanti duvidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ ekādasavidhena saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:511: 4. Kathaṃ? Pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu bhūtarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:512: 5. Cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo pasādarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:513: 6. Rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso āpodhātuvivajjitaṃ bhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ gocararūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:518: 11. Iti ca aṭṭhārasavidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvarūpaṃ salakkhaṇarūpaṃ nipphannarūpaṃ rūparūpaṃ sammasanarūpanti ca saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:521: 14. Rūpassa lahutā mudutā kammaññatā viññattidvayaṃ vikārarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:522: 15. Rūpassa upacayo santati jaratā aniccatā lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:523: 16. Jātirūpameva panettha upacayasantatināmena pavuccatīti ekādasavidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ hoti sarūpavasena.
tika-abh07t0:527: Paricchedo ca viññatti, vikāro lakkhaṇanti ca;
tika-abh07t0:531: 18. Sabbañca panetaṃ rūpaṃ ahetukaṃ sappaccayaṃ sāsavaṃ saṅkhataṃ lokiyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ anārammaṇaṃ appahātabbamevāti ekavidhampi ajjhattikabāhirādivasena bahudhā bhedaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:532: 19. Kathaṃ? Pasādasaṅkhātaṃ pañcavidhampi ajjhattikarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ bāhirarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:533: 20. Pasādahadayasaṅkhātaṃ chabbidhampi vatthurūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ avatthurūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:534: 21. Pasādaviññattisaṅkhātaṃ sattavidhampi dvārarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ advārarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:535: 22. Pasādabhāvajīvitasaṅkhātaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi indriyarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ anindriyarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:536: 23. Pasādavisayasaṅkhātaṃ dvādasavidhampi oḷārikarūpaṃ santikerūpaṃ, sappaṭigharūpañca, itaraṃ sukhumarūpaṃ dūrerūpaṃ appaṭigharūpañca.
tika-abh07t0:539: 26. Cakkhādidvayaṃ asampattavasena, ghānādittayaṃ sampattavasenāti pañcavidhampi gocaraggāhikarūpaṃ, itaraṃ agocaraggāhikarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:540: 27. Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā bhūtacatukkañceti aṭṭhavidhampi avinibbhogarūpaṃ, itaraṃ vinibbhogarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:545: 29. Kammaṃ cittaṃ utu āhāro ceti cattāri rūpasamuṭṭhānāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:546: 30. Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacarañceti pañcavīsatividhampi kusalākusalakammamabhisaṅkhataṃ ajjhattikasantāne kammasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ paṭisandhimupādāya khaṇe khaṇe samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t0:547: 31. Arūpavipākadvipañcaviññāṇavajjitaṃ pañcasattatividhampi cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgamupādāya jāyantameva samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t0:551: 35. Sītuṇhotusamaññātā tejodhātu ṭhitippattāva utusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca yathārahaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t0:552: 36. Ojāsaṅkhāto āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle ṭhānappattova samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t0:557: 41. Avinibbhogarūpāni ceva ākāsadhātu ca. Catūhi sambhūtāni.
tika-abh07t0:565: 45. Ekuppādā ekanirodhā ekanissayā sahavuttino ekavīsati rūpakalāpā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:566_0: 46. Tattha jīvitaṃ avinibbhogarūpañca cakkhunā saha cakkhudasakanti pavuccati. Tathā
tika-abh07t0:566_1: sotādīhi saddhiṃ sotadasakaṃ ghānadasakaṃ jivhādasakaṃ kāyadasakaṃ itthibhāvadasakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:566_2: pumbhāvadasakaṃ vatthudasakañceti yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Avinibbhogarūpameva jīvitena
tika-abh07t0:566_3: saha jīvitanavakanti pavuccati. Ime nava kammasamuṭṭhānakalāpā.
tika-abh07t0:567_0: 47. Avinibbhogarūpaṃ pana suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, tadeva kāyaviññattiyā saha kāyaviññattinavakaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:567_1: vacīviññattisaddehi saha vacīviññattidasakaṃ, lahutādīhi saddhiṃ lahutādekādasakaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:568: 48. Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ saddanavakaṃ lahutādekādasakaṃ saddalahutādidvādasakañceti cattāro utusamuṭṭhānakalāpā.
tika-abh07t0:570: 50. Tattha suddhaṭṭhakaṃ saddanavakañceti dve utusamuṭṭhānakalāpā bahiddhāpi labbhanti, avasesā pana sabbepi ajjhattikamevāti.
tika-abh07t0:572: Nava cha caturo dveti, kalāpā ekavīsati.
tika-abh07t0:577: 52. Sabbānipi panetāni rūpāni kāmaloke yathārahaṃ anūnāni pavattiyaṃ upalabbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:578_1: satta dasakāni pātubhavanti ukkaṭṭhavasena, omakavasena pana cakkhusotaghānabhāvadasakāni
tika-abh07t0:578_2: kadācipi na labbhanti, tasmā tesaṃ vasena kalāpahāni veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:579_0: 54. Gabbhaseyyakasattānaṃ pana kāyabhāvavatthudasakasaṅkhātāni tīṇi dasakāni pātubhavanti,
tika-abh07t0:579_1: tatthāpi bhāvadasakaṃ kadāci na labbhati, tato paraṃ pavattikāle kamena cakkhudasakādīni ca pātubhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:580_1: ṭhitikālamupādāya utusamuṭṭhānā, ojāpharaṇamupādāya āhārasamuṭṭhānā ceti catusamuṭṭhānarūpakalāpasantati
tika-abh07t0:580_2: kāmaloke dīpajālā viya, nadīsoto viya ca yāvatāyukamabbocchinnā pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:581_1: na uppajjanti, puretaramuppannāni ca kammajarūpāni cuticittasamakālameva pavattitvā
tika-abh07t0:581_2: nirujjhanti, tato paraṃ cittajāhārajarūpañca vocchijjati, tato paraṃ utusamuṭṭhānarūpaparamparā
tika-abh07t0:584_0: 58. Rūpaloke pana ghānajivhākāyabhāvadasakāni ca āhārajakalāpāni ca na labbhanti,
tika-abh07t0:584_1: tasmā tesaṃ paṭisandhikāle cakkhusotavatthuvasena tīṇi dasakāni jīvitanavakañceti
tika-abh07t0:584_2: cattāro kammasamuṭṭhānakalāpā, pavattiyaṃ cittotusamuṭṭhānā ca labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:585_0: 59. Asaññasattānaṃ pana cakkhusotavatthusaddāpi na labbhanti, tathā sabbānipi cittajarūpāni,
tika-abh07t0:585_1: tasmā tesaṃ paṭisandhikāle jīvitanavakameva, pavattiyañca saddavajjitaṃ utusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ atiricchati.
tika-abh07t0:586: 60. Iccevaṃ kāmarūpāsaññīsaṅkhātesu tīsu ṭhānesu paṭisandhipavattivasena duvidhā rūpappavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:590: Na labbhanti pavatte tu, na kiñcipi na labbhati.
tika-abh07t0:593: 62. Nibbānaṃ pana lokuttarasaṅkhātaṃ catumaggañāṇena sacchikātabbaṃ maggaphalānamārammaṇabhūtaṃ vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantattā nibbānanti pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:594: 63. Tadetaṃ sabhāvato ekavidhampi saupādisesanibbānadhātu anupādisesanibbānadhātu ceti duvidhaṃ hoti kāraṇapariyāyena.
tika-abh07t0:595: 64. Tathā suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañceti tividhaṃ hoti ākārabhedena.
tika-abh07t0:605: 2. Akusalasaṅgaho missakasaṅgaho bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho sabbasaṅgaho ceti samuccayasaṅgaho catubbidho veditabbo.
tika-abh07t0:607: 3. Kathaṃ? Akusalasaṅgahe tāva cattāro āsavā – kāmāsavo bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo.
tika-abh07t0:608: 4. Cattāro oghā – kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho.
tika-abh07t0:609: 5. Cattāro yogā – kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogo.
tika-abh07t0:610: 6. Cattāro ganthā – abhijjhākāyagantho, byāpādo kāyagantho, sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
tika-abh07t0:611: 7. Cattāro upādānā – kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:612: 8. Cha nīvaraṇāni – kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:613: 9. Satta anusayā – kāmarāgānusayo bhavarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo avijjānusayo.
tika-abh07t0:615_0: 11. Aparānipi dasa saṃyojanāni – kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ
tika-abh07t0:616: 12. Dasa kilesā – lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:617: 13. Āsavādīsu panettha kāmabhavanāmena tabbatthukā taṇhā adhippetā, sīlabbataparāmāso idaṃsaccābhiniveso attavādupādo ca tathāpavattaṃ diṭṭhigatameva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:625: 15. Missakasaṅgahe cha hetū – lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho.
tika-abh07t0:626: 16. Satta jhānaṅgāni – vitakko vicāro pīti ekaggatā somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhā.
tika-abh07t0:627: 17. Dvādasa maggaṅgāni – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi.
tika-abh07t0:628_0: 18. Bāvīsatindriyāni – cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:628_1: itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:628_2: domanassindriyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:629: 19. Nava balāni – saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ hiribalaṃ ottappabalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:630: 20. Cattāro adhipatī – chandādhipati vīriyādhipati cittādhipati vīmaṃsādhipati.
tika-abh07t0:631: 21. Cattāro āhārā – kabaḷīkāro āhāro, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:636: 26. Pañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni, avīriyesu balāni, ahetukesu maggaṅgāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:637: 27. Tathā vicikicchācitte ekaggatā maggindriyabalabhāvaṃ na gacchati.
tika-abh07t0:639: 29. Cha hetū pañca jhānaṅgā, maggaṅgā nava vatthuto.
tika-abh07t0:644: 30. Bodhipakkhiyasaṅgahe cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:645_0: 31. Cattāro sammappadhānā uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ pahānāya vāyāmo, anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:645_1: anuppādāya vāyāmo, anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ uppādāya vāyāmo, uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vāyāmo.
tika-abh07t0:646: 32. Cattāro iddhipādā – chandiddhipādo vīriyiddhipādo cittiddhipādo vīmaṃsiddhipādo.
tika-abh07t0:647: 33. Pañcindriyāni – saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:648: 34. Pañca balāni – saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:649: 35. Satta bojjhaṅgā – satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo pītisambojjhaṅgo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo samādhisambojjhaṅgo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
tika-abh07t0:650: 36. Aṭṭha maggaṅgāni – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
tika-abh07t0:651: 37. Ettha pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti sammāsati ekāva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:663: 41. Sabbe lokuttare honti, na vā saṅkappapītiyo.
tika-abh07t0:666: 42. Sabbasaṅgahe pañcakkhandhā – rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
tika-abh07t0:667: 43. Pañcupādānakkhandhā – rūpupādānakkhandho vedanupādānakkhandho saññupādānakkhandho saṅkhārupādānakkhandho viññāṇupādānakkhandho.
tika-abh07t0:668_0: 44. Dvādasāyatanāni – cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ
tika-abh07t0:668_1: manāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:669_0: 45. Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu rūpadhātu
tika-abh07t0:669_1: saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu
tika-abh07t0:669_2: ghānaviññāṇadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu dhammadhātu manoviññāṇadhātu.
tika-abh07t0:670: 46. Cattāri ariyasaccāni – dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:671: 47. Ettha pana cetasikasukhumarūpanibbānavasena ekūnasattati dhammā dhammāyatanadhammadhātūti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:679: 52. Dukkhaṃ tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, taṇhā samudayo bhave.
tika-abh07t0:680: Nirodho nāma nibbānaṃ, maggo lokuttaro mato.
tika-abh07t0:686: 1. Yesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, ye dhammā paccayā yathā.
tika-abh07t0:688: 2. Paṭiccasamuppādanayo paṭṭhānanayo ceti paccayasaṅgaho duvidho veditabbo.
tika-abh07t0:689: 3. Tattha tabbhāvabhāvībhāvākāramattopalakkhito paṭiccasamuppādanayo, paṭṭhānanayo pana āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitimārabbha pavuccati, ubhayaṃ pana vomissetvā papañcenti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:691_0: 4. Tattha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:691_1: nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā
tika-abh07t0:691_2: taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā
tika-abh07t0:691_3: jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa
tika-abh07t0:692: 5. Tattha tayo addhā dvādasaṅgāni vīsatākārā tisandhi catusaṅkhepā tīṇi vaṭṭāni dve mūlāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:693: 6. Kathaṃ? Avijjāsaṅkhārā atīto addhā, jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato addhā, majjhe aṭṭha paccuppanno addhāti tayo addhā.
tika-abh07t0:694: 7. Avijjā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ phasso vedanā taṇhā upādānaṃ bhavo jāti jarāmaraṇanti dvādasaṅgāni.
tika-abh07t0:696_0: 9. Avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇena panettha taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā bhavanti, tathā taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena
tika-abh07t0:696_1: ca avijjāsaṅkhārā, jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇena ca viññāṇādiphalapañcakameva gahitanti katvā –
tika-abh07t0:700: 11. Avijjātaṇhupādānā ca kilesavaṭṭaṃ, kammabhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadeso saṅkhārā ca kammavaṭṭaṃ, upapattibhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadeso avasesā ca vipākavaṭṭanti tīṇi vaṭṭāni.
tika-abh07t0:708_2: pacchājātapaccayo āsevanapaccayo kammapaccayo vipākapaccayo āhārapaccayo indriyapaccayo
tika-abh07t0:708_3: jhānapaccayo maggapaccayo sampayuttapaccayo vippayuttapaccayo atthipaccayo natthipaccayo
tika-abh07t0:709: 15. Chadhā nāmaṃ tu nāmassa, pañcadhā nāmarūpinaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:710: Ekadhā puna rūpassa, rūpaṃ nāmassa cekadhā.
tika-abh07t0:712: Dvayassa navadhā ceti, chabbidhā paccayā kathaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:713_0: 16. Anantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:713_1: anantarasamanantaranatthivigatavasena, purimāni javanāni pacchimānaṃ javanānaṃ āsevanavasena,
tika-abh07t0:713_2: sahajātā cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sampayuttavaseneti ca chadhā nāmaṃ nāmassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:714_0: 17. Hetujhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ hetādivasena, sahajātā cetanā
tika-abh07t0:714_1: sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ, nānākkhaṇikā cetanā kammābhinibbattānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ kammavasena,
tika-abh07t0:714_2: vipākakkhandhā aññamaññaṃ sahajātānaṃ rūpānaṃ vipākavaseneti ca pañcadhā nāmaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:715: 18. Pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavaseneti ekadhāva nāmaṃ rūpassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:716: 19. Cha vatthūni pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ pañcārammaṇāni ca pañcaviññāṇavīthiyā purejātavaseneti ekadhāva rūpaṃ nāmassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t0:717: 20. Ārammaṇavasena upanissayavaseneti ca duvidhā paññattināmarūpāni nāmasseva paccayā honti.
tika-abh07t0:719: 22. Upanissayo pana tividho hoti – ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayo ceti.
tika-abh07t0:722_0: 25. Rāgādayo pana dhammā saddhādayo ca sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ puggalo bhojanaṃ utusenāsanañca
tika-abh07t0:722_1: yathārahaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca kusalādidhammānaṃ, kammaṃ vipākānanti ca bahudhā
tika-abh07t0:723: 26. Adhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayaāhāraindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatavaseneti yathārahaṃ navadhā nāmarūpāni nāmarūpānaṃ paccayā bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:724: 27. Tattha garukatamārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇādhipativasena nāmānaṃ, sahajātādhipati catubbidhopi sahajātavasena sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti adhipatipaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:725: 28. Cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sahajātarūpānañca, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ upādārūpānañca, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti sahajātapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:726: 29. Cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti aññamaññapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:727: 30. Cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sahajātarūpānañca, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ upādārūpānañca, cha vatthūni sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnanti ca tividho hoti nissayapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:728: 31. Kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa, arūpino āhārā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti āhārapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:729: 32. Pañca pasādā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ, rūpajīvitindriyaṃ upādinnarūpānaṃ, arūpino indriyā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca tividho hoti indriyapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:730_0: 33. Okkantikkhaṇe vatthu vipākānaṃ, cittacetasikā dhammā sahajātarūpānaṃ sahajātavasena,
tika-abh07t0:730_1: pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavasena cha vatthūni
tika-abh07t0:730_2: pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ purejātavaseneti ca tividho hoti vippayuttapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:734: 35. Ārammaṇūpanissayakammatthipaccayesu ca sabbepi paccayā samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:735: 36. Sahajātarūpanti panettha sabbatthāpi pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ, paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpānañca vasena duvidhaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:736: 37. Iti tekālikā dhammā, kālamuttā ca sambhavā.
tika-abh07t0:740: 38. Tattha rūpadhammā rūpakkhandhova, cittacetasikasaṅkhātā cattāro arūpino khandhā, nibbānañceti pañcavidhampi arūpanti ca nāmanti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:742: 39. Tato avasesā paññatti pana paññāpiyattā paññatti, paññāpanato paññattīti ca duvidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:743_0: 40. Kathaṃ? Taṃtaṃbhūtavipariṇāmākāramupādāya tathā tathā paññattā bhūmipabbatādikā,
tika-abh07t0:743_3: bhāvanāvisesañca upādāya kasiṇanimittādikā ceti evamādippabhedā pana paramatthato
tika-abh07t0:743_4: avijjamānāpi atthacchāyākārena cittuppādānamārammaṇabhūtā taṃ taṃ upādāya upanidhāya
tika-abh07t0:743_5: kāraṇaṃ katvā tathā tathā parikappiyamānā saṅkhāyati samaññāyati voharīyati paññāpīyatīti
tika-abh07t0:743_6: paññattīti pavuccati. Ayaṃ paññatti paññāpiyattā paññatti nāma.
tika-abh07t0:744_0: 41. Paññāpanato paññatti pana nāmanāmakammādināmena paridīpitā, sā vijjamānapaññatti
tika-abh07t0:744_2: vijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti ceti chabbidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:745_0: 42. Tattha yadā pana paramatthato vijjamānaṃ rūpavedanādiṃ etāya paññāpenti, tadāyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:745_1: vijjamānapaññatti. Yadā pana paramatthato avijjamānaṃ bhūmipabbatādiṃ etāya paññāpenti,
tika-abh07t0:745_2: tadāyaṃ avijjamānapaññattīti pavuccati. Ubhinnaṃ pana vomissakavasena sesā yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh07t0:745_3: chaḷabhiñño, itthisaddo, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, rājaputtoti ca veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:756_0: 2. Tattha samathasaṅgahe tāva dasa kasiṇāni, dasa asubhā, dasa anussatiyo, catasso
tika-abh07t0:756_1: appamaññāyo, ekā saññā, ekaṃ vavatthānaṃ, cattāro āruppā ceti sattavidhena samathakammaṭṭhānasaṅgaho.
tika-abh07t0:758: 3. Rāgacaritā dosacaritā mohacaritā saddhācaritā buddhicaritā vitakkacaritā ceti chabbidhena caritasaṅgaho.
tika-abh07t0:760: 4. Parikammabhāvanā upacārabhāvanā appanābhāvanā ceti tisso bhāvanā.
tika-abh07t0:762: 5. Parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittaṃ paṭibhāganimittañceti tīṇi nimittāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:763: 6. Kathaṃ? Pathavīkasiṇaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ tejokasiṇaṃ vāyokasiṇaṃ nīlakasiṇaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇaṃ ākāsakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇañceti imāni dasa kasiṇāni nāma.
tika-abh07t0:764: 7. Uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakaṃ vicchiddakaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ vikkhittakaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ lohitakaṃ puḷavakaṃ aṭṭhikañceti ime dasa asubhā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:765: 8. Buddhānussati dhammānussati saṃghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati upasamānussati maraṇānussati kāyagatāsati ānāpānassati ceti imā dasa anussatiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t0:766: 9. Mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā ceti imā catasso appamaññāyo nāma, brahmavihāroti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:769: 12. Ākāsānañcāyatanādayo cattāro āruppā nāmāti sabbathāpi samathaniddese cattālīsa kammaṭṭhānāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t0:771: 13. Caritāsu pana dasa asubhā kāyagatāsatisaṅkhātā koṭṭhāsabhāvanā ca rāgacaritassa sappāyā.
tika-abh07t0:772: 14. Catasso appamaññāyo nīlādīni ca cattāri kasiṇāni dosacaritassa.
tika-abh07t0:776: 18. Sesāni pana sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni sabbesampi sappāyāni, tatthāpi kasiṇesu puthulaṃ mohacaritassa, khuddakaṃ vitakkacaritassevāti.
tika-abh07t0:779: 19. Bhāvanāsu sabbatthāpi parikammabhāvanā labbhateva, buddhānussatiādīsu aṭṭhasu saññāvavatthānesu cāti dasasukammaṭṭhānesu upacārabhāvanāva sampajjati, natthi appanā.
tika-abh07t0:788: 26. Nimittesu pana parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittañca sabbatthāpi yathārahaṃ pariyāyena labbhanteva.
tika-abh07t0:789: 27. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana kasiṇāsubhakoṭṭhāsaānāpānesveva labbhati, tattha hi paṭibhāganimittamārabbha upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ca pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:790: 28. Kathaṃ? Ādikammikassa hi pathavīmaṇḍalādīsu nimittaṃ uggaṇhantassa tamārammaṇaṃ parikammanimittanti pavuccati, sā ca bhāvanā parikammabhāvanā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:791: 29. Yadā pana taṃ nimittaṃ cittena samuggahitaṃ hoti, cakkhunā passantasseva manodvārassa āpāthamāgataṃ, tadā tamevārammaṇaṃ uggahanimittaṃ nāma, sā ca bhāvanā samādhiyati.
tika-abh07t0:792_0: 30. Tathā samāhitassa panetassa tato paraṃ tasmiṃ uggahanimitte parikammasamādhinā
tika-abh07t0:792_2: bhāvanāmayamārammaṇaṃ citte sannisannaṃ samappitaṃ hoti, tadā taṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:793: 31. Tato paṭṭhāya paripanthavippahīnā kāmāvacarasamādhisaṅkhātā upacārabhāvanā nipphannā nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t0:794: 32. Tato paraṃ tameva paribhāganimittaṃ upacārasamādhinā samāsevantassa rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānamappeti.
tika-abh07t0:795_0: 33. Tato paraṃ tameva paṭhamajjhānaṃ āvajjanaṃ samāpajjanaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:795_1: paccavekkhaṇā ceti imāhi pañcahi vasitāhi vasībhūtaṃ katvā vitakkādikamoḷārikaṅgaṃ
tika-abh07t0:795_2: pahānāya vicārādisukhumaṅgupattiyā padahato yathākkamaṃ dutiyajjhānādayo yathārahamappenti.
tika-abh07t0:798: 36. Ākāsavajjitakasiṇesu pana yaṃ kiñci kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā laddhamākāsaṃ anantavasena parikammaṃ karontassa paṭhamāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t0:799: 37. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ anantavasena parikammaṃ karontassa dutiyāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t0:800: 38. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvaṃ pana “natthi kiñcī”ti parikammaṃ karontassa tatiyāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t0:802: 40. Avasesesu ca dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu buddhaguṇādikamārammaṇamārabbha parikammaṃ katvā tasmiṃ nimitte sādhukamuggahite tattheva parikammañca samādhiyati, upacāro ca sampajjati.
tika-abh07t0:803_1: vuṭṭhahitvā adhiṭṭheyyādikamāvajjetvā parikammaṃ karontassa rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu yathārahamappeti.
tika-abh07t0:811_0: 43. Vipassanākammaṭṭhāne pana sīlavisuddhi cittavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi
tika-abh07t0:813: 45. Aniccānupassanā dukkhānupassanā anattānupassanā ceti tisso anupassanā.
tika-abh07t0:814: 46. Sammasanañāṇaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇañceti dasa vipassanāñāṇāni.
tika-abh07t0:815: 47. Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho ceti tayo vimokkhā.
tika-abh07t0:816: 48. Suññatānupassanā animittānupassanā appaṇihitānupassānā ceti tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:817: 49. Kathaṃ? Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ paccayasannissitasīlañceti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ sīlavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:818: 50. Upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ceti duvidhopi samādhi cittavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:820: 52. Tesameva ca nāmarūpānaṃ paccayapariggaho kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:821_0: 53. Tato paraṃ pana tathāpariggahitesu sappaccayesu tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu atītādibhedabhinnesu
tika-abh07t0:821_1: khandhādinayamārabbha kalāpavasena saṅkhipitvā “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena,
tika-abh07t0:821_2: anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti addhānavasena santativasena khaṇavasena vā sammasanañāṇena
tika-abh07t0:821_3: lakkhaṇattayaṃ sammasantassa tesveva paccayavasena khaṇavasena ca udayabbayañāṇena
tika-abh07t0:825_0: 54. Tathā paripanthavimuttassa pana tassa udayabbayañāṇato paṭṭhāya yā vānulomā tilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:825_1: vipassanāparamparāya paṭipajjantassa nava vipassanāñāṇāni paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:826_0: 55. Tassevaṃ paṭipajjantassa pana vipassanāparipākamāgamma “idāni appanā uppajjissatī”ti
tika-abh07t0:826_1: bhavaṅgaṃ vocchijjitvā uppannamanodvārāvajjanānantaraṃ dve tīṇi vipassanācittāni
tika-abh07t0:827: 56. Yā sikhāppattā, sā sānulomā saṅkhārupekkhā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t0:828: 57. Tato paraṃ gotrabhucittaṃ nibbānamālambitvā puthujjanagottamabhibhavantaṃ, ariyagottamabhisambhontañca pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:829: 58. Tassānantarameva maggo dukkhasaccaṃ parijānanto samudayasaccaṃ pajahanto, nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikaronto, maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāvasena appanāvīthimotarati.
tika-abh07t0:830: 59. Tato paraṃ dve tīṇi phalacittāni pavattitvā bhavaṅgapātova hoti, puna bhavaṅgaṃ vocchinditvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:832: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vāna vā.
tika-abh07t0:837: 61. Tattha anattānupassanā attābhinivesaṃ muñcantī suññatānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:840: 64. Tasmā yadi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā anattato vipassati, suññato vimokkho nāma hoti maggo.
tika-abh07t0:841: 65. Yadi aniccato vipassati, animitto vimokkho nāma.
tika-abh07t0:842: 66. Yadi dukkhato vipassati, appaṇihito vimokkho nāmāti ca maggo vipassanāgamanavasena tīṇi nāmāni labhati, tathā phalañca maggāgamanavasena maggavīthiyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:843_1: vipassanāgamanavaseneva suññatādivimokkhoti ca pavuccati, ārammaṇavasena pana sarasavasena
tika-abh07t0:843_2: ca nāmattayaṃ sabbattha sabbesampi samameva ca.
tika-abh07t0:846: 68. Ettha pana sotāpattimaggaṃ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano sattakkhattuparamo sotāpanno nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t0:847: 69. Sakadāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanukarattā sakadāgāmī nāma hoti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā.
tika-abh07t0:848: 70. Anāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā kāmarāgabyāpādānamanavasesappahānena anāgāmī nāma hoti anāgantvā itthattaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:849: 71. Arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetvā anavasesakilesappahānena arahā nāma hoti khīṇāsavo loke aggadakkhiṇeyyoti.
tika-abh07t0:853_0: 73. Nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ pana anāgāmīnañceva arahantānañca labbhati, tattha
tika-abh07t0:853_1: yathākkamaṃ paṭhamajjhānādimahaggatasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha gate
tika-abh07t0:853_2: saṅkhāradhamme tattha tattheva vipassanto yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ gantvā tato paraṃ
tika-abh07t0:853_3: adhiṭṭheyyādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati, tassa dvinnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:853_4: appanājavanānaṃ parato vocchijjati cittasantati, tato nirodhasamāpanno nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t0:854: 74. Vuṭṭhānakāle pana anāgāmino anāgāmiphalacittaṃ, arahato arahattaphalacittaṃ ekavārameva pavattitvā bhavaṅgapāto hoti, tato paraṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh07t0:882: (Gha) porāṇehi anekāpi, katā yā pana vaṇṇanā;
tika-abh07t0:883: Na tāhi sakkā sabbattha, attho viññātave idha.
tika-abh07t0:888_0: Ettha hi “sammāsambuddha…pe… abhivādiyā”ti iminā ratanattayapaṇāmo vutto, abhidhammatthasaṅgaha”nti
tika-abh07t0:888_2: tesaṃ iminā samuditena paṭipādetabbabhāvadīpanato, ekattha saṅgayha kathanākāradīpanato,
tika-abh07t0:888_3: atthānugatasamaññāparidīpanato ca. Payojanaṃ pana saṅgahapadena sāmatthiyato dassitameva
tika-abh07t0:888_4: abhidhammatthānaṃ ekattha saṅgahe sati taduggahaparipucchādivasena tesaṃ sarūpāvabodhassa,
tika-abh07t0:889_0: Tattha ratanattayapaṇāmappayojanaṃ tāva bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā, visesato pana
tika-abh07t0:889_1: antarāyanivāraṇaṃ paccāsīsanti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ saṅgahakārehi “tassānubhāvena hatantarāyo”ti.
tika-abh07t0:889_2: Ratanattayapaṇāmo hi atthato paṇāmakiriyābhinipphādikā kusalacetanā, sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:889_6: sādheti. Tasmā pakaraṇārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāraddhapakaraṇassa anantarāyena
tika-abh07t0:889_7: parisamāpanatthañceva sotūnañca vandanāpubbaṅgamāya paṭipattiyā anantarāyena uggahaṇadhāraṇādisaṃsijjhanatthañca.
tika-abh07t0:889_8: Abhidheyyakathanaṃ pana viditābhidheyyasseva ganthassa viññūhi uggahaṇādivasena paṭipajjitabbabhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:889_10: pana vohārasukhatthanti ayamettha samudāyattho. Ayaṃ pana avayavattho – sasaddhammagaṇuttamaṃ
tika-abh07t0:889_11: atulaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhivādiya abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ bhāsissanti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:890_0: Tattha sammā sāmañca sabbadhamme abhisambuddhoti sammā sambuddho, bhagavā. So hi
tika-abh07t0:890_2: sammā sayaṃ vicitopacitapāramitāsambhūtena sayambhūñāṇena sāmaṃ bujjhi aññāsi. Yathāha
tika-abh07t0:890_3: “sayaṃ abhiññāya kamuddiseyya”nti, atha vā budhadhātussa jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi
tika-abh07t0:890_4: pavattanato sammā sāmañca paṭibuddho anaññapaṭibodhito hutvā sayameva savāsanasammohaniddāya
tika-abh07t0:890_8: bhagavati samaññāvasena pavattattā “atula”nti iminā viseseti. Tulāya sammito tulyo,
tika-abh07t0:890_9: soyeva tulo yakāralopavasena. Atha vā sammitatthe akārapaccayavasena tulāya sammito
tika-abh07t0:890_10: tulo, na tulo atulo, sīlādīhi guṇehi kenaci asadiso, natthi etassa vā tulo sadisoti
tika-abh07t0:890_11: atulo sadevake loke aggapuggalabhāvato. Yathāha “yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā
tika-abh07t0:890_12: dvipadā vā catuppadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādi.
tika-abh07t0:891_0: Ettāvatā ca hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti.
tika-abh07t0:891_1: Tattha hetusampadā nāma mahākaruṇāsamāyogo bodhisambhārasambharaṇañca. Phalasampadā
tika-abh07t0:891_5: pana lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitā attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā nāma. Sattūpakāro
tika-abh07t0:891_6: pana āsayapayogavasena duvidho. Tattha devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā,
tika-abh07t0:891_7: aparipākagatindriyānaṃ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca āsayo nāma. Tadaññasattānaṃ pana
tika-abh07t0:892_0: Tattha purimā dve phalasampadā “sammāsambuddha”nti iminā dassitā, itarā pana dve,
tika-abh07t0:892_1: tathā sattūpakārasampadā ca “atula”nti etena, tadupāyabhūtā pana hetusampadā dvīhipi
tika-abh07t0:893_0: Tadevaṃ tividhāvatthāsaṅgahitathomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ buddharatanaṃ vanditvā idāni sesaratanānampi
tika-abh07t0:893_2: abhivādetabbabhāvo sahayogena viññāyati yathā “saputtadāro āgatoti puttadārassāpi āgamana”nti.
tika-abh07t0:894_0: Tattha attānaṃ dhārente catūsu apāyesu, vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti
tika-abh07t0:894_1: dhammo, catumaggaphalanibbānavasena navavidho, pariyattiyā saha dasavidho vā dhammo.
tika-abh07t0:894_2: Dhāraṇañca panetassa apāyādinibbattakakilesaviddhaṃsanaṃ, taṃ ariyamaggassa kilesasamucchedakabhāvato,
tika-abh07t0:894_3: nibbānassa ca ārammaṇabhāvena tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāya nippariyāyato labbhati,
tika-abh07t0:894_4: phalassa pana kilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena maggānukūlappavattito, pariyattiyā
tika-abh07t0:894_5: ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhinnampi pariyāyatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sataṃ sappurisānaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:894_6: santo vā saṃvijjamāno na titthiyaparikappito attā viya paramatthato avijjamāno santo
tika-abh07t0:894_7: vā pasattho svākkhātatādiguṇayogato na bāhirakadhammo viya ekantanindito dhammoti
tika-abh07t0:894_8: saddhammo, gaṇo ca so aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ samūhabhāvato uttamo ca suppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesayogato,
tika-abh07t0:894_9: gaṇānaṃ, gaṇesu vā devamanussādi samūhesu uttamo yathāvuttaguṇavasenāti gaṇuttamo,
tika-abh07t0:894_10: saha saddhammena, gaṇuttamena cāti sasaddhammagaṇuttamo, taṃ sasaddhammagaṇuttamaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:895_0: Abhivādiyāti visesato vanditvā, bhayalābhakulācārādivirahena sakkaccaṃ ādarena kāyavacīmanodvārehi
tika-abh07t0:895_1: vanditvātyattho. Bhāsissanti kathessāmi. Nibbattitaparamatthabhāvena abhi visiṭṭhā
tika-abh07t0:895_3: tattha vuttā atthā abhidhammatthā, te saṅgayhanti ettha, etenāti vā abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:897_0: 2. Evaṃ tāva yathādhippetappayojananimittaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmādikaṃ vidhāya idāni
tika-abh07t0:897_1: yesaṃ abhidhammatthānaṃ saṅgahaṇavasena idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ paṭṭhapīyati, te tāva saṅkhepato
tika-abh07t0:897_2: uddisanto āha “tattha vuttā”tyādi. Tattha tasmiṃ abhidhamme sabbathā kusalādivasena,
tika-abh07t0:897_3: khandhādivasena ca vuttā abhidhammatthā paramatthato sammutiṃ ṭhapetvā nibbattitaparamatthavasena
tika-abh07t0:897_4: cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, cetasikaṃ vedanādikkhandhattayaṃ, rūpaṃ bhūtupādāyabhedabhinno
tika-abh07t0:897_5: rūpakkhandho, nibbānaṃ maggaphalānamārammaṇabhūto asaṅkhatadhammoti evaṃ catudhā
tika-abh07t0:897_6: catūhākārehi ṭhitāti yojanā. Tattha paramo uttamo aviparīto attho, paramassa vā uttamassa
tika-abh07t0:898_0: Cintetīti cittaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti attho. Yathāha “visayavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ citta”nti.
tika-abh07t0:898_1: Satipi hi nissayasamanantarādipaccayena vinā ārammaṇena cittamuppajjatīti tassa taṃlakkhaṇatā
tika-abh07t0:898_2: vuttā, etena nirārammaṇavādimataṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hoti. Cintenti vā etena karaṇabhūtena
tika-abh07t0:898_3: sampayuttadhammāti cittaṃ. Atha vā cintanamattaṃ cittaṃ. Yathāpaccayaṃ hi pavattimattameva
tika-abh07t0:898_4: yadidaṃ sabhāvadhammo nāma. Evañca katvā sabbesampi paramatthadhammānaṃ bhāvasādhanameva
tika-abh07t0:898_5: nippariyāyato labbhati, kattukaraṇavasena pana nibbacanaṃ pariyāyakathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:898_6: Sakasakakiccesu hi dhammānaṃ attappadhānatāsamāropanena kattubhāvo ca, tadanukūlabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:898_8: labbhati, tathānidassanaṃ pana dhammasabhāvavinimuttassa kattādino abhāvaparidīpanatthanti
tika-abh07t0:898_9: veditabbaṃ. Vicittakaraṇāditopi cittasaddatthaṃ papañcenti. Ayaṃ panettha saṅgaho –
tika-abh07t0:900: Citaṃ kammakilesehi, citaṃ tāyati vā tathā;
tika-abh07t0:902_0: Cetasi bhavaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti cetasikaṃ. Na hi taṃ cittena vinā ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthaṃ
tika-abh07t0:902_1: asati citte sabbena sabbaṃ anuppajjanato, cittaṃ pana kenaci cetasikena vināpi ārammaṇe
tika-abh07t0:902_2: pavattatīti taṃ cetasikameva cittāyattavuttikaṃ nāma. Tenāha bhagavā “manopubbaṅgamā
tika-abh07t0:902_3: dhammā”ti, etena sukhādīnaṃ acetanattaniccattādayo vippaṭipattiyopi paṭikkhittā honti.
tika-abh07t0:903_0: Ruppatīti rūpaṃ, sītuṇhādivirodhipaccayehi vikāramāpajjati, āpādīyatīti vā attho.
tika-abh07t0:903_1: Tenāha bhagavā “sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppatī”tyādi, ruppanañcettha sītādivirodhipaccayasamavāye
tika-abh07t0:903_2: visadisuppattiyeva. Yadi evaṃ arūpadhammānampi rūpavohāro āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati sītādiggahaṇasāmatthiyato
tika-abh07t0:903_4: pariyattanti kiṃ sītādiggahaṇena, taṃ pana sītādinā phuṭṭhassa ruppanaṃ vibhūtataraṃ,
tika-abh07t0:903_5: tasmā tadevetthādhippetanti ñāpanatthaṃ sītādiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ brahmaloke
tika-abh07t0:903_6: rūpavohāro, na hi tattha upaghātakā sītādayo atthīti? Kiñcāpi upaghātakā natthi,
tika-abh07t0:903_7: anuggāhakā pana atthi, tasmā taṃvasenettha ruppanaṃ sambhavatīti, atha vā taṃsabhāvānativattanato
tika-abh07t0:904: Bhavābhavaṃ vinanato saṃsibbanato vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ, nibbāti vā etena rāgaggiādikoti nibbānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:907_0: 3. Idāni yasmā vibhāgavantānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgena vinā na hoti,
tika-abh07t0:907_1: tasmā yathāuddiṭṭhānaṃ abhidhammatthānaṃ uddesakkamena vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ cittaṃ tāva
tika-abh07t0:907_2: bhūmijātisampayogādivasena vibhajitvā niddisitumārabhanto āha “tattha cittaṃ tāvā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:907_3: Tāva-saddo paṭhamanti etassatthe. Yathāuddiṭṭhesu catūsu abhidhammatthesu paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh07t0:907_4: cittaṃ niddisīyatīti ayañhetthattho. Cattāro vidhā pakārā assāti catubbidhaṃ. Yasmā
tika-abh07t0:907_5: panete catubhummakā dhammā anupubbapaṇītā, tasmā hīnukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhataratamānukkamena
tika-abh07t0:907_6: tesaṃ niddeso kato. Tattha kāmetīti kāmo, kāmataṇhā, sā ettha avacarati ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāti
tika-abh07t0:907_7: kāmāvacaraṃ. Kāmīyatīti vā kāmo, ekādasavidho kāmabhavo, tasmiṃ yebhuyyena avacaratīti
tika-abh07t0:907_8: kāmāvacaraṃ. Yebhuyyena caraṇassa hi adhippetattā rūpārūpabhavesu pavattassāpi imassa
tika-abh07t0:907_9: kāmāvacarabhāvo upapanno hoti. Kāmabhavoyeva vā kāmo ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacaro,
tika-abh07t0:907_10: tattha pavattampi cittaṃ nissite nissayavohārena kāmāvacaraṃ “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”tyādīsu
tika-abh07t0:910_0: Rūpārūpāvacaresupi eseva nayo yathārahaṃ daṭṭhabbo. Upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātalokato
tika-abh07t0:910_1: uttarati anāsavabhāvenāti lokuttaraṃ, maggacittaṃ. Phalacittaṃ pana tato uttiṇṇanti
tika-abh07t0:910_2: lokuttaraṃ. Ubhayampi vā saha nibbānena lokato uttaraṃ adhikaṃ yathāvuttaguṇavasenevāti lokuttaraṃ.
tika-abh07t0:913_0: 4. Imesu pana catūsu cittesu kāmāvacaracittassa kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedena catubbidhabhāvepi
tika-abh07t0:913_1: pāpāhetukavajjānaṃ ekūnasaṭṭhiyā, ekanavutiyā vā cittānaṃ sobhananāmena vohārakaraṇatthaṃ
tika-abh07t0:913_3: paṭhamaṃ dassento, tesu ca bhavesu gahitapaṭisandhikassa sattassa ādito vīthicittavasena
tika-abh07t0:913_4: lobhasahagatacittuppādānameva sambhavato teyeva paṭhamaṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ dvihetukabhāvasāmaññena
tika-abh07t0:913_6: lobhamūlaṃ tāva vedanādiṭṭhisaṅkhārabhedena aṭṭhadhā vibhajitvā dasseti.
tika-abh07t0:914_0: Tattha sundaraṃ mano, taṃ vā etassa atthīti sumano, cittaṃ, taṃsamaṅgipuggalo vā,
tika-abh07t0:914_1: tassa bhāvo tasmiṃ abhidhānabuddhīnaṃ pavattihetutāyāti somanassaṃ, mānasikasukhavedanāyetaṃ
tika-abh07t0:914_2: adhivacanaṃ, tena sahagataṃ ekuppādādivasena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ
tika-abh07t0:914_3: gatanti vā somanassasahagataṃ. Micchā passatīti diṭṭhi. Sāmaññavacanassapi hi atthappakaraṇādinā
tika-abh07t0:914_4: visesavisayatā hotīti idha micchādassanameva “diṭṭhī”ti vuccati. Diṭṭhiyeva diṭṭhigataṃ
tika-abh07t0:914_6: vā diṭṭhīsu gataṃ antogataṃ, diṭṭhiyā vā gamanamattaṃ na ettha gantabbo attādiko
tika-abh07t0:914_7: koci atthīti diṭṭhigataṃ, “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti pavatto attattaniyādiabhiniveso,
tika-abh07t0:914_8: tena samaṃ ekuppādādīhi pakārehi yuttanti diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ. Saṅkharoti cittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:914_9: tikkhabhāvasaṅkhātamaṇḍanavisesena sajjeti, saṅkharīyati vā taṃ etena yathāvuttanayena
tika-abh07t0:914_10: sajjīyatīti saṅkhāro, tattha tattha kicce saṃsīdamānassa cittassa anubalappadānavasena
tika-abh07t0:914_11: attano vā paresaṃ vā pavattapubbappayogo, so pana attano pubbabhāgappavatte cittasantāne
tika-abh07t0:914_12: ceva parasantāne ca pavattatīti tannibbattito cittassa tikkhabhāvasaṅkhāto visesovidha
tika-abh07t0:914_13: saṅkhāro, so yassa natthi taṃ asaṅkhāraṃ, tadeva asaṅkhārikaṃ. Saṅkhārena sahitaṃ
tika-abh07t0:917_0: Atha vā “sasaṅkhārikaṃ asaṅkhārika”nti cetaṃ kevalaṃ saṅkhārassa bhāvābhāvaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh07t0:917_1: vuttaṃ, na tassa sahappavattisabbhāvābhāvatoti bhinnasantānappavattinopi saṅkhārassa
tika-abh07t0:917_2: idamatthitāya taṃvasena nibbattaṃ cittaṃ saṅkhāro assa atthīti sasaṅkhārikaṃ “salomako
tika-abh07t0:917_3: sapakkhako”tyādīsu viya saha-saddassa vijjamānatthaparidīpanato. Tabbiparītaṃ pana
tika-abh07t0:917_4: tadabhāvato vuttanayena asaṅkhārikaṃ. Diṭṭhigatena vippayuttaṃ visaṃsaṭṭhanti diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:917_5: Upapattito yuttito ikkhati anubhavati vedayamānāpi majjhattākārasaṇṭhitiyāti upekkhā.
tika-abh07t0:917_6: Sukhadukkhānaṃ vā upetā yuttā aviruddhā ikkhā anubhavananti upekkhā. Sukhadukkhāvirodhitāya
tika-abh07t0:917_7: hesā tesaṃ anantarampi pavattati. Upekkhāsahagatanti idaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-abh07t0:918_0: Kasmā panettha aññesupi phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu somanassasahagatādibhāvova
tika-abh07t0:918_1: vuttoti? Somanassādīnameva asādhāraṇabhāvato. Phassādayo hi keci sabbacittasādhāraṇā,
tika-abh07t0:918_2: keci kusalādisādhāraṇā, mohādayo ca sabbākusalasādhāraṇāti na tehi sakkā cittaṃ visesetuṃ,
tika-abh07t0:918_3: somanassādayo pana katthaci citte honti, katthaci na hontīti pākaṭova taṃvasena cittassa
tika-abh07t0:918_4: viseso. Kasmā panete katthaci honti, katthaci na hontīti? Kāraṇassa sannihitāsannihitabhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:918_5: Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kāraṇanti? Vuccatesabhāvato, parikappato vā hi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ, somanassapaṭisandhikatā,
tika-abh07t0:918_6: agambhīrasabhāvatā ca idha somanassassa kāraṇaṃ, iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇaṃ, upekkhāpaṭisandhikatā,
tika-abh07t0:918_7: gambhīrasabhāvatā ca upekkhāya, diṭṭhivipannapuggalasevanā, sassatucchedāsayatā ca
tika-abh07t0:918_8: diṭṭhiyā, balavautubhojanādayo pana paccayā asaṅkhārikabhāvassāti. Tasmā attano anurūpakāraṇavasena
tika-abh07t0:918_9: nesaṃ uppajjanato katthaci citteyeva sambhavoti sakkā etehi cittassa viseso paññāpetunti.
tika-abh07t0:918_10: Evañca katvā nesaṃ satipi mohahetukabhāve lobhasahagatabhāvova nigamane vutto.
tika-abh07t0:919_0: Imesaṃ pana aṭṭhannampi ayamuppattikkamo veditabbo. Yadā hi “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”tyādinā
tika-abh07t0:919_1: nayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāme vā paribhuñjati, diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni
tika-abh07t0:919_2: vā sārato pacceti sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena, tadā paṭhamaṃ akusalacittamuppajjati.
tika-abh07t0:919_3: Yadā pana mandena samussāhitena cittena, tadā dutiyaṃ. Yadā pana micchādiṭṭhiṃ apurakkhatvā
tika-abh07t0:919_4: kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ vā sevati, parasampattiṃ vā abhijjhāyati, parabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-abh07t0:919_5: vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena, tadā tatiyaṃ. Yadā pana mandena
tika-abh07t0:919_6: samussāhitena cittena, tadā catutthaṃ. Yadā pana kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma, aññesaṃ
tika-abh07t0:919_7: vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti, tadā sesāni
tika-abh07t0:919_8: cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjantīti. Aṭṭhapīti pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena vakkhamānanayena
tika-abh07t0:920_0: 5. Duṭṭhu mano, taṃ vā etassāti dummano, tassa bhāvo domanassaṃ, mānasikadukkhavedanāyetaṃ
tika-abh07t0:920_1: adhivacanaṃ, tena sahagatanti domanassasahagataṃ. Ārammaṇe paṭihaññatīti paṭigho,
tika-abh07t0:920_2: doso. Caṇḍikkasabhāvatāya hesa ārammaṇaṃ paṭihananto viya pavattati. Domanassasahagatassa
tika-abh07t0:920_3: vedanāvasena abhedepi asādhāraṇadhammavasena cittassa upalakkhaṇatthaṃ domanassaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:920_4: paṭighasampayuttabhāvo pana ubhinnaṃ ekantasahacāritā dassanatthaṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:920_6: paṭigho caṇḍikkasabhāvo saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno eko dhammoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh07t0:920_7: Ettha ca yaṃ kiñci aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ, navavidhaāghātavatthūni ca domanassassa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:920_8: paṭighassa kāraṇañcāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ pana nesaṃ cittānaṃ pāṇātipātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle
tika-abh07t0:920_9: uppatti veditabbā. Etthāpi nigamane pi-saddassa attho vuttanayānusārena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t0:921_0: 6. Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto tāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā. Atha vā cikicchituṃ dukkaratāya
tika-abh07t0:921_1: vigatā cikicchā ñāṇappaṭikāro imissāti vicikicchā, tāya sampayuttaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:921_2: Uddhatassa bhāvo uddhaccaṃ. Uddhaccassa sabbākusalasādhāraṇabhāvepi idha sampayuttadhammesu
tika-abh07t0:921_3: padhānaṃ hutvā pavattatīti idameva tena visesetvā vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā dhammuddesapāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:921_4: sesākusalesu uddhaccaṃ yevāpanakavasena vuttaṃ, idha pana “uddhaccaṃ uppajjatī”ti
tika-abh07t0:925: Vatvā sesesu ettheva, taṃ sarūpena desita”nti.
tika-abh07t0:926_0: Imāni pana dve cittāni mūlantaravirahato atisammūḷhatāya, saṃsappanavikkhipanavasena
tika-abh07t0:926_2: upekkhāsahagatāneva pavattanti, tatoyeva ca sabhāvatikkhatāya ussāhetabbatāya abhāvato
tika-abh07t0:928: Sopekkhaṃ sabbadā no ca, bhinnaṃ saṅkhārabhedato.
tika-abh07t0:931: Mohena muyhanti atisayena muyhanti mūlantaravirahatoti momūhāni.
tika-abh07t0:932_0: 7. Iccevantyādi yathāvuttānaṃ dvādasākusalacittānaṃ nigamanaṃ. Tattha iti-saddo vacanavacanīyasamudāyanidassanattho.
tika-abh07t0:932_1: Evaṃ-saddo vacanavacanīyapaṭipāṭisandassanattho. Nipātasamudāyo vā esa vacanavacanīyanigamanārambhe.
tika-abh07t0:932_3: vicikicchuddhaccayogenāti sabbenāpi sampayogādiākārena dvādasa akusalacittāni samattāni
tika-abh07t0:932_4: pariniṭṭhitāni, saṅgahetvā vā attāni gahitāni, vuttānītyattho. Tattha kusalapaṭipakkhāni
tika-abh07t0:932_5: akusalāni mittappaṭipakkho amitto viya, paṭipakkhabhāvo ca kusalākusalānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh07t0:933_0: 8. Aṭṭhadhātyādi saṅgahagāthā. Lobho ca so suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena mūlasadisattā
tika-abh07t0:933_1: mūlañca, kaṃ etesanti lobhamūlāni cittāni vedanādibhedato aṭṭhadhā siyuṃ. Tathā dosamūlāni
tika-abh07t0:933_2: saṅkhārabhedato dvidhā. Mohamūlāni suddho mohoyeva mūlametesanti mohamūlasaṅkhātāni
tika-abh07t0:933_3: sampayogabhedato dve cāti akusalā dvādasa siyuntyattho.
tika-abh07t0:936_0: 9. Evaṃ mūlabhedato tividhampi akusalaṃ sampayogādibhedato dvādasadhā vibhajitvā
tika-abh07t0:936_1: idāni ahetukacittāni niddisanto tesaṃ akusalavipākādivasena tividhabhāvepi akusalānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:936_4: samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya hotīti cakkhu. Atha vā cakkhati rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya
tika-abh07t0:936_5: hotīti cakkhu. Cakkhatīti hi ayaṃ saddo “madhuṃ cakkhati, byañjanaṃ cakkhatī”tyādīsu
tika-abh07t0:936_6: viya assādanattho hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – “cakkhuṃ kho pana, māgaṇḍiya, rūpārāmaṃ
tika-abh07t0:936_7: rūparataṃ rūpasammudita”ntyādi. Yadi evaṃ “sotaṃ kho, māgaṇḍiya, saddārāmaṃ saddarataṃ
tika-abh07t0:936_8: saddasammudita”ntyādivacanato sotādīnampi saddādiassādanaṃ atthīti tesampi cakkhusaddābhidheyyatā
tika-abh07t0:936_9: āpajjeyyāti? Nāpajjati niruḷhattā, niruḷho hesa cakkhu-saddo daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammajabhūtappasādalakkhaṇe
tika-abh07t0:936_10: cakkhuppasādeyeva mayūrādisaddā viya sakuṇavisesādīsu, cakkhunā sahavuttiyā pana
tika-abh07t0:936_11: bhamukaṭṭhiparicchinno maṃsapiṇḍopi “cakkhū”ti vuccati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana anekatthattā
tika-abh07t0:936_12: dhātūnaṃ cakkhati-saddassa vibhāvanatthatāpi sambhavatīti “cakkhati rūpaṃ vibhāvetīti
tika-abh07t0:936_13: cakkhū”ti vuttaṃ. Cakkhusmiṃ viññāṇaṃ tannissitatthāti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Tathā hetaṃ
tika-abh07t0:937_0: Evaṃ sotaviññāṇādīsupi yathārahaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tathā”ti iminā upekkhāsahagatabhāvaṃ
tika-abh07t0:937_1: atidisati. Viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ hutvā suṇātīti sotaṃ. Ghāyati gandhopādānaṃ karotīti
tika-abh07t0:937_2: ghānaṃ. Jīvitanimittaṃ raso jīvitaṃ, taṃ avhāyati tasmiṃ ninnatāyāti jivhā niruttinayena.
tika-abh07t0:937_3: Kucchitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ āyo pavattiṭṭhānanti kāyo. Kāyindriyañhi phoṭṭhabbaggahaṇasabhāvattā
tika-abh07t0:937_4: tadassādavasappavattānaṃ, tammūlakānañca pāpadhammānaṃ visesakāraṇanti tesaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:937_5: viya gayhati. Sasambhārakāyo vā kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo. Taṃsahacaritattā
tika-abh07t0:937_6: pana pasādakāyopi tathā vuccati. Du kucchitaṃ hutvā khanati kāyikasukhaṃ, dukkhamanti
tika-abh07t0:937_7: vā dukkhaṃ. Dukkaramokāsadānaṃ etassāti dukkha”ntipi apare. Pañcaviññāṇaggahitaṃ
tika-abh07t0:937_8: rūpādiārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchati tadākārappavattiyāti sampaṭicchanaṃ. Sammā tīreti yathāsampaṭicchitaṃ
tika-abh07t0:937_9: rūpādiārammaṇaṃ vīmaṃsatīti santīraṇaṃ. Aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ pākāti
tika-abh07t0:937_10: vipākā, vipakkabhāvamāpannānaṃ arūpadhammānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Evañca katvā kusalākusalakammasamuṭṭhānānampi
tika-abh07t0:937_11: kaṭattārūpānaṃ natthi vipākavohāro. Akusalassa vipākacittāni akusalavipākacittāni.
tika-abh07t0:938_0: 10. Sukhayati kāyacittaṃ, suṭṭhu vā khanati kāyacittābādhaṃ, sukhena khamitabbanti
tika-abh07t0:938_1: vā sukhaṃ. “Sukaramokāsadānaṃ etassāti sukha”nti apare. Kasmā pana yathā akusalavipākasantīraṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:938_2: ekameva vuttaṃ, evamavatvā kusalavipākasantīraṇaṃ dvidhā vuttanti? Iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇavasena
tika-abh07t0:938_3: vedanābhedasambhavato. Yadi evaṃ tatthāpi aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇavasena vedanābhedena
tika-abh07t0:938_4: bhavitabbanti? Nayidamevaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇe uppajjitabbassapi domanassassa paṭighena
tika-abh07t0:938_5: vinā anuppajjanato, paṭighassa ca ekantākusalasabhāvassa abyākatesu asambhavato.
tika-abh07t0:938_6: Na hi bhinnajātiko dhammo bhinnajātikesu upalabbhati, tasmā attanā samānayogakkhamassa
tika-abh07t0:938_7: asambhavato akusalavipākesu domanassaṃ na sambhavatīti tassa taṃsahagatatā na vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:938_8: Atha vā yathā koci balavatā pothiyamāno dubbalapuriso tassa paṭippaharituṃ asakkonto
tika-abh07t0:938_9: tasmiṃ upekkhakova hoti, evameva akusalavipākānaṃ paridubbalabhāvato aniṭṭhārammaṇepi
tika-abh07t0:939_0: Cakkhuviññāṇādīni pana cattāri ubhayavipākānipi vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanāya dubbalabhāvato
tika-abh07t0:939_1: aniṭṭhe iṭṭhepi ca ārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatāneva. Tesañhi catunnampi vatthubhūtāni
tika-abh07t0:939_2: cakkhādīni upādārūpāneva, tathā ārammaṇabhūtānipi rūpādīni, upādārūpakena ca upādārūpakassa
tika-abh07t0:939_3: saṅghaṭṭanaṃ atidubbalaṃ picupiṇḍakena picupiṇḍakassa phusanaṃ viya, tasmā tāni sabbathāpi
tika-abh07t0:939_5: taṃ kāyappasāde saṅghaṭṭitampi taṃ atikkamitvā tannissayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
tika-abh07t0:939_6: Bhūtarūpehi ca bhūtarūpānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ balavataraṃ adhikaraṇimatthake picupiṇḍakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:939_7: ṭhapetvā kūṭena pahaṭakāle kūṭassa picupiṇḍakaṃ atikkamitvā adhikaraṇiggahaṇaṃ viya,
tika-abh07t0:939_8: tasmā vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanāya balavabhāvato kāyaviññāṇaṃ aniṭṭhe dukkhasahagataṃ,
tika-abh07t0:939_9: iṭṭhe sukhasahagatanti. Sampaṭicchanayugaḷhaṃ pana attanā asamānanissayānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnamanantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:939_11: puriso nātibalavaṃ sabbathāpi visayarasamanubhavituṃ na sakkotīti sabbathāpi upekkhāsahagatameva.
tika-abh07t0:939_13: Yadi evaṃ āvajjanadvayassa upekkhāsampayogaṃ kasmā vakkhati, nanu tampi samānanissayānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:939_14: pavattatīti? Saccaṃ, tattha pana purimaṃ pubbe kenaci aggahiteyeva ārammaṇe ekavārameva
tika-abh07t0:939_16: na sabbathāpi visayarasamanubhavituṃ sakkoti, tasmā majjhattavedanāsampayuttamevāti. Honti cettha –
tika-abh07t0:946_0: Kusalassa vipākāni, sampayuttahetuvirahato ahetukacittāni cāti kusalavipākāhetukacittāni.
tika-abh07t0:946_1: Nibbattakahetuvasena nipphannānipi hetāni sampayuttahetuvaseneva ahetukavohāraṃ labhanti,
tika-abh07t0:946_2: itarathā mahāvipākehi imesaṃ nānattāsambhavato. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ yathā idhevaṃ
tika-abh07t0:946_3: akusalavipākanigamane ahetukaggahaṇaṃ na katanti? Byabhicārābhāvato. Sati hi sambhave,
tika-abh07t0:946_4: byabhicāre ca visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyā. Akusalavipākānaṃ pana lobhādisāvajjadhammavipākabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:946_5: tabbidhurehi, alobhādīhi sampayogāyogato, sayaṃ abyākataniravajjasabhāvānaṃ lobhādiakusaladhammasampayogavirodhato
tika-abh07t0:946_6: ca natthi kadācipi sahetukatāya sambhavoti ahetukabhāvābyabhicārato na tāni ahetukasaddena visesitabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:947_0: 11. Idāni ahetukādhikāre ahetukakiriyacittānipi kiccabhedena tidhā dassetuṃ “upekkhāsahagata”ntyādi
tika-abh07t0:947_1: vuttaṃ. Cakkhādipañcadvāre ghaṭṭitamārammaṇaṃ āvajjeti tattha ābhogaṃ karoti, cittasantānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:947_2: vā bhavaṅgavasena pavattituṃ adatvā vīthicittabhāvāya pariṇāmetīti pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:947_5: āvajjeti, vuttanayena vā cittasantānaṃ pariṇāmetīti manodvārāvajjanaṃ, kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātuupekkhāsahagatacittaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:947_6: Idameva ca pañcadvāre yathāsantīritaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vavatthapetīti voṭṭhabbananti ca
tika-abh07t0:947_7: vuccati. Hasitaṃ uppādetīti hasituppādaṃ, khīṇāsavānaṃ anoḷārikārammaṇesu pahaṭṭhākāramattahetukaṃ
tika-abh07t0:948: 12. Sabbathāpīti akusalavipākakusalavipākakiriyabhedena. Aṭṭhārasāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Ahetukacittānīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:951_0: 14. Evaṃ dvādasākusalaahetukāṭṭhārasavasena samatiṃsa cittāni dassetvā idāni tabbinimuttānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:951_1: sobhanavohāraṃ ṭhapetuṃ “pāpāhetukamuttānī”tyādi vuttaṃ. Attanā adhisayitassa apāyādidukkhassa
tika-abh07t0:951_2: pāpanato pāpehi, hetusampayogābhāvato ahetukehi ca muttāni catuvīsatikāmāvacarapañcatiṃsamahaggatalokuttaravasena
tika-abh07t0:951_3: ekūnasaṭṭhiparimāṇāni, atha vā aṭṭha lokuttarāni jhānaṅgayogabhedena paccekaṃ pañcadhā
tika-abh07t0:951_4: katvā ekanavutipi cittāni sobhanaguṇāvahanato, alobhādianavajjahetusampayogato ca
tika-abh07t0:953_0: 15. Idāni sobhanesu kāmāvacarānameva paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhattā tesupi abyākatānaṃ kusalapubbakattā
tika-abh07t0:953_1: paṭhamaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ, tato tabbipākaṃ, tadanantaraṃ tadekabhūmipariyāpannaṃ
tika-abh07t0:953_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha jānāti yathāsabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhatīti ñāṇaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Ettha
tika-abh07t0:953_4: ca balavasaddhāya dassanasampattiyā paccayapaṭiggāhakādisampattiyāti evamādīhi kāraṇehi
tika-abh07t0:953_6: kilesadūrībhāvato ca ñāṇasampayuttatā, tabbipariyāyena upekkhāsahagatatā ceva ñāṇavippayuttatā
tika-abh07t0:953_7: ca, āvāsasappāyādivasena kāyacittānaṃ kallabhāvato, pubbe dānādīsu kataparicayatādīhi
tika-abh07t0:953_8: ca asaṅkhārikatā, tabbipariyāyena sasaṅkhārikatā ca veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:954_0: Tattha yadā pana yo deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādisampattiṃ, aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma
tika-abh07t0:954_2: asaṃsīdanto anussāhito parehi dānādīni puññāni karoti, tadāssa cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ
tika-abh07t0:954_3: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ hoti. Yadā pana vuttanayeneva haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ
tika-abh07t0:954_4: purakkhatvāpi amuttacāgatādivasena saṃsīdamāno parehi vā ussāhito karoti, tadāssa
tika-abh07t0:954_5: tadeva cittaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ hoti. Yadā pana ñātijanassa paṭipattidassanena jātaparicayā
tika-abh07t0:954_6: bāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassajātā sahasā kiñcideva hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti
tika-abh07t0:954_7: vā, tadā tesaṃ tatiyaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Yadā pana “detha, vandathā”ti ñātīhi ussāhitā
tika-abh07t0:954_8: evaṃ paṭipajjanti, tadā catutthaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Yadā pana deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:954_9: asampattiṃ, aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā
tika-abh07t0:954_10: honti, tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjantīti. Aṭṭhapīti pi-saddena dasapuññakiriyādivasena
tika-abh07t0:957_0: Imāni hi aṭṭha cittāni dasapuññakiriyavatthuvasena pavattanato paccekaṃ dasa dasāti
tika-abh07t0:957_1: katvā asīti cittāni honti, tāni ca chasu ārammaṇesu pavattanato paccekaṃ chagguṇitāni
tika-abh07t0:957_2: sāsītikāni cattāri satāni honti, adhipatibhedena pana ñāṇavippayuttānaṃ cattālīsādhikadvisataparimāṇānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:957_3: vīmaṃsādhipatisampayogābhāvato tāni tiṇṇaṃ adhipatīnaṃ vasena tiguṇitāni vīsādhikāni
tika-abh07t0:957_4: sattasatāni, tathā ñāṇasampayuttāni ca catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ vasena catugguṇitāni
tika-abh07t0:957_5: sasaṭṭhikāni nava satānīti evaṃ adhipativasena sahassaṃ sāsītikāni ca cha satāni
tika-abh07t0:957_7: pañca sahassāni honti, tāni ca hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedato tiguṇitāni vīsasatādhikapannarasasahassāni
tika-abh07t0:960: Taṃ adhipativasena gaṇanaparihāniṃ anādiyitvā sotapatitavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, kāladesādibhedena pana nesaṃ bhedo appameyyova.
tika-abh07t0:961_0: Kucchite pāpadhamme salayanti kampenti viddhaṃsenti apagamentīti vā kusalāni. Atha
tika-abh07t0:961_1: vā kucchitākārena santāne sayanato pavattanato kusasaṅkhāte pāpadhamme lunanti chindantīti
tika-abh07t0:961_2: kusalāni. Atha vā kucchite pāpadhamme sānato tanukaraṇato osānakaraṇato vā kusasaṅkhātena
tika-abh07t0:961_3: ñāṇena, saddhādidhammajātena vā lātabbāni sahajātaupanissayabhāvena yathārahaṃ pavattetabbānīti
tika-abh07t0:961_4: kusalāni, tāneva yathāvuttatthena kāmāvacarāni kusalacittāni cāti kāmāvacarakusalacittāni.
tika-abh07t0:962_0: 16. Yathā panetāni puññakiriyavasena, kammadvāravasena, kammavasena, adhipativasena
tika-abh07t0:962_1: ca pavattanti, nevaṃ vipākāni dānādivasena appavattanato, viññattisamuṭṭhāpanābhāvato,
tika-abh07t0:962_2: avipākasabhāvato, chandādīni purakkhatvā appavattito ca, tasmā taṃvasena parihāpetvā
tika-abh07t0:962_3: yathārahaṃ gaṇanabhedo yojetabbo. Imānipi iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇavasena yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh07t0:962_5: tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ yebhuyyena javanānurūpato, kadāci tatthāpi kammānurūpato ca
tika-abh07t0:962_6: ñāṇasampayuttāni, ñāṇavippayuttāni ca honti. Yathāpayogaṃ vinā sappayogañca yathāupaṭṭhitehi
tika-abh07t0:963: 17. Kiriyacittānampi kusale vuttanayena yathārahaṃ somanassasahagatāditā veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:964_1: visesanaṃ kusalassa ekantasahetukattā. Hoti hi yathālābhayojanā, “sakkharakathalampi
tika-abh07t0:964_2: macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī”tyādīsu viya sakkharakathalassa caraṇāyogato
tika-abh07t0:965_1: duvidhattā, ñāṇabhedato catubbidhattā, saṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhattā ca sampiṇḍetvā
tika-abh07t0:965_2: catuvīsati matāti yojanā. Nanu ca vedanābhedo tāva yutto tāsaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā.
tika-abh07t0:965_3: Ñāṇasaṅkhārabhedo pana kathanti? Ñāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ bhāvābhāvakatopi bhedo ñāṇasaṅkhārakatova
tika-abh07t0:965_4: yathā vassakato subhikkho dubbhikkhoti, tasmā ñāṇasaṅkhārakato bhedo ñāṇasaṅkhārabhedoti
tika-abh07t0:966_0: 20. Idāni sabbānipi kāmāvacaracittāni sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “kāme tevīsā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:966_1: Kāme bhave satta akusalavipākāni, sahetukāhetukāni soḷasa kusalavipākānīti evaṃ tevīsati
tika-abh07t0:966_2: vipākāni dvādasa akusalāni, aṭṭha kusalānīti puññāpuññāni vīsati ahetukā tisso sahetukā
tika-abh07t0:966_3: aṭṭhāti ekādasa kiriyā cāti sabbathāpi kusalākusalavipākakiriyānaṃ antogadhabhedena
tika-abh07t0:969_0: 21. Idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhassa rūpāvacarassa niddesakkamo anuppattoti tassa jhānaṅgayogabhedena
tika-abh07t0:969_1: pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “vitakka…pe… sahita”ntyādimāha. Vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti
tika-abh07t0:969_2: ca sukhañca ekaggatā cāti imehi sahitaṃ vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh07t0:969_3: ārammaṇaṃ vitakketi sampayuttadhamme abhiniropetīti vitakko, so sahajātānaṃ ārammaṇābhiniropanalakkhaṇo,
tika-abh07t0:969_4: yathā hi koci gāmavāsī puriso rājavallabhaṃ sambandhinaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ
tika-abh07t0:969_5: anupavisati, evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkaṃ
tika-abh07t0:969_6: cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti? Tampi vitakkabaleneva abhinirohati. Yathā hi so puriso
tika-abh07t0:969_7: paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati, evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi
tika-abh07t0:969_8: avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhinirohati. Paricayoti cettha savitakkacittassa santāne
tika-abh07t0:969_9: abhiṇhappavattivasena nibbattā cittabhāvanā. Api cettha pañcaviññāṇaṃ avitakkampi
