tika-abh07t0:1252_2: javitesu, kusalajavanesu vā paricitassa kadāci akusalajavanesu javitesu akusalānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1252_3: pavattaparicayena tihetukajavanatopi paraṃ ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ hoti, tathā kusalānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1252_5: pana aññakammena tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ vattabbameva natthi. Tathā ca vuttaṃ paṭṭhāne
tika-abh07t0:1252_6: “ahetuke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko
tika-abh07t0:1252_7: vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1253_0: Tasmāti yasmā domanassajavanāvasāne upekkhāsahagatāneva honti. Tasmā domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne
tika-abh07t0:1253_2: bhavaṅgapātābhāvo dīpitova hoti domanassānantaraṃ somanassābhāvatoti taṃ avatvā tadārammaṇābhāvameva
tika-abh07t0:1253_3: parikappento āha “yadi tadārammaṇasambhavo natthī”ti. Somanassapaṭisandhikassa titthiyādino
tika-abh07t0:1253_4: buddhādiatiiṭṭhārammaṇe pi paṭihatacittassa domanassajavane javite vuttanayena somanassatadārammaṇassa
tika-abh07t0:1253_5: atiiṭṭhārammaṇe ca upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇassa anuppajjanato, kenaci vā asappāyena
tika-abh07t0:1253_6: parihīnalokiyajjhānaṃ ārabbha “paṇītadhammo me naṭṭho”ti vippaṭisāraṃ janentassa
tika-abh07t0:1253_7: domanassajavane sati akāmāvacarārammaṇe tadārammaṇābhāvato yadi tadārammaṇassa uppattisambhavo natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1254_0: Paricitapubbanti pubbe paricitaṃ, tasmiṃ bhave yebhuyyena gahitapubbaṃ. Upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1254_1: uppajjati nirāvajjanampi. Yathā taṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa phalacittantyadhippāyo. Yathāhu –
tika-abh07t0:1257_0: Kena pana kiccena idaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti? Tadārammaṇakiccena tāva na pavattati javanārammaṇassa
tika-abh07t0:1257_1: aggahaṇato, nāpi santīraṇakiccena yathāsampaṭicchitassa santīraṇavasena appavattanato,
tika-abh07t0:1257_2: paṭisandhicutīsu vattabbameva natthi, pārisesato pana bhavassa aṅgabhāvato bhavaṅgakiccenāti
tika-abh07t0:1257_3: yuttaṃ siyā. Ācariyadhammapālattherenapi hi ayamattho dassitova. Yaṃ pana paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1257_4: dhammato, ārammaṇato ca samānataṃ vakkhati, taṃ yebhuyyatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi idamekaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1257_5: ṭhānaṃ vajjetvā paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ visadisatā atthi. Tamanantaritvāti taṃ attano
tika-abh07t0:1258_0: 29. Kāmāvacara…pe… icchantīti ettha kāmāvacarajavanāvasāneyeva tadārammaṇaṃ icchanti
tika-abh07t0:1258_1: kāmataṇhānidānakammanibbattattā. Na hi taṃ kāmataṇhāhetukena kammunā janitaṃ ataṃsabhāvassa
tika-abh07t0:1258_2: rūpārūpāvacaralokuttarajavanassa anantaraṃ uppajjati. Kiṃkāraṇā? Ajanakattā, janakasamānattābhāvato
tika-abh07t0:1258_3: ca. Yathā hi gehato bahi nikkhamitukāmo bālako janakaṃ, taṃsadisaṃ vā aṅguliyaṃ gahetvā
tika-abh07t0:1258_4: nikkhamati, nāññaṃ rājapurisādiṃ, evaṃ bhavaṅgavisayato aññattha pavattamānaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1258_5: janakaṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalaṃ, taṃsadisaṃ vā kāmāvacarakiriyajavanaṃ anubandhati,
tika-abh07t0:1258_6: na pana tassa visadisāni mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni. Tathā kāmāvacarasattānameva
tika-abh07t0:1258_7: tadārammaṇaṃ icchanti, na brahmānaṃ tadārammaṇūpanissayassa kāmāvacarapaṭisandhibījassābhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1258_8: Tathā kāmāvacaradhammesveva ārammaṇabhūtesu icchanti. Na itaresu aparicitattā. Yathā
tika-abh07t0:1258_9: hi so bālako janakaṃ, taṃsadisaṃ vā anugacchantopi araññādiaparicitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1258_10: ananubandhitvā pamukhaṅgaṇādimhi paricitaṭṭhāneyeva anubandhati, evamidampi rūpāvacarādiaparicitārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1258_11: ārabbha pavattantaṃ nānubandhati. Apica kāmataṇhāyattakammajanitattāpi etaṃ kāmataṇhārammaṇesu
tika-abh07t0:1265: Nanu ca “kāmāvacarapaṭisandhibījābhāvato”ti vuttaṃ, tathā ca cakkhuviññāṇādīnampi abhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati indriyappavattiānubhāvato, dvāravīthibhede cittaniyamato ca.
tika-abh07t0:1268: 32. Mandappavattiyanti maraṇāsannakāle vatthudubbalatāya mandībhūtavegattā mandaṃ hutvā pavattiyaṃ. Maraṇakālādīsūti ādi-saddena mucchākālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh07t0:1269_1: visuṃ visuṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya jhānadhamme visuṃ visuṃ āvajjentassa
tika-abh07t0:1269_2: āvajjanavasitāya matthakappattiyā āvajjanatapparova cittābhinīhāro hotīti yathāvajjitajhānaṅgārammaṇāni
tika-abh07t0:1269_3: cattāri, pañcavā paccavekkhaṇajavanacittāni pavattantīti vadanti aṭṭhakathācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1269_4: “Bhagavato”ti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ aññesampi dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ evarūpe accāyikakāle
tika-abh07t0:1269_5: aparipuṇṇajavanānaṃ pavattanato. Tathā ca vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayañca matthakappattā
tika-abh07t0:1269_6: vasitā bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyakāle aññesaṃ vā evarūpe kāle”ti. “Cattāri pañca
tika-abh07t0:1269_7: vā”ti ca panetaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyavasena gahetabbanti ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-abh07t0:1269_8: vuttaṃ, tasmā bhagavato cattāri, aññesaṃ pañcapīti yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-abh07t0:1270_0: 34. Ādikammikassāti ādito katayogakammassa. Paṭhamaṃ nibbattā appanā paṭhamakappanā.
tika-abh07t0:1271_0: 35. Maggāyeva uppajjanato magguppādā. Yathārahanti pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā uppannamaggānurūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1271_1: Sattajavanaparamattā hi ekāvajjanavīthiyā catutthaṃ uppannamaggato paraṃ tīti phalacittāni,
tika-abh07t0:1271_2: pañcamaṃ uppannamaggato paraṃ dve vā honti.
tika-abh07t0:1272_2: na sotāpannasakadāminoti vuttaṃ “anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā”ti. Vibhattivipallāso
tika-abh07t0:1272_3: cettha daṭṭhabbo “anāgāmiphale vā arahattaphale vā”ti. Tenāha “niruddhe”ti. Yathārahanti
tika-abh07t0:1274_0: 39. Parittāni javanāni sattakkhattuṃ matāni ukkaṃsakoṭiyā. Maggābhiññā pana sakiṃ
tika-abh07t0:1274_1: ekavārameva matā. Avasesāni abhiññāmaggavajjitāni mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni bahūnipi
tika-abh07t0:1274_2: labbhanti samāpattivīthiyaṃ ahorattampi pavattanato. Api-saddena lokiyajjhānāni paṭhamakappanāyaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1274_3: antimaphaladvayañca nirodhānantaraṃ ekavāraṃ, phalacittāni maggānantaraṃ dvattikkhattumpīti sampiṇḍeti.
tika-abh07t0:1277_3: Paṭisandhiviññāṇasahagatālobhādosavasena dve hetū imesanti dvihetukā. Tādisānaṃ hetūnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1277_4: abhāvato ahetukā. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Appanājavanāni na labbhanti vipākāvaraṇasabbhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1278_0: 41. “Sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti pāṭhato
tika-abh07t0:1278_1: ahetukānampi nānākammena dvihetukatadārammaṇaṃ sambhavati, dvihetukānaṃ vattabbameva
tika-abh07t0:1278_2: natthi. Mūlasandhiyā pana jaḷabhāvato ubhinnampi natthi tihetukatadārammaṇanti āha
tika-abh07t0:1278_4: avisesena vuttattā ahetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇaṃ vatvā idha ñāṇasampayuttavipākābhāvavacanassa
tika-abh07t0:1278_5: parihāsavasena “so eva pucchitabbo, yo tassa kattā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana parihāsavasena
tika-abh07t0:1278_6: vuttampi ācariyaṃ pucchitvāva vijānanatthaṃ vuttavacanaṃ viya ṭhitaṃ. Tathā hi ācariyenevettha
tika-abh07t0:1280_0: Apare pana “yathā ahetukānaṃ sahetukatadārammaṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ dvihetukānaṃ tihetukatadārammaṇampī”ti
tika-abh07t0:1280_1: vaṇṇenti, tesaṃ matānurodhena ca idhāpi ñāṇasampayuttavipākapaṭikkhepo ahetukeyeva
tika-abh07t0:1280_2: sandhāyāti vadanti. Tattha pana pamāṇapāṭhābhāvato ācariyena ubhinnampi sādhāraṇavasena
tika-abh07t0:1280_3: ñāṇasampayuttavipākābhāve kāraṇaṃ vatvā samakameva cittaparicchedassa dassitattā
tika-abh07t0:1280_4: tesaṃ vacanaṃ vīmaṃsitvā sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Ahetukāpekkhāya cettha “sugatiya”nti
tika-abh07t0:1280_5: vacanaṃ, taṃ pana atthato anuññātadvihetukavipākānaṃ tattheva sambhavadassanaparaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1282_2: pahīnattā taṃsahagatajavanāni ceva ca-saddena ākaḍḍhitāni khīṇāsavāveṇikāni kiriyajavanāni ca na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:1284_0: 47. Lokuttara…pe… samuppajjantīti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikabhāvena puggalantaresu
tika-abh07t0:1284_2: asamugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhena puthujjanehi viya sotāpannānaṃ sotāpannādīhi puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena
tika-abh07t0:1284_3: paṭippassaddhattā ca aṭṭhapi lokuttarajavanāni yathāsakaṃ maggaphalaṭṭhānaṃ ariyānameva samuppajjanti.
tika-abh07t0:1285_0: 48. Idāni tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ yathāpaṭikkhittajavanāni vajjetvā pārisesato labbhamānajavanāni
tika-abh07t0:1285_4: catucattālīsa vīthicittāni sambhavā yathālābhaṃ kāmabhave ṭhitānaṃ vasena uddise.
tika-abh07t0:1286_2: chappaññāsa vīthicittāni yathāsambhavaṃ uddise avisesato. Visesato pana sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1286_3: ekapaññāsa, anāgāmīnaṃ ekūnapaññāsa, avasesānaṃ catunnaṃ puthujjanānaṃ aṭṭhārasakiriyajavanasabbalokuttaramahaggatavipākavasena
tika-abh07t0:1286_5: catupaññāsa vīthicittāni yathāsambhavato uddise avisesato. Visesato pana tihetukānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1286_7: ekacattālīsa, āpāyikānaṃ tāneva dvihetukavipākavajjitāni sattatiṃsa vīthicittānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1290: 49. Sabbānipi vīthicittāni upalabbhanti channaṃ dvārānaṃ, sabbesañca puggalānaṃ tattha sambhavato. Yathārahanti taṃtaṃbhavānurūpaṃ, taṃtaṃpuggalānurūpañca.
tika-abh07t0:1291: 52. Tyādinā ghānaviññāṇādīnampi paṭikkhepo hessatīti rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ paṭighajavanatadārammaṇāneva paṭikkhittāni. Sabbatthāpīti kāmabhave, rūpabhave, arūpabhave ca.
tika-abh07t0:1292_0: 54. Kāmabhave yathārahaṃ vīthimuttavajjāni asīti vīthicittāni, rūpabhave paṭighadvayaaṭṭhatadārammaṇaghānādiviññāṇachakkavīthimuttakavasena
tika-abh07t0:1293_0: Keci pana “rūpabhave aniṭṭhārammaṇābhāvato idhāgatānaṃyeva brahmānaṃ akusalavipākasambhavoti
tika-abh07t0:1293_1: tāni parihāpetvā pañcaparittavipākehi saddhiṃ rūpabhave saṭṭhiyeva vīthicittānī”ti
tika-abh07t0:1293_2: vadanti. Idha pana tattha ṭhatvāpi imaṃ lokaṃ passantānaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇassa asambhavo
tika-abh07t0:1293_3: na sakkā vattunti tehi saddhiṃyeva tattha catusaṭṭhi vuttāni. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1293_4: dhammānusāraṇiyaṃ “yadā brahmāno kāmāvacaraṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ ālambanti, tadā taṃ
tika-abh07t0:1296_0: 55. Yathāsambhavanti taṃtaṃdvāresu, taṃtaṃbhavesu vā sambhavānurūpato. Yāvatāyukanti
tika-abh07t0:1296_1: paṭisandhito paraṃ bhavanikantivasena pavattamanodvārikacittavīthito paṭṭhāya cuticittāvasānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1296_2: tato pubbe pavattabhavaṅgāvasānaṃ vā abbocchinnā asati nirodhasamāpattiyanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1300_0: 1. Ettāvatā vīthisaṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni vīthimuttasaṅgahaṃ dassetumārabhanto āha
tika-abh07t0:1300_2: aparabhāge cutipariyosānaṃ pavattisaṅgaho nāma saṅgaho udīrito, idāni tadanantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1300_3: sandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikāle, tadāsannatāya taṃgahaṇeneva gahitacutikāle ca pavattisaṅgaho vuccatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1302_0: 3. Puññasammatā ayā yebhuyyena apagatoti apāyo, soyeva bhūmi bhavanti ettha sattāti
tika-abh07t0:1302_1: apāyabhūmi. Anekavidhasampattiadhiṭṭhānatāya sobhanā gantabbato upapajjitabbato gatīti
tika-abh07t0:1302_2: sugati, kāmataṇhāsahacaritā sugati kāmasugati, sāyeva bhūmīti kāmasugatibhūmi. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh07t0:1303_0: 4. Ayato sukhato niggatoti nirayo. Tiro añcitāti tiracchānā, tesaṃ yoni tiracchānayoni.
tika-abh07t0:1303_1: Yavanti tāya sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā viya hontīti yoni. Sā pana atthato
tika-abh07t0:1303_2: khandhānaṃ pavattiviseso. Pakaṭṭhena sukhato itā gatāti petā, nijjhāmataṇhikādibhedānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1303_3: petānaṃ visayo pettivisayo. Ettha pana tiracchānayonipettivisayaggahaṇena khandhānaṃyeva
tika-abh07t0:1303_4: gahaṇaṃ tesaṃ tādisassa paricchinnokāsassa abhāvato. Yattha vā te araññapabbatapādādike
tika-abh07t0:1303_5: nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti, tādisassa ṭhānassa vasena okāsopi gahetabbo. Na suranti issariyakīḷādīhi
tika-abh07t0:1303_6: na dibbantīti asurā, petāsurā. Itare pana na surā surappaṭipakkhāti asurā, idha ca
tika-abh07t0:1303_7: petāsurānameva gahaṇaṃ itaresaṃ tāvatiṃsesu gahaṇassa icchitattā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ācariyena –
tika-abh07t0:1305_1: manussā. Tathā hi paramasatinepakkādippattā buddhādayopi manussabhūtāyeva. Jambudīpavāsino
tika-abh07t0:1305_2: cettha nippariyāyato manussā. Tehi pana samānarūpāditāya saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi
tika-abh07t0:1305_3: itaramahādīpavāsinopi “manussā”ti vuccanti. Lokiyā pana “manuno ādikhattiyassa apaccaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1305_4: puttāti manussā”ti vadanti. Manussānaṃ nivāsabhūtā bhūmi idha manussā. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh07t0:1306_0: Catūsu mahārājesu bhatti etesaṃ, catunnaṃ vā mahārājānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānabhūte cātumahārāje
tika-abh07t0:1306_1: bhavāti cātumahārājikā. Māghena māṇavena saddhiṃ tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti
tika-abh07t0:1306_2: taṃsahacaritaṭṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ, tadeva tāvatiṃsaṃ, taṃnivāso etesanti tāvatiṃsāti
tika-abh07t0:1306_3: vadanti. Yasmā pana “sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsāna”nti vacanato
tika-abh07t0:1306_4: sesacakkavāḷesupi chakāmāvacaradevalokā atthi, tasmā nāmamattameva etaṃ tassa devalokassāti
tika-abh07t0:1306_5: gahetabbaṃ. Dukkhato yātā apayātāti yāmā. Attano sirisampattiyā tusaṃ pītiṃ itā gatāti
tika-abh07t0:1306_6: tusitā. Nimmāne rati etesanti nimmānaratino. Paranimmitesu bhogesu attano vasaṃ vattentīti
tika-abh07t0:1307_0: 7. Mahābrahmānaṃ paricārikattā tesaṃ parisati bhavāti brahmapārisajjā. Tesaṃ purohitaṭṭhāne
tika-abh07t0:1307_1: ṭhitattā brahmapurohitā. Tehi tehi jhānādīhi guṇavisesehi brūhitā parivuddhāti brahmāno,
tika-abh07t0:1307_2: vaṇṇavantatāya ceva dīghāyukatādīhi ca brahmapārisajjādīhi mahantā brahmānoti mahābrahmāno.
tika-abh07t0:1308_0: 8. Uparimehi parittā ābhā etesanti parittābhā. Appamāṇā ābhā etesanti appamāṇābhā.
tika-abh07t0:1308_1: Valāhakato vijju viya ito cito ca ābhā sarati nissarati etesaṃ sappītikajjhānanibbattakkhandhasantānattāti
tika-abh07t0:1308_2: ābhassarā. Daṇḍadīpikāya vā acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī
tika-abh07t0:1308_3: viya sarati nissaratīti ābhassarā. Yathāvuttāya vā pabhāya ābhāsanasīlāti ābhassarā.
tika-abh07t0:1309_0: 9. Subhāti ekagghanā acalā sarīrābhā vuccati, sā uparibrahmehi parittā etesanti parittasubhā.
tika-abh07t0:1309_1: Appamāṇā subhā etesanti appamāṇasubhā. Pabhāsamudayasaṅkhātehi subhehi kiṇṇā ākiṇṇāti
tika-abh07t0:1309_2: subhakiṇhā. “Subhākiṇṇā”ti ca vattabbe ā-saddassa rassattaṃ, antimaṇa-kārassa ca
tika-abh07t0:1310_1: natthi saññā, taṃmukhena vuttāvasesā arūpakkhandhā ca etesanti asaññā. Teyeva sattāti
tika-abh07t0:1310_3: āvāsāti suddhāvāsā. Anunayapaṭighābhāvato vā suddho āvāso etesanti suddhāvāsā, tesaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1311_0: 11. Imesu pana paṭhamatalavāsino appakena kālena attano ṭhānaṃ na vijahantīti avihā.
tika-abh07t0:1311_1: Dutiyatalavāsino na kenaci tappantīti atappā. Tatiyatalavāsino paramasundararūpattā
tika-abh07t0:1311_2: sukhena dissantīti sudassā. Catutthatalavāsino suparisuddhadassanattā sukhena passantīti
tika-abh07t0:1311_3: sudassino. Pañcamatalavāsino pana ukkaṭṭhasampattikattā natthi etesaṃ kaniṭṭhabhāvoti akaniṭṭhā.
tika-abh07t0:1312: 12. Ākāsānañcāyatane pavattā paṭhamāruppavipākabhūtacatukkhandhā eva, tehi paricchinnaokāso vā ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh07t0:1313: 13. Puthujjanā, sotāpannā ca sakadāgāmino cāpi puggalā suddhāvāsesu sabbathā na labbhantīti sambandho. Puthujjanādīnañca paṭikkhepena anāgāmiarahantānameva tattha lābho vutto hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1314: 14. Sesaṭṭhānesūti suddhāvāsaapāyaasaññivajjitesu sesaṭṭhānesu ariyā, anariyāpi ca labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:1318_0: 17. Jātiyā andho jaccandho. Kiñcāpi jātikkhaṇe aṇḍajajalābujā sabbepi acakkhukāva.
tika-abh07t0:1318_2: dinnapaṭisandhinā, itarenapi vā kammena anuppādetabbacakkhuko satto jaccandho nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1318_3: Apare pana “jaccandhoti pasūtiyaṃyeva andho, mātukucchiyaṃ andho hutvā nikkhantoti
tika-abh07t0:1318_4: attho, tena duhetukatihetukānaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ cakkhussa avipajjanaṃ siddha”nti vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:1318_6: saṅgaho. Apare pana “ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikā
tika-abh07t0:1318_7: honti, tādisānampi ādisaddena saṅgaho”ti vadanti. Bhummadeve sitā nissitā taggatikattāti
tika-abh07t0:1320: 21. Tesūti yathāvuttapaṭisandhiyuttesu puggalesu, apāyādīsu vā. Āyuppamāṇagaṇanāya niyamo natthi kesañci cirāyukattā, kesañci ciratarāyukattā ca. Tathācāhu –
tika-abh07t0:1325_0: Apāyesu hi kammameva pamāṇaṃ, tattha nibbattānaṃ yāva kammaṃ nakhīyati. Tāva cavanābhāvato,
tika-abh07t0:1325_1: tathā bhummadevānaṃ. Tesupi hi nibbattā keci sattāhādikālaṃ tiṭṭhanti, keci kappamattampi,
tika-abh07t0:1325_2: tathā manussānampi kadāci tesampi asaṅkhyeyyāyukattā kadāci dasavassāyukattā. “Yo
tika-abh07t0:1325_3: ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ jīvati, appaṃ vā bhiyyo, dutiyaṃ vassasataṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti
tika-abh07t0:1326: 22. Dibbāni pañcavassasatānīti manussānaṃ paññāsa vassāni ekadinaṃ, tadanurūpato māsasaṃvacchare paricchinditvā dibbappamāṇāni pañcavassasatāni āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-abh07t0:1330_0: Manussagaṇanāyāti manussānaṃ saṃvaccharagaṇanāya. Tato catugguṇanti cātumahārājikānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1330_1: paññāsamānussakavassaparimitaṃ divasaṃ, dibbāni ca pañcavassasatāni diguṇaṃ katvā
tika-abh07t0:1330_3: catugguṇaṃ, taṃ pana dibbagaṇanāya vassasahassaṃ, manussagaṇanāya saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikatikoṭippamāṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1330_4: hoti. Tato catugguṇaṃ yāmānanti tāvatiṃsānamāyuppamāṇato vuttanayena catugguṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1330_6: vassakoṭiyo honti. Tato catugguṇaṃ tusitānanti dibbāni cattāri vassasahassāni, manussagaṇanāya
tika-abh07t0:1330_7: saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikā sattapaññāsa vassakoṭiyo. Tato catugguṇaṃ nimmānaratīnanti
tika-abh07t0:1330_8: dibbāni aṭṭhavassasahassāni, manussagaṇanāya dve vassakoṭisatāni cattālīsavassasatasahassādhikā
tika-abh07t0:1330_9: tiṃsa vassakoṭiyo ca. Tato catugguṇaṃ paranimmitavasavattīnanti dibbāni soḷasa vassasahassāni.
tika-abh07t0:1331_0: 23. Manussagaṇanaṃ pana sayameva dassento āha “navasatañcā”tyādi. Vassānaṃ sambandhi
tika-abh07t0:1331_1: navasataṃ ekavīsa koṭiyo, tathā saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni vasavattīsu āyuppamāṇanti sambandho.
tika-abh07t0:1332: 25. Dutiyajjhānabhūmiyanti catukkanayavasena vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ, cavanakāle ca tathārūpameva bhavaṅgacutivasena pavattitvā nirujjhatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1333_0: 29. Tesūti tāhi gahitapaṭisandhikesu brahmesu. Kappassāti asaṅkhyeyyakappassa. Na
tika-abh07t0:1333_1: hi brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahākappavasena āyuparicchedo sambhavati ekakappepi
tika-abh07t0:1333_2: tesaṃ avināsābhāvena paripuṇṇakappe asambhavato. Tathā hesa loko sattavāresu agginā
tika-abh07t0:1333_3: vinassati, aṭṭhame vāre udakena, puna sattavāresu agginā, aṭṭhame vāre udakenāti
tika-abh07t0:1333_4: evaṃ aṭṭhasu aṭṭhakesu paripuṇṇesu pacchime vāre vātena vinassati. Tattha paṭhamajjhānatalaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1333_5: upādāya agginā, dutiyatatiyajjhānatalaṃ upādāya udakena, catutthajjhānatalaṃ upādāya
tika-abh07t0:1335: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā.
tika-abh07t0:1338_0: Tasmā tiṇṇampi paṭhamajjhānatalānaṃ ekakappepi avināsābhāvato sakalakappe tesaṃ sambhavo
tika-abh07t0:1338_1: natthīti asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena tesaṃ āyuparicchedo daṭṭhabbo. Dutiyajjhānāditalato
tika-abh07t0:1338_2: paṭṭhāya pana paripuṇṇassa mahākappassa vasena, na asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena. Asaṅkhyeyyakappoti
tika-abh07t0:1338_3: ca yojanāyāmavitthārato setasāsaparāsito vassasatavassasataccayena ekekabījassa haraṇena
tika-abh07t0:1338_4: sāsaparāsino parikkhayepi akkhayasabhāvassa mahākappassa catutthabhāgo. So pana sattharogadubbhikkhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1338_6: dasavassato paṭṭhāya anukkamena asaṅkhyeyyāyukappamāṇesu sattesu puna asaddhammasamādānavasena
tika-abh07t0:1338_7: kamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukesu jātesu rogādīnaṃ aññatarasaṃvaṭṭena sattānaṃ vināsappattiyāva
tika-abh07t0:1338_8: “ayameko antarakappo”ti evaṃ paricchinnassa antarakappassa vasena catusaṭṭhiantarakappappamāṇo
tika-abh07t0:1340: 49. Ekamevāti bhūmito, jātito, sampayuttadhammato, saṅkhārato ca samānameva. Ekajātiyanti ekasmiṃ bhave.
tika-abh07t0:1343_0: 50. Idāni kammacatukkaṃ catūhākārehi dassetuṃ “janaka”ntyādi āraddhaṃ, janayatīti
tika-abh07t0:1343_1: janakaṃ. Upatthambhetīti upatthambhakaṃ. Upagantvā pīḷetīti upapīḷakaṃ. Upagantvā
tika-abh07t0:1344_0: Tattha paṭisandhipavattīsu vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ nibbattakā kusalākusalacetanā janakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1344_1: nāma. Sayaṃ vipākaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontampi kammantarassa cirataravipākanibbattane
tika-abh07t0:1344_2: paccayabhūtaṃ, vipākasseva vā sukhadukkhabhūtassa vicchedapaccayānuppattiyā, upabrūhanapaccayuppattiyā
tika-abh07t0:1344_5: yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ nāma. Dubbalassa pana kammassa janakasāmatthiyaṃ upahacca
tika-abh07t0:1344_6: vicchedakapaccayuppādanena tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ vipākanibbattakakammaṃ upaghātakaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1345_0: Janakopaghātakānañhi ayaṃ viseso – janakaṃ kammantarassa vipākaṃ anupacchinditvāva
tika-abh07t0:1345_1: vipākaṃ janeti, upaghātakaṃ upacchedanapubbakanti idaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1345_3: vipākaṃ antarantarā vibādhati. Upaghātakaṃ pana taṃ sabbaso upacchinditvā aññassa
tika-abh07t0:1345_4: okāsaṃ deti, na pana sayaṃ vipākanibbattakaṃ. Evañhi janakato imassa viseso supākaṭo”ti
tika-abh07t0:1346_0: 51. Garukanti mahāsāvajjaṃ, mahānubhāvañca aññena kammena paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyakammaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1346_1: Āsannanti maraṇakāle anussaritaṃ, tadā katañca. Āciṇṇanti abhiṇhaso kataṃ, ekavāraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1346_2: katvāpi vā abhiṇhaso samāsevitaṃ. Kaṭattākammanti garukādibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ katamattatoyeva
tika-abh07t0:1347_0: Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā, garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ akusalapakkhe mātughātakādikammaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1347_1: kusalapakkhe mahaggatakammaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati satipi āsannādikamme parittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1347_2: udakaṃ ottharitvā gacchanto mahogho viya. Tathā hi taṃ “garuka”nti vuccati. Tasmiṃ
tika-abh07t0:1347_3: asati dūrāsannesu yaṃ āsannaṃ maraṇakāle anussaritaṃ, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati,
tika-abh07t0:1347_4: āsannakāle kate vattabbameva natthi. Tasmimpi asati āciṇṇānāciṇṇesu ca yaṃ āciṇṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1347_5: susīlyaṃ vā, dussīlyaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Kaṭattākammaṃ pana laddhāsevanaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1347_6: purimānaṃ abhāvena paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhatīti garukaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Garuke
tika-abh07t0:1347_7: asati āsannaṃ, tasmimpi asati āciṇṇaṃ, tasmimpi asati kaṭattākammaṃ. Tenāha “pākadānapariyāyenā”ti,
tika-abh07t0:1347_8: vipākadānānukkamenātyattho. Abhidhammāvatārādīsu pana āsannato āciṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ vipaccantaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1347_9: katvā vuttaṃ. Yathā pana gogaṇaparipuṇṇassa vajassa dvāre vivaṭe aparabhāge dammagavabalavagavesu
tika-abh07t0:1347_10: santesupi yo vajadvārassa āsanno hoti, antamaso dubbalajaraggavopi, soyeva paṭhamataraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1347_11: nikkhamati, evaṃ garukato aññesu kusalākusalesu santesupi maraṇakālassa āsannattā
tika-abh07t0:1347_12: āsannameva paṭhamaṃ vipākaṃ detīti idha taṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1348_0: 52. Diṭṭhadhammo paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno attabhāvo, tattha veditabbaṃ vipākānubhavanavasenāti
tika-abh07t0:1348_1: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammato anantaraṃ upapajjitvā veditabbaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1348_2: Apare apare diṭṭhadhammato aññasmiṃ yattha katthaci attabhāve veditabbaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1348_3: Ahosi eva kammaṃ, na tassa vipāko ahosi, atthi, bhavissati cāti evaṃ vattabbakammaṃ ahosikammaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1349_0: Tattha paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāya, paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā
tika-abh07t0:1349_1: tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā hutvā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī
tika-abh07t0:1349_2: paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ nāma. Sā hi vuttappakārena balavajanasantāne
tika-abh07t0:1349_4: itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ, okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti
tika-abh07t0:1349_5: idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ ahetukaphalaṃ deti. Atthasādhikā pana
tika-abh07t0:1349_7: vipākadāyinī upapajjavedanīyaṃ nāma. Sā ca paṭisandhiṃ datvāva pavattivipākaṃ deti.
tika-abh07t0:1349_8: Paṭisandhiyā pana adinnāya pavattivipākaṃ detīti natthi. Cuti anantarañhi upapajjavedanīyassa
tika-abh07t0:1349_9: okāso. Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi pavattivipākaṃ detīti ācariyā. Yathāvuttakaāraṇavirahato
tika-abh07t0:1349_10: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādibhāvaṃ asampattā ādipariyosānacetanānaṃ majjhe pavattā pañca
tika-abh07t0:1349_11: cetanā vipākadānasabhāvassa anupacchinnattā yadā kadāci okāsalābhe sati paṭisandhipavattīsu
tika-abh07t0:1349_12: vipākaṃ abhinipphādentī aparāpariyavedaniyaṃ nāma. Sakasakakālātītaṃ pana purimakammadvayaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1349_13: tatiyampi ca saṃsārappavattiyā vocchinnāya ahosikammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1350_0: Pākakālavasenāti paccuppanne, tadanantare, yadā kadācīti evaṃ purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yathāparicchinnakālavasena,
tika-abh07t0:1350_1: itarassa taṃkālābhāvavasena ca. Ahosikammassa hi kālātikkamatova taṃ vohāro.
tika-abh07t0:1352_0: 54. Idāni akusalādikammānaṃ kāyakammadvārādivasena pavattiṃ, taṃniddesamukhena ca
tika-abh07t0:1352_1: tesaṃ pāṇātipātādivasena dasavidhādibhedañca dassetuṃ “tattha akusala”ntyādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1352_2: Kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Evaṃ vacīkammādīni.
tika-abh07t0:1353: 55. Pāṇassa saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā atīva pātanaṃ pāṇātipāto. Kāyavācāhi adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ. Methunavītikkamasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchā caraṇaṃ kāmesu micchācāro.
tika-abh07t0:1354_0: Tattha pāṇoti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ pāṇe pāṇasaññino
tika-abh07t0:1354_3: agantabbaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro nāma. Surāpānampi ettheva saṅgayhatīti
tika-abh07t0:1354_4: vadanti rasasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchācārabhāvato. Kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte kāyadvāreti
tika-abh07t0:1354_5: kāyena adhippāyaviññāpanato, sayañca kāyena viññeyyattā kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte abhikkamādijanakacittajavāyodhātvādhikakalāpassa
tika-abh07t0:1354_6: vikārabhūte santhambhanādīnaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūte copanakāyabhāvato, kammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato
tika-abh07t0:1355_0: Kiñcāpi hi taṃtaṃkammasahagatacittuppādeneva sā viññatti janīyati. Tathāpi tassā
tika-abh07t0:1355_1: tathā pavattamānāya taṃsamuṭṭhāpakakammassa kāyakammādivohāro hotīti sā tasseva pavattimukhabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1355_2: vattuṃ labbhati. “Kāyadvāre vuttito”ti ettakeyeva vutte “yadi evaṃ kammadvāravavatthānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1355_3: na siyā. Kāyadvāre hi pavattaṃ ‘kāyakamma’nti vuccati, kāyakammassa ca pavattimukhabhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1355_4: ‘kāyadvāra’nti. Pāṇātipātādikaṃ pana vācāya āṇāpentassa kāyakammaṃ vacīdvārepi pavattatīti
tika-abh07t0:1355_5: dvārena kammavavatthānaṃ na siyā, tathā musāvādādiṃ kāyavikārena karontassa vacīkammaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1355_6: kāyadvārepi pavattatīti kammena dvāravavatthānampi na siyā”ti ayaṃ codanā paccupaṭṭheyyāti
tika-abh07t0:1355_7: bāhullavuttiyā vavatthānaṃ dassetuṃ “bāhullavuttito”ti vuttaṃ. Kāyakammañhi kāyadvāreyeva
tika-abh07t0:1355_8: bahulaṃ pavattati, appaṃ vacīdvāre, tasmā kāyadvāreyeva bahulaṃ pavattanato kāyakammabhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1355_9: siddho vanacarakādīnaṃ vanacarakādibhāvo viya. Tathā kāyakammameva yebhuyyena kāyadvāre
tika-abh07t0:1355_10: pavattati, na itarāni, tasmā kāyakammassa yebhuyyena ettheva pavattanato kāyakammadvārabhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1355_11: siddho brāhmaṇagāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādibhāvo viyāti natthi kammadvāravavatthāne koci
tika-abh07t0:1356_0: 56. Musāti abhūtaṃ vatthu, taṃ tacchato vadanti etenāti musāvādo. Pisati sāmaggiṃ
tika-abh07t0:1356_1: sañcuṇṇeti vikkhipati, piyabhāvaṃ suññaṃ karotīti vā pisuṇā. Attānampi parampi pharusaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1356_2: karoti, kakaco viya kharasamphassāti vā pharusā. Saṃ sukhaṃ, hitañca phalati visarati
tika-abh07t0:1356_3: vināsetīti samphaṃ, attano, paresañca anupakāraṃ yaṃ kiñci, taṃ palapati etenāti samphappalāpo.
tika-abh07t0:1357_0: Tattha abhūtaṃ vatthuṃ bhūtato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathā viññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-abh07t0:1357_1: cetanā musāvādo. So parassa atthabhedakarova kammapatho hoti, itaro kammameva. Paresaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1357_3: pisuṇavācā, sāpi dvīsu bhinnesuyeva kammapatho. Parassa mammacchedakaravacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-abh07t0:1357_4: ekantapharusacetanā pharusavācā. Na hi cittasaṇhatāya sati pharusavācā nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1357_6: so pana parehi tasmiṃ anatthe gahiteyeva kammapatho. Vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacīdvāreti
tika-abh07t0:1357_7: vācāya adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, sayañca vācāya viññāyatīti vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacībhedakarappayogasamuṭṭhāpakacittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātvādhikakalāpassa
tika-abh07t0:1357_8: vikārabhūte copanavācābhāvato, kammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato ca vacīdvārasaṅkhāte
tika-abh07t0:1358: 57. Parasampattiṃ abhimukhaṃ jhāyati lobhavasena cintetīti abhijjhā. Byāpajjati hitasukhaṃ etenāti byāpādo. Micchā viparītato passatīti micchādiṭṭhi.
tika-abh07t0:1359_0: Tattha “aho vata idaṃ mama siyā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanaṃ abhijjhā, sā parabhaṇḍassa
tika-abh07t0:1359_1: attano nāmaneneva kammapatho hoti. “Aho vatāyaṃ satto vinasseyyā”ti evaṃ manopadoso
tika-abh07t0:1359_2: byāpādo. “Natthi dinna”ntyādinā nayena viparītadassanaṃ micchādiṭṭhi. Ettha pana
tika-abh07t0:1359_4: papañco tattha tattha āgatanayena daṭṭhabbo. Aññatrāpi viññattiyāti kāyavacīviññattiṃ
tika-abh07t0:1359_5: vināpi, taṃ asamuṭṭhāpetvāpītyattho. Viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittasampayuttā cettha abhijjhādayo
tika-abh07t0:1360_1: vā jāyanti, na lobhamūlādīhi. Hasamānāpi hi rājāno dosacitteneva pāṇavadhaṃ āṇāpenti,
tika-abh07t0:1360_2: tathā pharusavācābyāpādesupi yathārahaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Micchādassanassa abhinivisitabbavatthūsu
tika-abh07t0:1360_3: lobhapubbaṅgamameva abhinivisanato āha “micchādiṭṭhi ca lobhamūlenā”ti. Sesāni cattāripi
tika-abh07t0:1360_4: dvīhi mūlehi sambhavantīti yo tāva abhimataṃ vatthuṃ, anabhimataṃ vā attabandhuparittāṇādippayojanaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1360_5: sandhāya harati, tassa adinnādānaṃ lobhamūlena hoti. Veraniyyātanatthaṃ harantassa
tika-abh07t0:1360_6: dosamūlena. Nītipāṭhakappamāṇato duṭṭhaniggahaṇatthaṃ parasantakaṃ harantānaṃ rājūnaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1360_7: brāhmaṇānañca “sabbamidaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ rājūhi dinnaṃ, tesaṃ pana sabbadubbalabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1360_8: aññe paribhuñjanti, attasantakameva brāhmaṇā paribhuñjantī”tyādīni vatvā sakasaññāya
tika-abh07t0:1360_9: evaṃ yaṃ kiñci harantānaṃ, kammaphalasambandhāpavādīnañca mohamūlena. Evaṃ musāvādādīsupi
tika-abh07t0:1361_0: 63. Chasu ārammaṇesu tividhakammavasena uppajjamānampetaṃ tividhaniyamena uppajjatīti
tika-abh07t0:1361_1: āha “tathā dānasīlabhāvanāvasenā”ti. Dasadhā niddisiyamānānaṃ hi dvinnaṃ, puna dvinnaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1361_2: tiṇṇañca yathākkamaṃ dānādīsu tīsveva saṅgaho. Kāraṇaṃ panettha parato vakkhāma.
tika-abh07t0:1361_3: Chaḷārammaṇesu pana tividhakammadvāresu ca nesaṃ pavattiyojanā aṭṭhakathādīsu āgatanayena gahetabbā.
tika-abh07t0:1362_0: 65. Dīyati etenāti dānaṃ, pariccāgacetanā. Evaṃ sesesupi. Sīlatīti sīlaṃ, kāyavacīkammāni
tika-abh07t0:1362_1: samādahati, sammā ṭhapetītyattho, sīlayati vā upadhāretīti sīlaṃ, upadhāraṇaṃ panettha
tika-abh07t0:1362_2: kusalānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tyādi. Bhāveti kusale
tika-abh07t0:1362_3: dhamme āsevati vaḍḍheti etāyāti bhāvanā. Apacāyati pūjāvasena sāmīciṃ karoti etenāti
tika-abh07t0:1362_4: apacāyanaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe byāvaṭassa bhāvo veyyāvaccaṃ. Attano santāne nibbattā
tika-abh07t0:1362_5: patti dīyati etenāti pattidānaṃ. Pattiṃ anumodati etāyāti pattānumodanā. Dhammaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1362_6: suṇanti etenāti dhammassavanaṃ. Dhammaṃ desenti etāyāti dhammadesanā. Diṭṭhiyā ujukaraṇaṃ diṭṭhijukammaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1363_1: dānaṃ nāma, dānavatthupariyesanavasena, dinnassa somanassacittena anussaraṇavasena
tika-abh07t0:1363_2: ca pavattā pubbapacchābhāgacetanā ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchanti. Evaṃ sesesupi yathārahaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1363_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Niccasīlādivasena pañca, aṭṭha, dasa vā sīlāni samādiyantassa, paripūrentassa,
tika-abh07t0:1363_5: saṃvaraṃ samādiyantassa, catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paripūrentassa ca pavattacetanā sīlaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1363_6: nāma. Cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu, khandhādīsu ca bhūmīsu parikammasammasanavasappavattā
tika-abh07t0:1363_7: appanaṃ appattā gotrabhupariyosānacetanā bhāvanā nāma, niravajjavijjādipariyāpuṇanacetanāpi
tika-abh07t0:1364_0: Vayasā, guṇehi ca jeṭṭhānaṃ cīvarādīsu paccāsārahitena asaṃkiliṭṭhajjhāsayena paccuṭṭhānaāsanābhinīhārādividhinā
tika-abh07t0:1364_1: bahumānakaraṇacetanā apacāyanaṃ nāma. Tesameva, gilānānañca yathāvuttajjhāsayena
tika-abh07t0:1364_2: taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇacetanā veyyāvaccaṃ nāma. Attano santāne nibbattassa puññassa parehi
tika-abh07t0:1364_3: sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ paccāsīsanacetanā pattidānaṃ nāma. Parehi dinnassa, adinnassapi vā
tika-abh07t0:1364_4: puññassa maccheramalavinissaṭena cittena abbhānumodanacetanā pattānumodanā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1364_5: Evamimaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tattha vuttanayena paṭipajjanto “lokiyalokuttaraguṇavisesassa
tika-abh07t0:1364_6: bhāgī bhavissāmi, bahussuto vā hutvā paresaṃ dhammadesanādīhi anuggaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1364_7: attano, paresaṃ vā hitapharaṇavasappavattena asaṃkiliṭṭhajjhāsayena hitūpadesasavanacetanā
tika-abh07t0:1364_8: dhammassavanaṃ nāma, niravajjavijjādisavanacetanāpi ettheva saṅgayhati. Lābhasakkārādinirapekkhatāya
tika-abh07t0:1364_9: yoniso manasi karoto hitūpadesacetanā dhammadesanā nāma, niravajjavijjādiupadisanacetanāpi
tika-abh07t0:1365_0: Yadi evaṃ ñāṇavippayuttacittuppādassa diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyabhāvo na labbhatīti?
tika-abh07t0:1365_1: No na labbhati purimapacchimacetanānampi taṃtaṃpuññakiriyāsveva saṅgaṇhanato. Kiñcāpi
tika-abh07t0:1365_2: hi ujukaraṇavelāyaṃ ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti, purimapacchābhāge pana ñāṇavippayuttampi
tika-abh07t0:1366_0: Imesu pana dasasu pattidānānumodanā dāne saṅgahaṃ gacchanti taṃsabhāvattā. Dānampi
tika-abh07t0:1366_1: hi issāmaccherānaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ, etepi. Tasmā samānappaṭipakkhatāya ekalakkhaṇattā
tika-abh07t0:1366_4: saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ. Apare pana “desento, suṇanto
tika-abh07t0:1366_5: ca desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjha paṭivijjha deseti, suṇāti ca,
tika-abh07t0:1366_6: tāni ca desanāsavanāni paṭivedhamevāharantīti desanāsavanābhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti
tika-abh07t0:1366_7: vadanti. Dhammadānasabhāvato desanā dānamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatītipi sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1366_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sabbadānaṃ dhammadānaṃ jinātī”ti. Tathā diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbatthāpi
tika-abh07t0:1366_9: sabbesaṃ niyamanalakkhaṇattā. Dānādīsu hi yaṃ kiñci “atthi dinna”ntyādinayappavattāya
tika-abh07t0:1366_10: sammādiṭṭhiyā visodhitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ, evañca katvā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1366_11: “diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbesaṃ niyamalakkhaṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ dānasīlabhāvanāvasena tīsu
tika-abh07t0:1366_12: itaresaṃ saṅgaṇhanato saṅkhepato tividhameva puññakiriyavatthu hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1367_1: rūpāvacarakusalaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ dānādivasena appavattanato. Appanāppattaṃ pubbabhāgappavattānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1368: 68. Ārammaṇabhedenāti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ, ākāsavisayaṃ mano, tadabhāvo, tadālambaṃ viññāṇanti catubbidhanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ bhedena.
tika-abh07t0:1369_0: 69. Etthāti imesu pākaṭṭhānavasena catubbidhesu kammesu. Uddhaccarahitanti uddhaccasahagatacetanārahitaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1369_1: ekādasavidhaṃ akusalakammaṃ. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ adhimokkhavirahena sabbadubbalampi
tika-abh07t0:1369_2: vicikicchāsahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati, adhimokkhasampayogena tato balavantampi
tika-abh07t0:1369_4: dubbalaṃ nākaḍḍhatīti hi ayaṃ vicāraṇā paṭisandhidānasabhāvesuyeva. Yassa pana paṭisandhidānasabhāvoyeva
tika-abh07t0:1369_5: natthi, na tassa balavabhāvo paṭisandhiākaḍḍhane kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1370_0: Kathaṃ panetaṃ viññātabbaṃ uddhaccasahagatassa paṭisandhidānasabhāvo natthīti? Dassanenapahātabbesu
tika-abh07t0:1370_1: anāgatattā. Tividhā hi akusalā dassanena pahātabbā, bhāvanāya pahātabbā, siyā dassanena
tika-abh07t0:1370_3: dassanena pahātabbā nāma paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanavasena “dassana”nti laddhanāmena
tika-abh07t0:1370_4: sotāpattimaggena pahātabbattā. Uddhaccasahagatacittuppādo bhāvanāya pahātabbo nāma
tika-abh07t0:1370_5: aggamaggena pahātabbattā. Uparimaggattayañhi paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhanibbāne bhāvanāvasena
tika-abh07t0:1370_7: siyā dassanena pahātabbā, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbā tesaṃ apāyanibbattakāvatthāya
tika-abh07t0:1370_8: paṭhamamaggena, sesabahalābahalāvatthāya uparimaggehi pahīyamānattā. Tattha siyā
tika-abh07t0:1370_9: dassanena pahātabbampi dassanena pahātabbasāmaññena idha “dassanena pahātabba”nti voharanti.
tika-abh07t0:1371_0: Yadi ca uddhaccasahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ dadeyya, tadā akusalapaṭisandhiyā sugatiyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1371_1: asambhavato apāyesveva dadeyya. Apāyagamanīyañca avassaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh07t0:1371_2: Itarathā apāyagamanīyassa appahīnattā sekkhānaṃ apāyuppatti āpajjati, na ca panetaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1371_3: yuttaṃ “catūhapāyehi ca vippamutto, avinipātadhammo”ti ādivacanehi saha virujjhanato.
tika-abh07t0:1371_4: Sati ca panetassa dassanena pahātabbabhāve “siyā dassanena pahātabbā”ti imassa vibhaṅge
tika-abh07t0:1371_5: vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca panetaṃ vuttanti. Atha siyā “apāyagāminiyo rāgo doso moho tadekaṭṭhā
tika-abh07t0:1371_6: ca kilesā”ti evaṃ dassanena pahātabbesu vuttattā uddhaccasahagatacetanāya tattha
tika-abh07t0:1371_7: saṅgaho sakkā vattunti. Taṃ na, tassa ekantato bhāvanāya pahātabbabhāvena vuttattā.
tika-abh07t0:1371_8: Vuttañhetaṃ – “katame dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbā? Uddhaccasahagato cittuppādo”ti,
tika-abh07t0:1371_9: tasmā dassanena pahātabbesu avacanaṃ imassa paṭisandhidānābhāvaṃ sādheti. Nanu ca
tika-abh07t0:1372_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1372_1: rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā, yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha tasmiṃ samaye phasso
tika-abh07t0:1372_2: hoti…pe… avikkhepo hoti, ime dhammā akusalā. Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā,
tika-abh07t0:1373_0: Evaṃ uddhaccasahagatacittuppādaṃ uddharitvā tassa vipākopi uddhaṭoti kathamassa paṭisandhidānābhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1373_1: sampaṭicchitabboti? Nāyaṃ paṭisandhidānaṃ sandhāya uddhaṭo. Atha kho pavattivipākaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1374_0: “Sahajātā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh07t0:1374_1: nānākkhaṇikā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ, kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1375_1: “sahajātā bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti
tika-abh07t0:1375_2: bhāvanāya pahātabbacetanāya sahajātakammapaccayabhāvova uddhaṭo, na pana nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo,

tika-abh07t0:1375_5: na deti paṭṭhāne nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā”ti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1375_8: Yadi hi pavattivipākaṃ sandhāya nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vucceyya, tadā paṭisandhivipākampissa
tika-abh07t0:1375_10: na vutto, tasmā na sakkā tassa pavattivipākaṃ nivāretuṃ. Tenāha “pavattiyaṃ panā”tyādi.

tika-abh07t0:1375_12: na bhāvanāya pahātabbampi, tesu bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ sekkhasantānappavattaṃ, itaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1375_14: evaṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ dvidhā vibhajitvā ekassa ubhayavipākadānaṃ, ekassa sabbathāpi
tika-abh07t0:1375_15: vipākābhāvaṃ vaṇṇenti. Yo panettha tesaṃ vinicchayo, yañca tassa nirākaraṇaṃ, yañca
tika-abh07t0:1375_16: sabbathāpi vipākābhāvavādīnaṃ matapaṭikkhepanaṃ idha avuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ paramatthamañjūsādīsu,
tika-abh07t0:1375_17: visesato ca abhidhammatthavikāsiniyā nāma abhidhammāvatārasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1376_0: Sabbatthāpi kāmaloketi sugatiduggativasena sabbasmimpi kāmaloke. Yathārahanti dvārārammaṇānurūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1376_1: Apāyesupi yaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ mahāsampattivisayaṃ vipākaviññāṇaṃ, yañca nirayavāsīnaṃ

tika-abh07t0:1376_3: Na hi akusalassa iṭṭhavipāko sambhavati. Vuttañhetaṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso,

tika-abh07t0:1376_5: ahetukavipākāni janeti. Aññabhūmikassa ca kammassa aññabhūmikavipākābhāvato kāmavirāgabhāvanāya
tika-abh07t0:1376_7: rūpāvacarakammena ahetukavipākuppattiyā abhāvato rūpalokepi yathārahaṃ rūpādivisayāni
tika-abh07t0:1377_0: 71. Evaṃ pana vipaccantaṃ kammaṃ soḷasakadvādasakaaṭṭhakavasena tidhā vipaccatīti
tika-abh07t0:1377_1: dassetuṃ “tatthāpi”tyādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāpīti evaṃ vipaccamānepi kusalakamme. Ukkaṭṭhanti

tika-abh07t0:1377_5: vā “dukkaṭametaṃ mayā”ti vippaṭisāruppādanena paribhāvitaṃ, taṃ omakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1378_0: Paṭisandhinti ekameva paṭisandhiṃ. Na hi ekena kammena anekāsu jātīsu paṭisandhi
tika-abh07t0:1378_1: hoti, pavattivipāko pana jātisatepi jātisahassepi hoti. Yathāha “tiracchānagate dānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1378_2: datvā sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti. Yasmā panettha ñāṇaṃ jaccandhādivipattinimittassa
tika-abh07t0:1378_3: mohassa, sabbākusalasseva vā paṭipakkhaṃ, tasmā taṃsampayuttaṃ kammaṃ jaccandhādivipattipaccayaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1378_4: na hotīti tihetukaṃ atidubbalampi samānaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhimeva ākaḍḍhati, nāhetukaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1378_5: Duhetukañca kammaṃ ñāṇasampayogābhāvato ñāṇaphaluppādane asamatthaṃ, yathā taṃ alobhasampayogābhāvato
tika-abh07t0:1378_6: alobhaphaluppādane asamatthaṃ akusalakammanti taṃ atiukkaṭṭhampi samānaṃ duhetukameva
tika-abh07t0:1378_7: paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati, na tihetukanti vuttaṃ “tihetukamomakaṃ duhetukamukkaṭṭhañcā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1379_0: Ettha siyā – yathā paṭisambhidāmagge “gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1379_1: paccayā upapatti hotī”ti kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ, nikantikkhaṇe dvinnaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1379_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe tiṇṇañca hetūnaṃ vasena aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇasampayuttūpapatti,
tika-abh07t0:1379_3: tathā “gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti javanakkhaṇe
tika-abh07t0:1379_4: dvinnaṃ, nikantikkhaṇe dvinnaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvinnañca hetūnaṃ vasena channaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1379_5: hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇavippayuttūpapatti vuttā, evaṃ “gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte
tika-abh07t0:1379_6: sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti tihetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhiyā avuttattā
tika-abh07t0:1379_9: dātabbattā, kammasarikkhakavipākadassatthaṃ pana mahātherena sāvaseso pāṭho kato.
tika-abh07t0:1379_10: Itarathā “catunnaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā”ti vacanābhāvato duhetukakammena ahetukūpapattiyāpiabhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1379_11: āpajjati, tasmā yathā sugatiyaṃ jaccandhabadhirādivipattiyā ahetukūpapattiṃ vajjetvā
tika-abh07t0:1379_12: gatisampattiyā sahetukūpapattidassanatthaṃ duhetukūpapatti eva uddhaṭā, na ahetukūpapatti,
tika-abh07t0:1379_13: evaṃ kammasarikkhakavipākadassanatthaṃ tihetukakammena tihetukūpapatti eva uddhaṭā,
tika-abh07t0:1379_14: na duhetukūpapatti, na pana alabbhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

tika-abh07t0:1381_2: asaṅkhārikacatukkavajjitāni ca dvādasa vipākāni, tathā tihetukomakassa, duhetukukkaṭṭhassa

tika-abh07t0:1382_0: 75. Parito attaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ viya appānubhāvanti parittaṃ. Pakaṭṭhabhāvaṃ nītanti paṇītaṃ,

tika-abh07t0:1386_0: 84. Pañcamajjhānaṃ bhāvetvāti abhiññābhāvaṃ asampattaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ tividhampi

tika-abh07t0:1386_3: tattha vitthārato ca abhidhammatthavikāsiniyaṃ vuttanayena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saññāvirāgaṃ

tika-abh07t0:1386_8: kammakiriyavādino titthiyā evātyadhippāyo. Te pana yena iriyāpathena idha maranti.

tika-abh07t0:1387_1: pacchāpi vā pañcamajjhānaṃ tividhampi bhāvetvā saddhādiindriyavemattatānukkamena

tika-abh07t0:1388_7: Te pana aññattha na nibbattantīti niyamo natthi. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ ācariyena –
tika-abh07t0:1391_0: Sukkhavipassakāpi panete maraṇakāle ekanteneva samāpattiṃ nibbattenti samādhimhi

tika-abh07t0:1397_8: nerayikānaṃ uttarakuruvāsīnaṃ kesañci devānañca na hoti. Tenāhu –
tika-abh07t0:1400_1: katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa yathopaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva
tika-abh07t0:1400_2: cutipariyosānānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, na kammakammanimittādayo. Upaladdhapubbanti

tika-abh07t0:1401_0: Kammabalenāti paṭisandhinibbattakassa kusalākusalakammassa ānubhāvena. Channaṃ dvārānanti
tika-abh07t0:1401_1: vakkhamānanayena yathāsambhavaṃ channaṃ upapattidvārānaṃ, yadi kusalakammaṃ vipaccati,
tika-abh07t0:1401_2: tadā parisuddhaṃ kusalacittaṃ pavattati, atha akusalakammaṃ, tadā upakkiliṭṭhaṃ akusalacittanti
tika-abh07t0:1401_3: āha “vipaccamānaka…pe… kiliṭṭhaṃ vā”ti. Tenāha bhagavā “nimittassādagadhitaṃ vā,
tika-abh07t0:1401_4: bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tiṭṭhati, anubyañjanassādagadhitaṃ vā, tasmiṃ ce
tika-abh07t0:1401_5: samaye kālaṃ karoti, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati, yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ upapajjeyya
tika-abh07t0:1401_6: nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti. Tatthoṇataṃ vāti tasmiṃ upapajjitabbabhave oṇataṃ
