tika-abh07t0:1401_8: bhavantare”ti ettha vuttanayena daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā “yathāraha”nti imināva so sakkā
tika-abh07t0:1401_9: saṅgahetunti “bāhullenā”ti iminā sahasā occhijjamānajīvitānaṃ saṇikaṃ marantānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1401_10: viya na abhikkhaṇamevāti dīpitanti viññāyati. Abhinavakaraṇavasenāti taṅkhaṇe kariyamānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1402_0: 91. Paccāsannamaraṇassāti ekavīthippamāṇāyukavasena, tato vā kiñci adhikāyukavasena
tika-abh07t0:1402_2: vā vīthicittānaṃ avasāne. Tattha “kāmabhavato cavitvā tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ tadārammaṇapariyosānāni,
tika-abh07t0:1402_3: sesānaṃ javanapariyosānānī”ti dhammānusāraṇiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhavaṅgakkhayevāti yadi ekajavanavīthito
tika-abh07t0:1402_4: adhikatarāyuseso siyā, tadā bhavaṅgāvasāne vā uppajjitvā nirujjhati. Atha ekacittakkhaṇāyuseso
tika-abh07t0:1402_5: siyā, tadā vīthicittāvasāne, tañca atītakammādivisayameva. “Tassānantaramevā”ti iminā
tika-abh07t0:1403_0: Yathārahanti kammakaraṇakālassa, vipākadānakālassa ca anurūpavasena. Atha vā vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1403_1: anusayavasena, javanasahajātavasena vā pavattianurūpatotyattho. Nanu ca “avijjānusayaparikkhittenā”tyādi
tika-abh07t0:1403_2: vuttaṃ. Javanasahajātānañca kathaṃ anusayabhāvoti? Nāyaṃ doso anusayasadisatāya tāsampi
tika-abh07t0:1403_3: anusayavohārabhāvato. Itarathā akusalakammasahajātānaṃ bhavataṇhāsahajātānaṃ vā cutiāsannajavanasahajātānañca
tika-abh07t0:1403_4: saṅgaho na siyā. Avijjāva appahīnaṭṭhena anusayanato pavattanato anusayo, tena parikkhittena
tika-abh07t0:1403_5: parivāritena. Taṇhānusayova mūlaṃ padhānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ imassāti taṇhānusayamūlako.
tika-abh07t0:1403_7: vā, tena janiyamānaṃ. Avijjāya hi paṭicchannādīnavavisaye taṇhā nāmeti, khipanakasaṅkhārasammatā
tika-abh07t0:1408_0: Sampayuttehi pariggayhamānanti attanā sampayuttehi phassādīhi dhammehi sampayuttapaccayādinā
tika-abh07t0:1408_1: parivāretvā gayhamānaṃ, sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena pubbaṅgamabhūtanti attanā sahajātānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1408_2: patiṭṭhānabhāvena padhānabhūtaṃ. “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasenāti
tika-abh07t0:1408_3: purimabhavantarassa, pacchimabhavantarassa ca aññamaññaṃ ekābaddhaṃ viya paṭisandahanavasena
tika-abh07t0:1408_4: uppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti, na ito gantvātyadhippāyo. Na hi purimabhavapariyāpanno
tika-abh07t0:1408_5: koci dhammo bhavantaraṃ saṅkamati, nāpi purimabhavapariyāpannahetūhi vinā uppajjati
tika-abh07t0:1409_0: 92. Mandaṃ hutvā pavattāni mandappavattāni. Paccuppannārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu manodvāre
tika-abh07t0:1409_2: paccuppannārammaṇatā labbhatīti manodvāre tāva paṭisandhiyā catunnaṃ bhavaṅgānañca,
tika-abh07t0:1409_3: pañcadvāre pana paṭisandhiyāva paccuppannārammaṇabhāvo labbhati. Tathā hi kassaci
tika-abh07t0:1409_4: manodvāre āpāthamāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ gatinimittaṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya
tika-abh07t0:1409_5: cittavīthiyā anantaraṃ cuticitte uppanne tadanantaraṃ pañcacittakkhaṇāyuke ārammaṇe
tika-abh07t0:1409_6: pavattāya paṭisandhiyā catunnaṃ bhavaṅgānaṃ, pañcadvāre ca ñātakādīhi upaṭṭhāpitesu
tika-abh07t0:1409_7: deyyadhammesu vaṇṇādike ārabbha yathārahaṃ pavattāya cittavīthiyā cuticittassa ca
tika-abh07t0:1409_8: anantaraṃ ekacittakkhaṇāyuke ārammaṇe pavattāya paṭisandhiyā paccuppannārammaṇe pavatti
tika-abh07t0:1409_9: upalabbhatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1409_12: yojetabbaṃ. Apare pana avisesato vaṇṇenti. Saccasaṅkhepepi tenevādhippāyena idaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-abh07t0:1411_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “gatinimittaṃ manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatī”ti vuttattā, tadārammaṇāya
tika-abh07t0:1411_1: ca pañcadvārikapaṭisandhiyā adassitattā, mūlaṭīkādīsu ca “kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1411_2: vaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa viya dibbacakkhussa viya ca manodvāreyeva gocarabhāvaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1411_3: gacchatī”ti niyametvā vuttattā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na sampaṭicchanti ācariyā. “Paccuppannañcā”ti
tika-abh07t0:1411_4: ettha gatinimittaṃ tāva paccuppannārammaṇaṃ yujjati, kammanimittaṃ pana paṭisandhijanakakammasseva
tika-abh07t0:1411_5: nimittabhūtaṃ adhippetanti kathaṃ tassa cutiāsannajavanehi gahitassa paccuppannabhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1411_6: sambhavati. Na hi tadeva ārammaṇupaṭṭhāpakaṃ, tadeva paṭisandhijanakaṃ bhaveyya upacitabhāvābhāvato
tika-abh07t0:1411_7: anassāditattā ca. “Katattā upacitattā”ti hi vacanato punappunaṃ laddhāsevanameva
tika-abh07t0:1411_8: kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati. Paṭisambhidāmagge ca nikantikkhaṇe dvinnaṃ hetūnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1411_9: paccayāpi sahetukapaṭisandhiyā vuttattākatūpacitampi kammaṃ taṇhāya assāditameva
tika-abh07t0:1411_10: vipākaṃ abhinipphādeti, tadā ca paṭisandhiyā samānavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni cutiāsannajavanāni
tika-abh07t0:1411_11: kathaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanāni siyuṃ, kathañca tāni tadā kaṇhāya parāmaṭṭhāni.
tika-abh07t0:1411_12: Apica paccuppannaṃ kammanimittaṃ cutiāsannappavattānaṃ pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1411_13: hoti. “Pañcadvārikakammañca paṭisandhinimittakaṃ na hoti paridubbalabhāvato”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1411_14: vuttanti saccametaṃ. Ñātakādīhi upaṭṭhāpitesu pana pupphādīsu sannihitesveva maraṇasambhavato
tika-abh07t0:1411_15: tattha vaṇṇādikaṃ ārabbha cutiāsannavīthito purimabhāgappavattānaṃ paṭisandhijananasamatthānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1411_16: manodvārikajavanānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtena saha samānattā tadekasantatipatitaṃ cutiāsannajavanaggahitampi
tika-abh07t0:1411_17: paccuppannaṃ vaṇṇādikaṃ kammanimittabhāvena vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ ānandācariyena
tika-abh07t0:1413_0: 98. Āruppacutiyā paraṃ heṭṭhimāruppavajjitā āruppapaṭisandhiyo honti uparūpariarūpīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1413_1: heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimakammassa anāyūhanato, upacārajjhānassa pana balavabhāvato tassa vipākabhūtā
tika-abh07t0:1413_2: kāmatihetukā paṭisandhiyo honti. Rūpāvacaracutiyā paraṃ ahetukarahitā upacārajjhānānubhāveneva
tika-abh07t0:1413_3: duhetukatihetukapaṭisandhiyo siyuṃ, kāmatihetumhā cutito paraṃ sabbā eva kāmarūpārūpabhavapariyāpannā
tika-abh07t0:1413_4: yathārahaṃ ahetukādipaṭisandhiyo siyuṃ. Itaro duhetukāhetukacutito paraṃ kāmesveva
tika-abh07t0:1415_0: 99. Paṭisandhiyā nirodhassa anantarato paṭisandhinirodhānantarato. Tadeva cittanti
tika-abh07t0:1415_1: taṃsadisatāya tabbohārappavattattā tadeva cittaṃ yathā “tāniyeva osadhānī”ti. Asati
tika-abh07t0:1415_2: vīthicittuppādeti antarantarā vīthicittānaṃ uppāde asati, cuticittaṃ hutvā nirujjhati
tika-abh07t0:1417_0: 102. Yathā iha bhavepaṭisandhi ceva bhavaṅgañca vīthiyo ca cuti ca, tathā puna bhavantare
tika-abh07t0:1417_1: paṭisandhibhavaṅganti evamādikā ayaṃ cittasantati parivattatīti yojanā. Keci pana
tika-abh07t0:1417_4: atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ pavattisaṅgahadassanāvasāne tattha saṅgahitānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1417_5: sabbesameva nigamanassa adhippetattā. Evañhi sati “paṭisaṅkhāya panetamaddhuva”nti
tika-abh07t0:1417_6: ettha sabbesameva eta-saddena parāmasanaṃ suṭṭhu upapannaṃ hoti. Etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1417_7: vaṭṭapavattaṃ addhuvaṃ aniccaṃ palokadhammaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya paccavekkhitvā budhā paṇḍitā
tika-abh07t0:1417_8: cirāya cirakālaṃ subbatā hutvā accutaṃ dhuvaṃ acavanadhammaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigantvā
tika-abh07t0:1417_9: maggaphalañāṇena sacchikatvā tatoyeva suṭṭhu samucchinnasinehabandhanā samaṃ nirupadhisesanibbānadhātuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1421_0: 1. Evaṃ tāva cittacetasikavasena duvidhaṃ abhidhammatthaṃ dassetvā idāni rūpaṃ, tadanantarañca
tika-abh07t0:1421_2: tīhi paricchedehi vuttappabhedavanto, pavattipaṭisandhivasena dvīhi paricchedehi
tika-abh07t0:1421_3: vuttappavattivanto ca cittacetasikā dhammā ettāvatā pañcahi paricchedehi vibhattā
tika-abh07t0:1421_4: hi yasmā, idāni yathānuppattaṃ rūpaṃ pavuccatīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1422_1: Saṅkhepato uddisanaṃ samuddeso. Ekavidhādivasena vibhajanaṃ vibhāgo, samuṭṭhāti etasmā
tika-abh07t0:1422_2: phalanti samuṭṭhānaṃ, kammādayo rūpajanakapaccayā. Cakkhudasakādayo kalāpā. Pavattikkamato
tika-abh07t0:1424_0: 3. Upādinnānupādinnasantānesu sasambhāradhātuvasena mahantā hutvā bhūtā pātubhūtāti
tika-abh07t0:1424_1: mahābhūtā. Athavā anekavidhaabbhutavisesadassanena, anekābhūtadassanena vā mahantāni
tika-abh07t0:1424_2: abbhutāni, abhūtāni vā etesūti mahābhūtā, māyākārādayo. Tehi samānā sayaṃ anīlādisabhāvāneva
tika-abh07t0:1424_3: nīlādiupādāyarūpadassanāditoti mahābhūtā. Manāpavaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīhi vā sattānaṃ vañcikā
tika-abh07t0:1424_4: yakkhiniādayo viya manāpaitthipurisarūpadassanādinā sattānaṃ vañcakattā mahantāni
tika-abh07t0:1427_0: Atha vā mahantapātubhāvato mahantāni bhavanti etesu upādārūpāni, bhūtāni cāti mahābhūtāni.
tika-abh07t0:1427_1: Mahābhūte upādāya pavattaṃ rūpaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh07t0:1427_2: tato mahābhūtā”tyādivacanato ekekamahābhūtā sesamahābhūtānaṃ nissayā hontīti tesampi
tika-abh07t0:1427_4: Yañhi mahābhūte upādiyati, sayañca aññehi upādīyati. Na taṃ upādāyarūpaṃ. Yaṃ pana
tika-abh07t0:1427_5: upādīyateva, na kenaci upādīyati, tadeva upādāyarūpanti natthi bhūtānaṃ tabbohārappasaṅgo.
tika-abh07t0:1427_6: Apica catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpanti upādāyarūpalakkhaṇanti natthi tayo upādāya
tika-abh07t0:1428_0: 4. Pathanaṭṭhena pathavī, tarupabbatādīnaṃ pakatipathavī viya sahajātarūpānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1428_1: pakkhāyati, upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ hoti, pathavī eva dhātu salakkhaṇadhāraṇādito nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena
tika-abh07t0:1428_2: sarīraselāvayavadhātusadisattā cāti pathavīdhātu. Āpeti sahajātarūpāni pattharati,
tika-abh07t0:1428_3: āpāyati vā brūheti vaḍḍhetīti āpo. Tejeti paripāceti, niseti vā tikkhabhāvena sesabhūtattayaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1428_4: usmāpetīti tejo. Vāyati desantaruppattihetubhāvena bhūtasaṅghātaṃ pāpetīti vāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1429_0: 5. Cakkhādīnaṃ vacanattho heṭṭhā kathitova. Pasādarūpaṃ nāma catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1429_2: Tattha cakkhu tāva majjhe kaṇhamaṇḍalassa ūkāsirappamāṇe abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattipadese
tika-abh07t0:1429_5: catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā paripāliyamānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1429_6: vaṇṇādīhi parivāritaṃ yathāyogaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sadhentaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh07t0:1429_7: itaraṃ “sasambhāracakkhū”ti vuccati. Evaṃ sotādayopi yathākkamaṃ sotabilabbhantare
tika-abh07t0:1429_9: uppaladalaggasaṇṭhānaṃ padesaṃ abhibyāpetvā pavattanti, itaraṃ pana ṭhapetvā kammajatejassa
tika-abh07t0:1429_10: patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ kesaggalomagganakhaggasukkhacammāni ca avasesaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā
tika-abh07t0:1429_11: pavattati. Evaṃ santepi itarehi tassa saṅkaro na hoti bhinnanissayalakkhaṇattā. Ekanissayānipi
tika-abh07t0:1429_12: hi rūparasādīni lakkhaṇabhedato asaṃkiṇṇāti kiṃ pana bhinnanissayā pasādā.
tika-abh07t0:1430_0: 6. Āpodhātuyā sukhumabhāvena phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ “āpodhātu vivajjitaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1430_1: bhūtattayasaṅkhāta”nti. Kiñcāpi hi sītatā phusitvā gayhati, sā pana tejoyeva. Mande
tika-abh07t0:1430_2: hi uṇhatte sītabuddhi sītatāsaṅkhātassa kassaci guṇassa abhāvato. Tayidaṃ sītabuddhiyā
tika-abh07t0:1430_3: anavaṭṭhitabhāvato viññāyati pārāpāre viya. Tathā hi ghammakāle ātape ṭhatvā chāyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1430_4: paviṭṭhānaṃ sītabuddhi hoti, tattheva cirakālaṃ ṭhitānaṃ uṇhabuddhi. Yadi ca āpodhātu
tika-abh07t0:1430_5: sītatā siyā, uṇhabhāvena saha ekasmiṃ kalāpe upalabbheyya, na cevaṃ upalabbhati,
tika-abh07t0:1430_6: tasmā viññāyati “na āpodhātu sītatā”ti. Ye pana “davatā āpodhātu, sā ca phusitvā
tika-abh07t0:1430_7: gayhatī”ti vadanti, te vattabbā “davatā nāma phusitvā gayhatīti idaṃ āyasmantānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1435_0: Gocararūpaṃ nāma pañcaviññāṇavisayabhāvato. Gāvo indriyāni caranti etthāti gocaranti
tika-abh07t0:1435_1: hi ārammaṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ pañcavidhampi yathākkamaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1436_0: 7. Itthiyā bhāvo itthattaṃ. Purisassa bhāvo purisattaṃ. Tattha itthiliṅganimittakuttākappahetubhāvalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1436_1: itthattaṃ, purisaliṅgādihetubhāvalakkhaṇaṃ purisattaṃ. Tattha itthīnaṃ aṅgajātaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1436_2: itthiliṅgaṃ. Sarādhippāyā itthinimittaṃ “itthī”ti sañjānanassa paccayabhāvato. Avisadaṭhānagamananisajjādi
tika-abh07t0:1436_3: itthikuttaṃ. Itthisaṇṭhānaṃ itthākappo. Purisaliṅgādīnipi vuttanayena daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-abh07t0:1436_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aññathā itthiliṅgādīni vaṇṇitāni. Taṃ pana evaṃ saṅgahetvā vadanti –
tika-abh07t0:1439: Bhāvarūpaṃ nāma bhavati etena itthādiabhidhānaṃ, buddhi cāti katvā. Taṃ panetaṃ kāyindriyaṃ viya sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh07t0:1440_0: 8. Hadayameva manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayattā vatthu cāti hadayavatthu. Tathā
tika-abh07t0:1440_1: hi taṃ dhātudvayanissayabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ, tañca hadayakosabbhantare aḍḍhapasatamattaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1440_2: lohitaṃ nissāya pavattati. Rūpakaṇḍe avuttassapi panetassa āgamato, yuttito ca atthibhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1440_3: daṭṭhabbo. Tattha, taṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti “yaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1440_4: rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena
tika-abh07t0:1440_5: paccayo”ti evamāgataṃ paṭṭhānavacanaṃ āgamo. Yutti panevaṃ daṭṭhabbā –
tika-abh07t0:1446: Na ca bhāvadvayaṃ tasmiṃ, asantepi pavattito.
tika-abh07t0:1450_0: 9. Jīvanti tenāti jīvitaṃ, tadeva kammajarūpaparipālane ādhipaccayogato indriyanti
tika-abh07t0:1450_1: jīvitindriyaṃ. Tathā hetaṃ kammajarūpaparipālanalakkhaṇaṃ. Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyīnampi
tika-abh07t0:1450_2: hi sahajātānaṃ pavattihetubhāveneva anupālakaṃ. Na hi tesaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitikāraṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1450_3: hoti āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya kammassa taṅkhaṇābhāvato. Idaṃ pana saha pācanagginā
tika-abh07t0:1451_0: 10. Kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharīyatīti kabaḷīkāro āhāro, idañca savatthukaṃ katvā āhāraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1451_1: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sendriyakāyopatthambhanahetubhūtā pana aṅgamaṅgānusārī rasaharasaṅkhātā
tika-abh07t0:1451_2: ajjhoharitabbāhārasinehabhūtā ojā idha āhārarūpaṃ nāma. Tathā hetaṃ sendriyakāyopatthambhanahetubhāvalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1452_0: 11. Kakkhaḷattādinā attano attano sabhāvena upalabbhanato sabhāvarūpaṃ nāma. Uppādādīhi,
tika-abh07t0:1452_1: aniccatādīhi vā lakkhaṇehi sahitanti salakkhaṇaṃ. Paricchedādibhāvaṃ vinā attano
tika-abh07t0:1452_2: sabhāveneva kammādīhi paccayehi nipphannattā nippharūpaṃ nāma. Ruppanasabhāvo rūpaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1452_3: tena yuttampi rūpaṃ, yathā “arisaso, nīluppala”nti, svāyaṃ rūpa-saddo ruḷhiyā ataṃsabhāvepi
tika-abh07t0:1452_4: pavattatīti aparena rūpa-saddena visesetvā “rūparūpa”nti vuttaṃ yathā “dukkhadukkha”nti.
tika-abh07t0:1452_5: Paricchedādibhāvaṃ atikkamitvā sabhāveneva upalabbhanato lakkhaṇattayāropanena sammasituṃ
tika-abh07t0:1453_0: 12. Na kassatīti akāso. Akāsoyeva ākāso, nijjīvaṭṭhena dhātu cāti ākāsadhātu. Cakkhudasakādiekekakalāpagatarūpānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1453_1: kalāpantarehi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvāpādanavasena paricchedakaṃ, tehi vā paricchijjamānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1453_2: tesaṃ paricchedamattaṃ vā rūpaṃ paricchedarūpaṃ. Tañhi taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindantaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1453_3: viya hoti. Vijjamānepi ca kalāpantarabhūtehi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ samphuṭṭhabhāve
tika-abh07t0:1453_4: taṃtaṃrūpavivittatā rūpapariyanto ākāso. Yesañca so paricchedo, tehi sayaṃ asamphuṭṭhoyeva.
tika-abh07t0:1453_5: Aññathā paricchinnatā na siyā tesaṃ rūpānaṃ byāpībhāvāpattito. Abyāpitā hi asamphuṭṭhatā.
tika-abh07t0:1454_0: 13. Calamānakāyena adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, sayañca tena viññāyatīti kāyaviññatti. Saviññāṇakasaddasaṅkhātavācāya
tika-abh07t0:1454_1: adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, sayañca tāya viññāyatīti vacīviññatti. Tattha abhikkamādijanakacittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātuyā
tika-abh07t0:1454_3: mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ ukkhipantassa sabbathāmena gahaṇakāle ussāhanavikāro viya rūpakāyassa
tika-abh07t0:1454_4: pariphandanapaccayabhāvena upalabbhamāno vikāro kāyaviññatti. Sā hi phandamānakāyena
tika-abh07t0:1454_5: adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti. Na hi viññattivikārarahitesu rukkhacalanādīsu “idamesa kāretī”ti
tika-abh07t0:1454_6: adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhanti. Hatthacalanādīsu ca phandamānakāyaggahaṇānantaraṃ aviññāyamānantarehi
tika-abh07t0:1455_0: Kathaṃ pana viññattivasena hatthacalanādayo hontīti? Vuccate – ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1455_2: vāyodhātūhi laddhopatthambhā desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati cittajaṃ, purimajavanādisambhūtā
tika-abh07t0:1455_3: pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattakarā tassa upakārāya hontīti. Yathā hi sattahi yugehi
tika-abh07t0:1455_4: ākaḍḍhitabbasakaṭe sattamayugayuttāyeva goṇā heṭṭhā chasu yugesu yuttagoṇehi laddhūpatthambhā
tika-abh07t0:1455_5: sakaṭaṃ cālenti, paṭhamayugādiyuttā pana upatthambhanasandhāraṇamattameva sādhentā
tika-abh07t0:1456_0: Desantaruppattiyeva cettha calanaṃ uppannadesato kesaggamattampi dhammānaṃ saṅkamanābhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1456_1: Itarathā nesaṃ abyāpārakatā, khaṇikatā ca na siyā. Desantaruppattihetubhāvoti ca
tika-abh07t0:1456_2: yathā attanā sahajarūpāni heṭṭhimajavanasamuṭṭhitarūpehi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānato aññattha
tika-abh07t0:1456_3: uppajjanti, evaṃ tehi saha tattha uppattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, ettha pana cittaje calite
tika-abh07t0:1456_4: taṃsambandhena itarampi calati nadīsote pakkhittasukkhagomayapiṇḍaṃ viya. Tathā calayituṃ
tika-abh07t0:1456_8: akkharuppattiṭṭhānagataupādinnarūpehi saha ghaṭṭanapaccayabhūto eko vikāro vacīviññatti.
tika-abh07t0:1456_9: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1457_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha “phandamānakāyaggahaṇānantara”nti vuttaṃ, evamidha
tika-abh07t0:1457_1: “suyyamānasaddasavanānantara”nti yojetabbaṃ. Idha ca santhambhanādīnaṃ abhāvato sattamajavanasamuṭṭhitātyādinayo
tika-abh07t0:1457_2: na labbhati. Ghaṭṭanena hi saddhiṃyeva saddo uppajjati. Ghaṭṭanañca paṭhamajavanādīsupi
tika-abh07t0:1457_3: labbhateva. Ettha ca yathā ussāpetvā baddhagosīsatālapaṇṇādirūpāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya
tika-abh07t0:1457_5: gahetvā udakaggahaṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ vipphandamānasamuccāriyamānakāyasadde gahetvā tadanantarappavattāya
tika-abh07t0:1458_0: 14. Lahubhāvo lahutā. Mudubhāvo mudutā. Kammaññabhāvo kammaññatā. Yathākkamañcetā
tika-abh07t0:1458_1: arogino viya rūpānaṃ agarutā suparimadditacammassa viya akathinatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa
tika-abh07t0:1458_2: viya sarīrakiriyānaṃ anukūlabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññamaññaṃ avijahantassapi hi lahutādittayassa
tika-abh07t0:1459_1: paṭhamatthajotanato. Santāno santati, pabandhotyattho. Tattha paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
tika-abh07t0:1459_2: yāva cakkhādidasakānaṃ uppatti, etthantare rūpuppādo upacayo nāma. Tato paraṃ santati
tika-abh07t0:1459_3: nāma. Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyīnaṃ rūpānaṃ nirodhābhimukhabhāvavasena jīraṇaṃ jarā,
tika-abh07t0:1459_4: sāyeva jaratā, niccadhuvabhāvena na iccaṃ anupagantabbanti aniccaṃ, tassa bhāvo aniccatā,
tika-abh07t0:1459_5: rūpaparibhedo. Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāma dhammānaṃ taṃtaṃavatthāvasena lakkhaṇahetuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1460_0: 16. Jātirūpamevāti paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya rūpānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe uppattibhāvato jātisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1460_3: “upacayo santatī”ti vibhajitvā vuttattā. Evañca katvā tāsaṃ niddese atthato abhedaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1460_4: dassetuṃ “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo, so rūpassa upacayo. Yo rūpassa upacayo, sā rūpassa
tika-abh07t0:1461_0: 17. Cattāro bhūtā, pañca pasādā, cattāro visayā, duvidho bhāvo, hadayarūpamiccapi
tika-abh07t0:1461_1: idaṃ jīvitāhārarūpehi dvīhi saha aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ, tathā paricchedo ca duvidhā viññatti,
tika-abh07t0:1461_2: tividho vikāro, catubbidhaṃ lakkhaṇanti rūpānaṃ paricchedavikārādibhāvaṃ vinā visuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1461_3: paccayehi anibbattattā ime anipphannā dasa ceti aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ bhave.
tika-abh07t0:1464_1: vuttaṃ. Sampayuttassa alobhādihetuno abhāvā ahetukaṃ. Yathāsakaṃ paccayavantatāya
tika-abh07t0:1464_2: sappaccayaṃ. Attānaṃ ārabbha pavattehi kāmāsavādīhi sahitattā sāsavaṃ. Paccayehi
tika-abh07t0:1464_3: abhisaṅkhatattā saṅkhataṃ. Upādānakkhandhasaṅkhāte loke niyuttatāya lokiyaṃ. Kāmataṇhāya
tika-abh07t0:1464_4: avacaritattā kāmāvacaraṃ. Arūpadhammānaṃ viya kassaci ārammaṇassa aggahaṇato nāssa
tika-abh07t0:1464_5: ārammaṇanti anārammaṇaṃ. Tadaṅgādivasena pahātabbatābhāvato appahātabbaṃ. Iti-saddo
tika-abh07t0:1465_0: 19. Ajjhattikarūpaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattattā. Kāmaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1465_1: aññepi hi ajjhattasambhūtā atthi, ruḷhīvasena pana cakkhādikaṃyeva ajjhattikaṃ. Atha
tika-abh07t0:1465_2: vā “yadi mayaṃ na homa, tvaṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamo bhavissasī”ti vadantā viya attabhāvassa
tika-abh07t0:1465_3: sātisayaṃ upakārattā cakkhādīneva visesato ajjhattikāni nāma. Attasaṅkhātaṃ vā cittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1465_4: adhikicca tassa dvārabhāvena pavattatīti ajjhattaṃ, tadeva ajjhattikaṃ. Tato bahibhūtattā
tika-abh07t0:1467_0: 22. Aṭṭhavidhampi indriyarūpaṃ pañcaviññāṇesu liṅgādīsu sahajarūpaparipālane ca ādhipaccayogato.
tika-abh07t0:1467_1: Pasādarūpassa hi pañcavidhassa cakkhuviññāṇādīsu ādhipaccaṃ attano paṭumandādibhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1467_2: tesampi paṭumandādibhāvāpādanato. Bhāvadvayassāpi itthiliṅgādīsu ādhipaccaṃ yathāsakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1467_3: paccayehi uppajjamānānampi tesaṃ yebhuyyena sabhāvakasantāneyeva taṃtadākārena uppajjanato,
tika-abh07t0:1467_4: na pana indriyapaccayabhāvato. Jīvitassa ca kammajaparipālane ādhipaccaṃ tesaṃ yathāsakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1468_0: 23. Visayavisayibhāvappattivasena thūlattā oḷārikarūpaṃ. Tatoyeva gahaṇassa sukarattā
tika-abh07t0:1468_1: santikerūpaṃ āsannarūpaṃ nāma. Yo sayaṃ, nissayavasena ca sampattānaṃ, asampattānañca
tika-abh07t0:1468_2: paṭimukhabhāvo aññamaññapatanaṃ, so paṭigho viyāti paṭigho. Yathā hi paṭighāte sati
tika-abh07t0:1468_3: dubbalassa calanaṃ hoti, evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭimukhabhāve sati arūpasabhāvattā dubbalassa
tika-abh07t0:1468_4: bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ hoti. Paṭigho yassa atthi taṃ sappaṭighaṃ. Tattha sayaṃ sampatti
tika-abh07t0:1468_5: phoṭṭhabbassa, nissayavasena sampatti ghānajivhākāyagandharasānaṃ, ubhayathāpi asampatti
tika-abh07t0:1468_6: cakkhusotarūpasaddānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itaraṃ soḷasavidhaṃ oḷārikatādisabhāvābhāvato sukhumarūpādikaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1469: 24. Kammato jātaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ upādinnarūpaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi upetena kammunā attano phalabhāvena ādinnattā gahitattā. Itaraṃ aggahitaggahaṇenadasavidhaṃ anupādinnarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1470_0: 25. Daṭṭhabbabhāvasaṅkhātena nidassanena saha vattatīti sanidassanaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇagocarabhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1470_1: hi nidassananti vuccati tassa ca rūpāyatanato anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi taṃ visesetuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1470_2: aññaṃ viya katvā vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti saha nidassanena sanidassananti. Dhammabhāvasāmaññena
tika-abh07t0:1470_3: hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro viseso, so añño viya katvā upacarituṃ yutto.
tika-abh07t0:1471_0: 26. Asampattavasenāti attānaṃ asampattassa gocarassa vasena, attanā visayappadesaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1471_1: vā asampattavasena. Cakkhusotāni hi rūpasaddehi asampattāni, sayaṃ vā tāni asampattāneva
tika-abh07t0:1477: Mahanto ca ghaṇṭādīnaṃ, saddo sotassa gocaro.
tika-abh07t0:1482: “Na tesaṃ gocarā honti, na hi sambhonti te bahi;
tika-abh07t0:1483: Vuttā ca avisesena, pāṭhe taṃvisayāva te.
tika-abh07t0:1485: Akkhivaṇṇaṃ tathā mūlaṃ, passeyya bhamukassa ca.
tika-abh07t0:1488: Gocaraggāhikarūpaṃ viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ hutvā taṃtaṃgocaraggahaṇasabhāvattā. Itaraṃ tevīsatividhaṃ agocaraggāhikarūpaṃ gocaraggahaṇābhāvato.
tika-abh07t0:1489_0: 27. Vaṇṇitabbo daṭṭhabboti vaṇṇo. Attano udayānantaraṃ rūpaṃ janetīti ojā. Avinibbhogarūpaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1489_1: katthacipi aññamaññaṃ vinibhuñjanassa visuṃ visuṃ pavattiyā abhāvato. Rūpaloke gandhādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1489_2: abhāvavādimatampi hi tattha tattha ācariyehi paṭikkhittameva.
tika-abh07t0:1490: 28. Iccevanti etthapi iti-saddo pakārattho, tena idha anāgatampi sabbaṃ dukatikādibhedaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh07t0:1493_0: 29. Kāni pana tāni kammādīni, kathaṃ, kattha, kadā ca rūpasamuṭṭhānānīti āha “tatthā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1493_1: Paṭisandhimupādāyāti paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇaṃ upādāya. Khaṇe khaṇeti ekekassa
tika-abh07t0:1493_2: cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu, nirantaramevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Apare pana cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1493_3: bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca rūpuppādaṃ paṭisedhenti. Tattha kiñcāpi ṭhitikkhaṇābhāve tesaṃ upapatti
tika-abh07t0:1493_4: ceva tattha vattabbañca heṭṭhā kathitameva, idhāpi pana bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpuppādābhāve
tika-abh07t0:1493_5: upapattiyā tattha vattabbena ca saha sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ saṅgahetvā vuccati –
tika-abh07t0:1498: “‘Uppādo ca vayo ceva, aññathattaṃ ṭhitassa ca;
tika-abh07t0:1499: Paññāyatī’ti vuttattā, ṭhiti atthīti ce mataṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1502: “Vuttā tasmā na cittassa, ṭhiti dissati pāḷiyaṃ;
tika-abh07t0:1511: Nayadassanato esā, vibhaṅge na tu desitā.
tika-abh07t0:1519: Na cittaṭṭhiti bhaṅge ca, na rūpassa asambhavo”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1520_0: 31. Rūpavirāgabhāvanānibbattattā hetuno tabbidhuratāya, anokāsatāya ca arūpavipākā,
tika-abh07t0:1520_1: rūpajanane visesapaccayehi jhānaṅgehi sampayogābhāvato dvipañcaviññāṇāni cāti cuddasa
tika-abh07t0:1520_3: Paṭisandhicittaṃ, pana cuticittañca ekūnavīsati bhavaṅgasseva antogadhattā cittantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1520_4: na hotīti na tassa vajjanaṃ kataṃ. Kiñcāpi na kataṃ, pacchājātapaccayarahitaṃ, pana
tika-abh07t0:1520_5: āhārādīhi ca anupatthaddhaṃ dubbalavatthuṃ nissāya pavattattā, attano ca āgantukatāya
tika-abh07t0:1520_6: kammajarūpehi cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā ṭhitattā ca paṭisandhicittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1520_7: rūpasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ na hoti. Cuticitte pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva “vūpasantavaṭṭamūlasmiṃ
tika-abh07t0:1520_8: santāne sātisayaṃ santavuttitāya khīṇāsavasseva cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetī”ti
tika-abh07t0:1520_9: vuttaṃ. Ānandācariyādayo pana “sabbesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh07t0:1520_10: Vinicchayo pana nesaṃ saṅkhepato mūlaṭīkādīsu, vitthārato ca abhidhammatthavikāsiniyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1520_12: paṭṭhāya. Jāyantameva samuṭṭhāpeti, na pana ṭhitaṃ, bhijjamānaṃ vā anantarādipaccayalābhena
tika-abh07t0:1521_0: 32. Iriyāya kāyikakiriyāya pavattipathabhāvato iriyāpatho, gamanādi, atthato tadavatthā
tika-abh07t0:1521_1: rūpappavatti. Tampi sandhāreti yathāpavattaṃ upatthambheti. Yathā hi vīthicittehi
tika-abh07t0:1521_2: abbokiṇṇe bhavaṅge pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti, na evametesu dvattiṃsavidhesu, vakkhamānesu
tika-abh07t0:1521_3: ca chabbīsatiyā jāgaraṇacittesu pavattamānesu. Tadā pana aṅgāni upatthaddhāni yathāpavattairiyāpathabhāveneva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t0:1522_0: 33. Viññattimpi samuṭṭhāpenti, na kevalaṃ rūpiriyāpathāneva. Avisesavacanepi panettha
tika-abh07t0:1522_2: ca pañcadvārappavattānaṃ paridubbalabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmañcettha rūpavinimutto
tika-abh07t0:1522_3: iriyāpatho, viññatti vā natthi, tathāpi na sabbaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ cittaṃ iriyāpathūpatthambhakaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1522_4: viññattivikārajanakañca hoti. Yaṃ pana cittaṃ viññattijanakaṃ, taṃ ekaṃsato iriyāpathūpatthambhakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1522_5: iriyāpathassa viññattiyā saha avinābhāvato. Iriyāpathūpatthambhakañca rūpajanakanti
tika-abh07t0:1522_6: imassa visesadassanatthaṃ rūpato iriyāpathaviññattīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1523_0: 34. Terasāti kusalato cattāri, akusalato cattāri, kiriyato pañcāti terasa. Tesu hi
tika-abh07t0:1523_1: puthujjanā aṭṭhahi kusalākusalehi hasanti, sekkhā diṭṭhisahagatavajjitehi, asekkhā
tika-abh07t0:1523_2: pana pañcahi kiriyacittehi, tatthāpi buddhā catūhi sahetukakiriyacitteheva hasanti,
tika-abh07t0:1523_3: na ahetukena “atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ patvā imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa
tika-abh07t0:1523_4: buddhassa bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattī”ti vacanato.
tika-abh07t0:1523_5: Na hi vicāraṇapaññārahitassa hasituppādassa buddhānaṃ pavatti yuttāti vadanti. Hasituppādacittena
tika-abh07t0:1523_6: pana pavattiyamānampi tesaṃ sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ anuvattakattā
tika-abh07t0:1523_7: ñāṇānuparivattiyevāti. Evañca katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1523_8: cittaṃ hāsayamānaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā na tassa buddhānaṃ pavatti sakkā nivāretuṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1524: 35. Pacchājātādipaccayūpatthambhalābhena ṭhitikkhaṇeyeva utuojānaṃ balavabhāvoti vuttaṃ “tejodhātu ṭhitippattā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1525: 37. Tattha hadayaindriyarūpāni nava kammatoyeva jātattā kammajāneva. Yañhi jātaṃ, jāyati, jāyissati ca, taṃ “kammaja”nti vuccati yathā duddhanti.
tika-abh07t0:1526: 40. Paccuppannapaccayāpekkhattā lahutādittayaṃ kammajaṃ na hoti, itarathā sabbadābhāvīhi bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ “lahutādittayaṃ utucittāhārehi sambhotī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1527_0: 43. Ekantakammajāni nava, catujesu kammajāni navāti aṭṭhārasa kammajāni, pañcavikārarūpasaddaavinibbhogarūpaākāsavasena
tika-abh07t0:1527_1: pannarasa cittajāni, saddo, lahutādittayaṃ, avinibbhogākāsarūpāni navāti terasa utujāni,
tika-abh07t0:1528_1: vinā attano jātiādilakkhaṇābhāvato lakkhaṇāni kehici paccayehi na jāyantīti pakāsitaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1528_2: Uppādādiyuttānañhi cakkhādīnaṃ jātiādīni lakkhaṇāni vijjanti, na evaṃ jātiādīnaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1528_3: Yadi tesampi jātiādīni siyuṃ, evaṃ anavatthānameva āpajjeyya. Yaṃ pana “rūpāyatanaṃ…pe…
tika-abh07t0:1528_4: kabaḷīkāro āhāro. Ime dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānā”tyādīsu jātiyā kutocijātattaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1528_5: tampi rūpajanakapaccayānaṃ rūpuppādanaṃ pati anuparatabyāpārānaṃ paccayabhāvūpagamanakkhaṇe
tika-abh07t0:1528_7: bhikkhave, aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā. Jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ
tika-abh07t0:1528_8: paṭiccasamuppanna”nti vacanaṃ, tatthāpi paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ lakkhaṇabhāvatoti ayametthābhisandhi. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh07t0:1533_0: 45. Yasmā panetāni rūpāni kammādito uppajjamānānipi na ekekaṃ samuṭṭhahanti, atha
tika-abh07t0:1533_1: kho piṇḍatova. Tasmā piṇḍānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ, sarūpañca dassetuṃ “ekuppādā”tyādi
tika-abh07t0:1533_2: vuttaṃ. Sahavuttinoti visuṃ visuṃ kalāpagatarūpavasena sahavuttino, na sabbakalāpānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1534: 46. Dasa parimāṇā assāti dasakaṃ, samudāyassetaṃ nāmaṃ, cakkhunā upalakkhitaṃ, tappadhānaṃ vā dasakaṃ cakkhudasakaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh07t0:1535: 47. Vacīviññattiggahaṇena saddopi saṅgahito hoti tassā tadavinābhāvatoti vuttaṃ “vacīviññattidasaka”nti.
tika-abh07t0:1536: 50. Kiṃ panete ekavīsati kalāpā sabbepi sabbattha honti, udāhu keci katthacīti āha “tatthā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1539: 52. Idāni nesaṃ sambhavavasena, pavattipaṭisandhivasena, yonivasena ca pavattiṃ dassetuṃ “sabbānipi panetānī”tyādi vuttaṃ. Yathārahanti sabhāvakaparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ anurūpato.
tika-abh07t0:1540_0: 53. Kamalakuharagabbhamalādisaṃsedaṭṭhānesu jātā saṃsedajā. Upapāto nesaṃ atthīti
tika-abh07t0:1540_1: opapātikā, ukkaṃsagatiparicchedavasena cettha visiṭṭhaupapāto gahito yathā “abhirūpassa
tika-abh07t0:1540_2: kaññā dātabbā”ti. Satta dasakāni pātubhavanti paripuṇṇāyatanabhāvena upalabbhanato.
tika-abh07t0:1540_4: Tattha sugatiyaṃ mahānubhāvena kammunā nibbattamānānaṃ opapātikānaṃ indriyavekallāyogato
tika-abh07t0:1540_6: Duggatiyaṃ pana cakkhusotabhāvālābho dvinnampi vasena, ghānālābho saṃsedajānameva
tika-abh07t0:1540_7: vasena, na opapātikānaṃ vasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi dhammahadayavibhaṅge “kāmadhātuyā
tika-abh07t0:1540_8: upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavanti, kassaci dasa, kassaci aparānipi
tika-abh07t0:1540_9: dasa, kassaci nava, kassaci sattā”ti vacanato paripuṇṇindriyassa opapātikassa saddāyatanavajjitāni
tika-abh07t0:1540_10: ekādasāyatanāni vuttāni. Andhassa cakkhāyatanavajjitāni dasa, tathā badhirassa sotāyatanavajjitāni,
tika-abh07t0:1540_12: vuttāni. Yadi pana aghānakopi opapātiko siyā, andhabadhirāghānakānaṃ vasena tikkhattuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1540_13: dasa, andhabadhiraandhāghānakabadhirāghānakānaṃ vasena tikkhattuṃ nava, andhabadhirāghānakassa
tika-abh07t0:1540_14: vasena ca aṭṭha āyatanāni vattabbāni siyuṃ, na panevaṃ vuttāni. Tasmā natthi opapātikassa
tika-abh07t0:1540_15: ghānavekallanti. Tathā ca vuttaṃ yamakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aghānako opapātiko natthi. Yadi
tika-abh07t0:1541_0: Saṃsedajānaṃ pana ghānābhāvo na sakkā nivāretuṃ “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe”tyādipāḷiyā
tika-abh07t0:1541_1: opapātikayonimeva sandhāya, sattāyatanaggahaṇassa ca aññesaṃ asambhavato gabbhaseyyakameva
tika-abh07t0:1541_2: sandhāya vuttattā. Yaṃ pana “saṃsedajayonikā paripuṇṇāyatanabhāvena opapātikasaṅgahaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1541_3: katvā vuttā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, tampi paripuṇṇāyatanaṃyeva saṃsedajānaṃ opapātikesu
tika-abh07t0:1541_4: saṅgahavasena vuttaṃ. Apare pana yamake ghānajivhānaṃ sahacāritā vuttāti ajivhassa
tika-abh07t0:1541_5: asambhavato aghānakassapi abhāvameva vaṇṇenti, tatthāpi yathā cakkhusotāni rūpabhave
tika-abh07t0:1541_6: ghānajivhāhi vinā pavattanti, na evaṃ ghānajivhā aññamaññaṃ vinā pavattanti dvinnampi
tika-abh07t0:1541_7: rūpabhave anuppajjanatoti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ kāmabhave appavattivasena tesaṃ sahacāritā
tika-abh07t0:1542_0: 54. Gabbhe mātukucchiyaṃ sentīti gabbhaseyyakā, teyeva rūpādīsu sattatāya sattāti
tika-abh07t0:1542_1: gabbhaseyyakasattā. Ete aṇḍajajalābujā. Tīṇi dasakāni pātubhavanti, yāni “kalalarūpa”nti
tika-abh07t0:1542_2: vuccanti, paripiṇḍitāni ca tāni jātiuṇṇāya ekassa aṃsuno pasannatilatele pakkhipitvā
tika-abh07t0:1542_3: uddhaṭassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumattāni acchāni vippasannāni. Kadāci na labbhati
tika-abh07t0:1542_4: abhāvakasattānaṃ vasena. Tato paranti paṭisandhito paraṃ. Pavattikāleti sattame sattāhe,
tika-abh07t0:1542_5: ṭīkākāramatena ekādasame sattāhe vā. Kamenāti cakkhudasakapātubhāvato sattāhātikkamena
tika-abh07t0:1542_6: sotadasakaṃ, tato sattāhātikkamena ghānadasakaṃ, tato sattāhātikkamena jivhādasakanti
tika-abh07t0:1542_7: evaṃ anukkamena. Aṭṭhakathāyampi hi ayamattho dassitova.
tika-abh07t0:1543_0: 55. Ṭhitikālanti paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikālaṃ. Paṭisandhicittasahajātā hi utu ṭhānappattā
tika-abh07t0:1543_1: tassa ṭhitikkhaṇe suddhaṭṭhakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, tadā uppannā bhaṅgakkhaṇetyādinā anukkamena
tika-abh07t0:1543_2: utu rūpaṃ janeti. Ojāpharaṇamupādāyāti gabbhaseyyakassa mātu ajjhohaṭāhārato saṃsedajopapātikānañca
tika-abh07t0:1543_3: mukhagatasemhādito ojāya rasaharaṇīanusārena sarīre pharaṇakālato paṭṭhāya.
tika-abh07t0:1544: 56. Cuticittaṃ uparimaṃ etassāti cuticittopari. Kammajarūpāni na uppajjanti taduppattiyaṃ maraṇābhāvato. Kammajarūpavicchede hi “mato”ti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-abh07t0:1545: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh07t0:1547_0: Puretaranti sattarasamassa uppādakkhaṇe. Tatoparaṃ cittajāhārajarūpañca vocchijjatīti
tika-abh07t0:1547_1: ajīvakasantāne tesaṃ uppattiyā abhāvato yathānibbattaṃ cittajaṃ, āhārajañca tato
tika-abh07t0:1547_2: paraṃ kiñci kālaṃ pavattitvā nirujjhati. Apare pana ācariyā “cittajarūpaṃ cuticittato
tika-abh07t0:1548_0: 58. Rūpaloke ghānajivhākāyānaṃ abhāve kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Bhāvadvayaṃ pana bahalakāmarāgūpanissayattā
tika-abh07t0:1548_1: brahmānañca tadabhāvato tattha na pavattati. Āhārajakalāpāni ca na labbhanti ajjhohaṭāhārābhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1548_2: sarīragatassapi āhārassa rūpasamuṭṭhāpanābhāvato. Bāhirañhi utuṃ, āhārañca upanissayaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1548_3: labhitvā utuāhārā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti. Jīvitanavakanti kāyābhāvato kāyadasakaṭṭhāniyaṃ jīvitanavakaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1549_0: 59. Atiricchati sesabrahmānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca upalabhitabbarūpato avasiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1549_1: hoti, maraṇakāle pana brahmānaṃ sarīranikkhepābhāvato sabbesampi tisamuṭṭhānāni,
tika-abh07t0:1550_0: 61. Rūpesu tevīsati ghānajivhākāyabhāvadvayavasena pañcannaṃ abhāvato. Keci pana
tika-abh07t0:1550_2: akāraṇaṃ. Na hi vūpasametabbāpekkhā tabbirodhidhammappavatti tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittesu
tika-abh07t0:1550_3: lahutādīnaṃ abhāvappasaṅgato. “Saddo vikāro”tyādi sabbesampi sādhāraṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1553_0: 62. Ettāvatā cittacetasikarūpāni vibhāgato niddisitvā idāni nibbānaṃ niddisanto āha
tika-abh07t0:1553_3: anumānasiddhataṃ. Saṅkhatadhammārammaṇañhi, paññattārammaṇaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchedapaṭippassambhane
tika-abh07t0:1553_4: asamatthaṃ, atthi ca loke kilesasamucchedādi. Tasmā atthi saṅkhatasammutidhammaviparīto
tika-abh07t0:1553_5: kilesānaṃ samucchedapaṭippassaddhikarānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ ārammaṇabhūto nibbānaṃ nāma
tika-abh07t0:1553_6: eko dhammoti siddhaṃ. Paccakkhānumānasiddhatāsandassanena ca abhāvamattaṃ nibbānanti
tika-abh07t0:1553_7: vippaṭipannānaṃ vādaṃ nisedhetīti alamatippapañcena. Khandhādibhede tebhūmakadhamme
tika-abh07t0:1553_8: heṭṭhupariyavasena vinanato saṃsibbanato vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantattā visayātikkamavasena atītattā.
tika-abh07t0:1554_0: 63. Sabhāvatoti attano santilakkhaṇena. Upādīyati kāmupādādīhīti upādi, pañcakkhandhassetaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1554_1: adhivacanaṃ, upādiyeva seso kilesehīti upādiseso, tena saha vattatīti saupādisesā,
tika-abh07t0:1554_2: sā eva nibbānadhātūti saupādisesanibbānadhātu. Kāraṇapariyāyenāti saupādisesādivasena
tika-abh07t0:1555_0: 64. Ārammaṇato, sampayogato ca rāgadosamohehi suññattā suññaṃ, suññameva suññataṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1555_1: tathā rāgādinimittarahitattā animittaṃ. Rāgādipaṇidhirahitattā appaṇihitaṃ. Sabbasaṅkhārehi
tika-abh07t0:1555_2: vā suññattā suññataṃ. Sabbasaṅkhāranimittābhāvato animittaṃ. Taṇhāpaṇidhiyā abhāvato appaṇihitaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1556_0: 65. Cavanābhāvato accutaṃ. Antassa pariyosānassa atikkantattā accantaṃ. Paccayehi
tika-abh07t0:1556_1: asaṅkhatattā asaṅkhataṃ. Attano uttaritarassa abhāvato, sahadhammena vattabbassa
tika-abh07t0:1556_2: uttarassa vā abhāvato anuttaraṃ. Vānato taṇhāto muttattā sabbaso apagatattā vānamuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1556_3: Mahante sīlakkhandhādike esanti gavesantīti mahesayo. “Iti citta”ntyādi chahi paricchedehi
tika-abh07t0:1561_1: vatthudhammā sabhāvadhammā vuttā, idāni tesaṃ yathāyogaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ ekekasamuccayavasena
tika-abh07t0:1561_2: yogānurūpato akusalasaṅgahādibhedaṃ samuccayaṃ rāsiṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1562_0: 2. Akusalānameva sabhāgadhammavasena saṅgaho akusalasaṅgaho. Kusalādivasena missakānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1562_1: saṅgaho missakasaṅgaho, saccābhisambodhisaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa pakkhe bhavānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1562_2: bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ satipaṭṭhānādibhedānaṃ sabhāgavatthuvasena saṅgaho bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho.
tika-abh07t0:1564_0: 3. Pubbakoṭiyā apaññāyanato cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena, vaṇato vā vissandamānayūsā viya
tika-abh07t0:1564_1: cakkhādito visayesu vissandanato āsavā. Atha vā bhavato ābhavaggaṃ dhammato āgotrabhuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1564_2: savanti pavattantīti āsavā. Avadhiattho cettha ā-kāro, avadhi ca mariyādābhividhivasena
tika-abh07t0:1564_3: duvidho. Tattha “āpāṭaliputtaṃ vuṭṭho devo”tyādīsu viya kiriyaṃ bahi katvā pavatto
tika-abh07t0:1564_4: mariyādo. “Ābhavaggaṃ saddo abbhuggato”tyādīsu viya kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavatto abhividhi.
tika-abh07t0:1564_5: Idha pana abhividhimhi daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hete nibbattiṭṭhānabhūte ca bhavagge, gotrabhumhi
tika-abh07t0:1564_6: ca ārammaṇabhūte pavattanti. Vijjamānesu ca aññesu ābhavaggaṃ, āgotrabhuñca savantesu
tika-abh07t0:1564_8: ca eteyeva āsavabhāvena niruḷhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmoyeva āsavo kāmāsavo, kāmarāgo.
tika-abh07t0:1564_9: Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo bhavāsavo. Jhānanikantisassatadiṭṭhisahagato ca rāgo ettheva
tika-abh07t0:1564_10: saṅgayhati. Tattha paṭhamo upapattibhavesu rāgo, dutiyo kammabhave, tatiyo bhavadiṭṭhisahagato.
tika-abh07t0:1564_11: Dvāsaṭṭhividhā diṭṭhi diṭṭhāsavo. Dukkhādīsu catūsu saccesu, pubbante, aparante,
tika-abh07t0:1564_12: pubbāparante, paṭiccasamuppādesu cāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavo.
tika-abh07t0:1565_0: 4. Ottharitvā haraṇato, ohananato vā heṭṭhā katvā hananato osīdāpanato “ogho”ti vuccati
tika-abh07t0:1565_1: jalappavāho, ete ca satte ottharitvā hanantā vaṭṭasmiṃ satte osīdāpentā viya hontīti
tika-abh07t0:1565_2: oghasadisatāya oghā, āsavāyeva panettha yathāvuttaṭṭhena “oghā”ti ca vuccanti.
tika-abh07t0:1566: 5. Vaṭṭasmiṃ, bhavayantake vā satte kammavipākena bhavantarādīhi, dukkhena vā satte yojentīti yogā, heṭṭhā vuttadhammāva.
tika-abh07t0:1567_0: 6. Nāmakāyena rūpakāyaṃ, paccuppannakāyena vā anāgatakāyaṃ ganthenti duppamuñcaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1567_1: veṭhentīti kāyaganthā. Gosīlādinā sīlena, vatena, tadubhayena ca suddhīti evaṃ parato
tika-abh07t0:1567_2: asabhāvato āmasanaṃ parāmāso. “Idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti abhinivisanaṃ daḷhaggāho
tika-abh07t0:1568_0: 7. Maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya bhusaṃ daḷhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ādiyantīti upādānāni. Kāmoyeva upādānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1568_1: kāme upādiyatīti vā kāmupādānaṃ. “Iminā me sīlavatādinā saṃsārasuddhī”ti evaṃ sīlavatādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1568_2: gahaṇaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Vadanti etenāti vādo, khandhehi byatirittābyatirittavasena
tika-abh07t0:1568_3: vīsati parikappitassa attano vādo attavādo. Soyeva upādānanti attavādupādānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1569_0: 8. Jhānādivasena uppajjanakakusalacittaṃ nisedhenti tathā tassa uppajjituṃ na dentīti
tika-abh07t0:1569_1: nīvaraṇāni, paññācakkhuno vā āvaraṇaṭṭhena nīvaraṇā. Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu adhimattarāgasaṅkhāto
tika-abh07t0:1569_2: kāmoyeva chandanaṭṭhena chando cāti kāmacchando. Soyeva nīvaraṇanti kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1569_3: Byāpajjati vinassati etena cittanti byāpādo, “anatthaṃ me acarī”tyādinayappavattanavavidhaāghātavatthupadaṭṭhānatāya
tika-abh07t0:1569_4: navavidho, aṭṭhānakopena saha dasavidho vā doso, soyeva nīvaraṇanti byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1569_6: Kasmā panete bhinnadhammā dve dve ekanīvaraṇabhāvena vuttāti? Kiccāhārapaṭipakkhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1569_7: samānabhāvato. Thinamiddhānañhi cittuppādassa layāpādanakiccaṃ samānaṃ, uddhaccakukkuccānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1569_8: avūpasantabhāvakāraṇaṃ. Tathā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ tandīvijambhitā āhāro, hetūtyattho,
tika-abh07t0:1569_9: pacchimānaṃ ñātibyasanādivitakkanaṃ. Purimānañca dvinnaṃ vīriyaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1574_0: 9. Appahīnaṭṭhena anu anu santāne sentīti anusayā, anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantītyattho.
tika-abh07t0:1574_1: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati upajjanārahā santāne anu anu sayitā viya hontīti
tika-abh07t0:1574_2: tadavatthā “anusayā”ti vuccanti. Te pana nippariyāyato anāgatā kilesā, atītapaccuppannāpi
tika-abh07t0:1574_3: taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccanti. Na hi kālabhedena dhammānaṃ sabhāvabhedo atthi, yadi
tika-abh07t0:1574_4: appahīnaṭṭhena anusayā, nanu sabbepi kilesā appahīnā anusayā bhaveyyunti? Na mayaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1574_5: appahīnatāmattena “anusayā”ti vadāma, atha kho appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatā kilesā anusayāti.
tika-abh07t0:1574_6: Thāmagamanañca anaññasādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnameva āveṇiko sabhāvoti alaṃ vivādena.
tika-abh07t0:1576: 12. Cittaṃ kilissati upatappati, bādhīyati vā etehīti kilesā.
tika-abh07t0:1577: 13. Kāmabhavanāmenāti kāmabhavasaṅkhātānaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ nāmena. Tathāpavattanti sīlabbatādīnaṃ parato āmasanādivasena pavattaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1578_0: 14. Āsavā ca oghā ca yogā ca ganthā ca vatthuto dhammato vuttanayena tayo. Tathā
tika-abh07t0:1578_1: upādānā duve vuttā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena. Nīvaraṇā aṭṭha siyuṃ thinamiddhauddhaccakukkuccānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1578_2: visuṃ gahaṇato. Anusayā chaḷeva honti kāmarāgabhavarāgānusayānaṃ taṇhāsabhāvena ekato
tika-abh07t0:1578_3: gahitattā. Nava saṃyojanā matā ubhayattha vuttānaṃ taṇhāsabhāvānaṃ, diṭṭhisabhāvānañca
tika-abh07t0:1578_4: ekekaṃ saṅgahitattā. Kilesā pana suttantavasena, abhidhammavasenapi dasa. Iti evaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1578_5: pāpānaṃ akusalānaṃ saṅgaho navadhā vutto. Ettha ca –
tika-abh07t0:1587_0: 16. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā cintanasaṅkhātena upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena yathārahaṃ paccanīkadhammajhāpanaṭṭhena
tika-abh07t0:1587_1: ca jhānāni ca tāni aṅgāni ca samuditānaṃ avayavabhāvena aṅgīyanti ñāyantīti jhānaṅgāni.
tika-abh07t0:1587_2: Avayavavinimuttassa ca samudāyassa abhāvepi senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya visuṃ visuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1587_3: aṅgabhāvena vuccanti ekato hutvā jhānabhāvena. Domanassañcettha akusalajhānaṅgaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1588_0: 17. Sugatiduggatīnaṃ, nibbānassa ca abhimukhaṃ pāpanato maggā, tesaṃ pathabhūtāni
tika-abh07t0:1588_1: aṅgāni, maggassa vā aṭṭhaṅgikassa aṅgāni maggaṅgāni. Sammā aviparītato passatīti
tika-abh07t0:1588_2: sammādiṭṭhi. Sā pana “atthi dinna”ntyādivasena dasavidhā, pariññādikiccavasena catubbidhā
tika-abh07t0:1588_3: vā. Sammā saṅkappenti etenāti sammāsaṅkappo. So nekkhammasaṅkappaabyāpādasaṅkappaavihiṃsāsaṅkappavasena
tika-abh07t0:1588_4: tividho. Sammāvācādayo heṭṭhā vibhāvitāva. Sammā vāyamanti etenāti sammāvāyāmo. Sammā
tika-abh07t0:1588_5: saranti etāyāti sammāsati. Imesaṃ pana bhedaṃ upari vakkhati. Sammā sāmañca ādhīyati
tika-abh07t0:1588_6: etena cittanti sammāsamādhi, paṭhamajjhānādivasena pañcavidhā ekaggatā. Micchādiṭṭhiādayo
tika-abh07t0:1589_1: jīvane jīvantehi kammajarūpasampayuttadhammehi, manane jānane sampayuttadhammehi,
tika-abh07t0:1589_2: sukhitādibhāve sukhitādīhi sahajātehi, saddahanādīsu saddahanādivasappavattehi teheva,
tika-abh07t0:1589_3: “anaññātaṃ ñassāmī”ti pavattiyaṃ tathāpavattehi sahajātehi, ājānane aññabhāvibhāve
tika-abh07t0:1589_4: ca ājānanādivasappavattehi sahajātehi attānaṃ anuvattāpentā dhammā issaraṭṭhena indriyāni
tika-abh07t0:1589_5: nāmāti āha “cakkhundriya”ntyādi. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aparepi indaliṅgaṭṭhādayo indriyaṭṭhā
tika-abh07t0:1589_6: vuttā. Jīvitindriyanti rūpārūpavasena duvidhaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ. “Anamatagge saṃsāre
tika-abh07t0:1589_7: anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ, catusaccadhammameva vā ñassāmī”ti evamajjhāsayena paṭipannassa
tika-abh07t0:1589_8: indriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Ājānāti paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā
tika-abh07t0:1589_9: jānāti indriyañcāti aññindriyaṃ. Aññātāvino cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitassa
tika-abh07t0:1590_0: Ettha ca sattapaññattiyā visesanissayattā ajjhattikāyatanāni ādito vuttāni, manindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1590_1: pana ajjhattikāyatanabhāvasāmaññena ettheva vattabbampi arūpindriyehi saha ekato
tika-abh07t0:1590_2: dassanatthaṃ jīvitindriyānantaraṃ vuttaṃ, sāyaṃ paññatti imesaṃ vasena “itthī puriso”ti
tika-abh07t0:1590_3: vibhāgaṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ bhāvadvayaṃ, tayime upādinnadhammā
tika-abh07t0:1590_4: imassa vasena tiṭṭhantīti dassanatthaṃ tato paraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ, sattasaññito dhammapuñjo
tika-abh07t0:1590_5: pabandhavasena pavattamāno imāhi vedanāhi saṃkilissatīti dassanatthaṃ tato vedanāpañcakaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1590_6: tāhi pana visuddhikāmānaṃ vodānasambhāradassanatthaṃ tato saddhādipañcakaṃ, sambhūtavodānasambhārā
tika-abh07t0:1590_7: ca imehi visujjhantīti visuddhippattā, niṭṭhitakiccā ca hontīti dassanatthaṃ ante
tika-abh07t0:1590_8: tīṇi vuttāni. Ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhīti aññesaṃ aggahaṇanti idametesaṃ anukkamena
tika-abh07t0:1591_1: akampiyaṭṭhena, sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca saddhādīni satta balāni, ahirikānottappadvayaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1592_0: 20. Attādhīnappavattīnaṃ patibhūtā dhammā adhipatī. “Chandavato kiṃnāma na sijjhatī”tyādikaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1592_1: hi pubbābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne citte chandādayo dhurabhūtā sayaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1592_2: sampayuttadhamme sādhayamānā hutvā pavattanti, te ca tesaṃ vasena pavattanti, tena
tika-abh07t0:1592_3: te attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena pavattanti. Aññesaṃ adhipatidhammānaṃ adhipatibhāvanivāraṇavasena
tika-abh07t0:1592_4: issariyaṃ adhipatitā. Santesupi indriyantaresu kevalaṃ dassanādīsu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi
tika-abh07t0:1593_0: 21. Ojaṭṭhamakarūpādayo āharantīti āhārā. Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ āharati,
tika-abh07t0:1593_1: phassāhāro tisso vedanā, manosañcetanāhārasaṅkhātaṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ tīsu bhavesu
tika-abh07t0:1593_3: sakasakapaccayuppanne āharantā aññepi atthi. Ajjhattikasantatiyā pana visesapaccayattā
tika-abh07t0:1594_0: Kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānañhi sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkārāhāro visesapaccayo kammādijanitassapi
tika-abh07t0:1594_2: “dhāti viya kumārassa, upatthambhanakayantaṃ viya gehassā”ti vutto. Phassopi sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1594_3: ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hoti. Manosañcetanā
tika-abh07t0:1594_4: kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo
tika-abh07t0:1594_5: hoti. Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hotīti
tika-abh07t0:1594_6: evameteyeva ajjhattasantānassa visesapaccayattā “āhārā”ti vuttā, phassādīnaṃ dutiyādibhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1595_0: 26. Pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vitakkavirahena ārammaṇesu abhinipātamattattā tesu vijjamānānipi
tika-abh07t0:1595_1: upekkhāsukhadukkhāni upanijjhānākārassa abhāvato jhānaṅgabhāvena na uddhaṭāni. “Vitakkapacchimakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1595_3: vīriyābhāvato tattha vijjamānopi samādhi balabhāvaṃ na gacchati. “Vīriyapacchimakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1595_4: bala”nti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā aṭṭhārasāhetukesu hetuvirahato maggaṅgāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t0:1595_5: “Hetupacchimakaṃ maggaṅga”nti hi vuttanti imamatthaṃ manasi nidhāyāha “dvipañcaviññāṇesū”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1596: 27. Adhimokkhavirahato vicikicchācitte ekaggatā cittaṭṭhitimattaṃ, na pana micchāsamādhisamādhindriyasamādhibalavohāraṃ gacchatīti āha “tathā vicikicchācitte”tyādi.
tika-abh07t0:1597_0: 28. Dvihetukatihetukaggahaṇena ekahetukesu adhipatīnaṃ abhāvaṃ dasseti. Javanesvevāti
tika-abh07t0:1597_1: avadhāraṇaṃ lokiyavipākesu adhipatīnaṃ asambhavadassanatthaṃ. Na hi te chandādīni
tika-abh07t0:1597_2: purakkhatvā pavattanti. Vīmaṃsādhipatino dvihetukajavanesu asambhavato cittābhisaṅkhārūpanissayassa
tika-abh07t0:1597_3: ca sambhavānurūpato labbhamānataṃ sandhāyāha “yathāsambhava”nti. Ekova labbhati,
tika-abh07t0:1597_4: itarathā adhipatibhāvāyogato, teneva hi bhagavatā “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1598_0: 29. Vatthuto dhammavasena hetudhammā cha, jhānaṅgāni pañca somanassadomanassupekkhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1598_1: vedanāvasena ekato gahitattā, maggaṅgā nava micchāsaṅkappavāyāmasamādhīnaṃ vitakkavīriyacittekaggatāsabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1598_2: sammāsaṅkappādīhi ekato gahitattā. Indriyadhammā soḷasa pañcannaṃ vedanindriyānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1598_3: vedanāsāmaññena, tiṇṇaṃ lokuttarindriyānaṃ paññindriyassa ca ñāṇasāmaññena ekato
tika-abh07t0:1598_4: gahitattā, rūpārūpajīvitindriyānañca visuṃ gahitattā, baladhammā pana yathāvuttanayeneva
tika-abh07t0:1598_5: nava īritā, adhipatidhammā cattāro vuttā, āhārā tathā cattāro vuttāti kusalādīhi
tika-abh07t0:1598_6: tīhi samākiṇṇo tatoyeva missakasaṅgaho evaṃnāmako saṅgaho sattadhā vutto. Ettha ca –
tika-abh07t0:1605_0: 30. Paṭṭhātīti paṭṭhānaṃ, asubhaggahaṇādivasena anupavisitvā kāyādiārammaṇe pavattatītyattho,
tika-abh07t0:1605_1: satiyeva paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ pana kāyavedanācittadhammesu asubhadukkhāniccānattākāraggahaṇavasena,
tika-abh07t0:1605_3: Kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo, sarīraṃ, assāsapassāsānaṃ vā samūho kāyo, tassa
tika-abh07t0:1605_4: anupassanā parikammavasena, vipassanāvasena ca saraṇaṃ kāyānupassanā. Dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhabhūtānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1605_5: vedanānaṃ vasena anupassanā vedanānupassanā. Tathā sarāgamahaggatādivasena sampayogabhūmibhedena
tika-abh07t0:1605_6: bhinnasseva cittassa anupassanā cittānupassanā. Saññāsaṅkhārānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhinnalakkhaṇānameva
tika-abh07t0:1606_0: 31. Sammā padahanti etenāti sammappadhānaṃ, vāyāmo. So ca kiccabhedena catubbidhoti
tika-abh07t0:1607: 32. Ijjhati adhiṭṭhānādikaṃ etāyāhi iddhi, iddhividhañāṇaṃ iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo, chandoyeva iddhipādo chandiddhipādo.
tika-abh07t0:1608_0: 35. Bujjhatīti bodhi, āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaro. Yāya vā so satiādikāya
tika-abh07t0:1608_1: dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhati saccāni paṭivijjhati, kilesaniddāto vā vuṭṭhāti, kilesasaṅkocābhāvato
tika-abh07t0:1608_2: vā maggaphalappattiyā vikasati, sā dhammasāmaggī bodhi, tassa bodhissa, tassā vā
tika-abh07t0:1608_3: bodhiyā aṅgabhūtā kāraṇabhūtāti bojjhaṅgā, te pana dhammavasena sattavidhāti āha
tika-abh07t0:1608_4: “satisambojjhaṅgo”tyādi. Satiyeva sundaro bojjhaṅgo, sundarassa vā bodhissa, sundarāya
tika-abh07t0:1608_5: vā bodhiyā aṅgoti satisambojjhaṅgo. Dhamme vicināti upaparikkhatīti dhammavicayo,
tika-abh07t0:1609_0: 40. “Sattadhā tattha saṅgaho”ti vatvāna puna taṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkappapassaddhi cā”tyādi
tika-abh07t0:1609_5: pañcakiccattā, saddhā dviṭṭhānā saddhindriyasaddhābalavasena dvikiccattā. Eso uttamānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1609_6: bodhipakkhiyabhāvena visiṭṭhānaṃ sattatiṃsa dhammānaṃ pavaro uttamo vibhāgo.
tika-abh07t0:1610_0: 41. Lokuttare aṭṭhavidhepi sabbe sattatiṃsa dhammā honti, saṅkappapītiyo na vā honti,
tika-abh07t0:1610_1: dutiyajjhānike saṅkappassa, catutthapañcamajjhānike pītiyā ca asambhavato na honti
tika-abh07t0:1610_2: vā, lokiyepi citte sīlavisuddhādi chabbisuddhipavattiyaṃ yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃkiccassa
tika-abh07t0:1610_3: anurūpavasena keci katthaci visuṃ visuṃ honti, katthaci na vā honti.
tika-abh07t0:1613_0: 42. Atītānāgatapaccuppannādibhedabhinnā te te sabhāgadhammā ekajjhaṃ rāsaṭṭhena khandhā.
tika-abh07t0:1613_1: Tenāha bhagavā – “tadekajjhaṃ abhisaṃyūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho”tyādi,
tika-abh07t0:1613_3: vuttāti āha “rūpakkhandho”tyādi. Rūpañhi vedanānissayattā bhājanaṭṭhāniyaṃ, vedanā
tika-abh07t0:1613_4: bhuñjitabbattā bhojanaṭṭhāniyā, saññā vedanāssādalābhahetuttā byañjanaṭṭhāniyā, saṅkhārā
tika-abh07t0:1613_6: Ettāvatā ca adhippetatthasiddhīti pañceva vuttā. Desanākkamepi idameva kāraṇaṃ yattha
tika-abh07t0:1613_7: bhuñjati, yañca bhuñjati, yena ca bhuñjati, yo ca bhojako, yo ca bhuñjitā, tesaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1614_0: 43. Upādānānaṃ gocarā khandhā upādānakkhandhā, te pana upādānavisayabhāvena gahitā
tika-abh07t0:1614_2: hi sāsavā, anāsavāpi dhammā avisesato “pañcakkhandhā”ti desitā. Vipassanābhūmisandassanatthaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1614_3: pana sāsavāva “upādānakkhandhā”ti. Yathā panettha vedanādayo sāsavā, anāsavā ca,
tika-abh07t0:1614_4: na evaṃ rūpaṃ, ekantakāmāvacarattā. Sabhāgarāsivasena pana taṃ khandhesu desitaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1614_5: upādāniyabhāvena, pana rāsivasena ca upādānakkhandhesūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1615_0: 44. Āyatanti ettha taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā tena tena kiccena ghaṭṭenti vāyamanti,
tika-abh07t0:1615_1: āyabhūte vā te dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārenti, āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ nayanti
tika-abh07t0:1615_2: pavattenti, cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtānīti vā āyatanāni. Apica loke nivāsaākarasamosaraṇasañjātiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1615_3: “āyatana”nti vuccati, tasmā etepi taṃtaṃdvārikānaṃ, taṃtadārammaṇānañca cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1615_4: nivāsaṭṭhānatāya, tesameva ākiṇṇabhāvena pavattānaṃ ākaraṭṭhānatāya, dvārārammaṇato
tika-abh07t0:1615_5: samosarantānaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānatāya, tattheva uppajjantānaṃ sañjātiṭṭhānatāya ca
tika-abh07t0:1615_6: āyatanāni. Tāni pana dvārabhūtāni ajjhattikāyatanāni cha, ārammaṇabhūtāni ca bāhirāyatanāni
tika-abh07t0:1615_7: chāti dvādasavidhānīti āha “cakkhāyatana”ntyādi. Cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh07t0:1616_1: taṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ, tadanantaraṃ anidassanasappaṭighārammaṇāni itarāni, tatthāpi
tika-abh07t0:1616_2: asampattaggāhakasāmaññena cakkhāyatanānantaraṃ sotāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ, itaresu sīghataraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1616_3: ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthattā ghānāyatanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. Purato ṭhapitamattassa hi
tika-abh07t0:1616_4: bhojanādikassa gandho vātānusārena ghāne paṭihaññati, tadanantaraṃ pana padesavuttisāmaññena
tika-abh07t0:1616_5: jivhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ, tato sabbaṭṭhānikaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ, tato pañcannampi gocaraggahaṇasamatthaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1616_6: manāyatanaṃ, yathāvuttānaṃ pana anukkamena tesaṃ tesaṃ ārammaṇāni rūpāyatanādīni vuttāni.
tika-abh07t0:1617_0: 45. Attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo. Atha vā yathāsambhavaṃ anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1617_1: vidahanti, bhārahārehi viya ca bhāro sattehi dhīyanti dhāriyanti, avasavattanato
tika-abh07t0:1617_2: dukkhavidhānamattameva cetā, sattehi ca saṃsāradukkhaṃ anuvidhīyati etāhi, tathāvihitañca
tika-abh07t0:1617_3: etāsveva mīyati ṭhapiyati, rasasoṇitādisarīrāvayavadhātuyo viya, haritālamanosilādiselāvayavadhātuyo
tika-abh07t0:1617_4: viya ca ñeyyāvayavabhūtā cāti dhātuyo. Yathāhu –
tika-abh07t0:1619: Etāya dhīyate ettha, iti vā dhātusammatā;
tika-abh07t0:1621: Tā pana manāyatanaṃ sattaviññāṇadhātuvasena sattadhā bhinditvā avasesehi ekādasāyatanehi saha aṭṭhārasadhātū vuttāti āha “cakkhudhātū”tyādi. Kamakāraṇaṃ vuttanayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1622_0: 46. Ariyakarattā ariyāni, tacchabhāvato saccānīti ariyasaccāni. Imāni hi cattāro
tika-abh07t0:1622_1: paṭipannake, cattāro phalaṭṭheti aṭṭhaariyapuggale sādhenti asati saccappaṭivedhe
tika-abh07t0:1622_2: tesaṃ ariyabhāvānupagamanato, sati ca tasmiṃ ekantena tabbhāvūpagamanato ca. Dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggānameva
tika-abh07t0:1622_3: pana yathākkamaṃ bādhakattaṃ pabhavattaṃ nissaraṇattaṃ niyyānikattaṃ, nāññesaṃ, bādhakādibhāvoyeva
tika-abh07t0:1622_4: ca dukkhādīnaṃ, na abādhakādibhāvo, tasmā aññatthābhāvatatthabyāpitāsaṅkhātena lakkhaṇena
tika-abh07t0:1627_0: Ariyānaṃ vā saccāni tehi paṭivijjhitabbattā, ariyassa vā sammāsambuddhassa saccāni
tika-abh07t0:1627_1: tena desitattāti ariyasaccāni. Tāni pana saṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkiliṭṭhaphalahetuvasena catubbidhānīti
tika-abh07t0:1627_2: āha “cattāri ariyasaccānī”tyādi. Tattha kucchitattā, tucchattā ca dukkhaṃ. Kammādipaccayasanniṭṭhāne
tika-abh07t0:1627_3: dukkhuppattinimittatāya samudayo samudeti etasmā dukkhanti katvā, dukkhassa samudayo
tika-abh07t0:1627_4: dukkhasamudayo. Dukkhassa anuppādanirodho ettha, etenāti vā dukkhanirodho. Dukkhanirodhaṃ
