tika-abh07t0:1628: 47. Cetasikānaṃ, soḷasasukhumarūpānaṃ, nibbānassa ca vasena ekūnasattati dhammā āyatanesu dhammāyatanaṃ, dhātūsu dhammadhātūti ca saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:1629_0: 49. Sesā cetasikāti vedanāsaññāhi sesā paññāsa cetasikā. Kasmā pana vedanāsaññā visuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1629_1: katāti? Vaṭṭadhammesu assādatadupakaraṇabhāvato. Tebhūmakadhammesu hi assādavasappavattā
tika-abh07t0:1629_2: vedanā, asubhe subhādisaññāvipallāsavasena ca tassā tadākārappavattīti tadupakaraṇabhūtā
tika-abh07t0:1629_3: saññā, tasmā saṃsārassa padhānahetutāya etā vinibhujjitvā desitāti. Vuttañhetaṃ ācariyena –
tika-abh07t0:1632_0: 50. Nanu ca āyatanadhātūsu nibbānaṃ saṅgahitaṃ, khandhesu kasmā na saṅgahitanti āha
tika-abh07t0:1633_0: 51. Channaṃ dvārānaṃ, channaṃ ārammaṇānañca bhedena āyatanāni dvādasa bhavanti, channaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1633_1: dvārānaṃ channaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ tadubhayaṃ nissāya uppannānaṃ tattakānameva viññāṇānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1634_0: 52. Tisso bhūmiyo imassāti tibhūmaṃ, tibhūmaṃyeva tebhūmakaṃ. Vattati ettha kammaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1634_1: tabbipāko cāti vaṭṭaṃ. Taṇhāti kāmataṇhādivasena tividhā, puna chaḷārammaṇavasena
tika-abh07t0:1634_3: aṭṭhasatappabhedā taṇhā. Kasmā pana aññesupi dukkhahetūsu santesu taṇhāyeva samudayoti
tika-abh07t0:1634_5: ca dukkhavicittatākāraṇattā taṇhā dukkhassa visesakāraṇanti. Maggo dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadānāmena
tika-abh07t0:1634_6: vutto maggo lokuttaro matoti maggoti puna maggaggahaṇaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1635_0: 53. Maggayuttā aṭṭhaṅgikavinimuttā sesā maggasampayuttā phassādayo phalañceva sasampayuttanti
tika-abh07t0:1635_1: ete catūhi saccehi vinissaṭā viniggatā nippariyāyato, pariyāyato pana aññātāvindriyaniddesepi
tika-abh07t0:1635_3: itaresañca maggaphalasampayuttānaṃ saṅkhāradukkhasāmaññena dukkhasacce saṅgaho sakkā
tika-abh07t0:1635_4: kātuṃ. Evañhi sati saccadesanāyapi sabbasaṅgāhikatā upapannā hoti. Kasmā panete khandhādayo
tika-abh07t0:1635_5: bahū dhammā vuttāti? Bhagavatāpi tatheva desitattā. Bhagavatāpi kasmā tathā desitāti?
tika-abh07t0:1635_7: saṅkhittamajjhimavitthārarucivasena ca tividhā sattā. Tesu nāmasammuḷhānaṃ khandhaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1635_8: nāmassa tattha catudhā vibhattattā, rūpasammuḷhānaṃ āyatanaggahaṇaṃ rūpassa tattha
tika-abh07t0:1635_9: aḍḍhekādasadhā vibhattattā, ubhayamuḷhānaṃ dhātuggahaṇaṃ ubhayesampi tattha vitthārato
tika-abh07t0:1635_10: vibhattattā, tathā tikkhindriyānaṃ, saṅkhittarucikānañca khandhāggahaṇantyādi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1635_11: Taṃ panetaṃ tividhampi pavattinivattitadubhayahetuvasena diṭṭhameva upakārāvahaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1640_1: “yesa”ntyādi āraddhaṃ. Yesaṃ paccayehi saṅkhatattā saṅkhatānaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1640_2: ye paccayadhammā yathā yenākārena paccayā ṭhitiyā, uppattiyā ca upakārakā, taṃ vibhāgaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1640_3: tesaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ, tesaṃ paccayānaṃ, tassa ca paccayākārassa pabhedaṃ iha imasmiṃ
tika-abh07t0:1640_4: samuccayasaṅgahānantare ṭhāne yathārahaṃ taṃtaṃpaccayuppannadhamme sati taṃtaṃpaccayānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1641_0: 2. Tattha paccayasāmaggiṃ paṭicca samaṃ gantvā phalānaṃ uppādo etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādo,
tika-abh07t0:1641_1: paccayākāro. Nānappakārāni ṭhānāni paccayā etthātyādinā paṭṭhānaṃ, anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1642_0: 3. Tatthāti tesu dvīsu nayesu. Tassa paccayadhammassa bhāvena bhavanasīlassa bhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1642_1: tabbhāvabhāvībhāvo, soyeva ākāramattaṃ, tena upalakkhito tabbhāvabhāvībhāvākāramattopalakkhito.
tika-abh07t0:1642_2: Eteneva tadabhāvābhāvākāramattopalakkhitatāpi atthato dassitā hoti. Anvayabyatirekavasena
tika-abh07t0:1642_3: hi paccayalakkhaṇaṃ dassetabbaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā – “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā
tika-abh07t0:1642_4: idamuppajjati. Imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti. Paṭicca
tika-abh07t0:1642_5: phalaṃ eti etasmāti paccayo. Tiṭṭhati phalaṃ ettha tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhiti, āhacca
tika-abh07t0:1642_6: visesetvā pavattā paccayasaṅkhātā ṭhiti āhaccapaccayaṭṭhiti. Paṭiccasamuppādanayo
tika-abh07t0:1642_7: hi tabbhāvabhāvībhāvākāramattaṃ upādāya pavattattā hetādipaccayaniyamavisesaṃ anapekkhitvā
tika-abh07t0:1642_8: avisesatova pavattati, ayaṃ pana hetāditaṃtaṃpaccayānaṃ tassa tassa dhammantarassa
tika-abh07t0:1642_10: pavuccatīti. Keci pana “āhacca kaṇṭhatāluādīsu paharitvā vuttā ṭhiti āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitī”ti
tika-abh07t0:1642_11: vaṇṇenti. Taṃ pana savanamatteneva tesaṃ avahasitabbavacanataṃ pakāseti. Na hi paṭiccasamuppādanayo,
tika-abh07t0:1642_12: añño vā koci nayo kaṇṭhatāluādīsu anāhacca desetuṃ sakkāti. Vomissetvāti paṭṭhānanayampi
tika-abh07t0:1642_13: paṭiccasamuppādeyeva pakkhipitvā tabbhāvabhāvībhāvena hetādipaccayavasena ca missetvā
tika-abh07t0:1642_14: ācariyā saṅgahakārādayo papañcenti vitthārenti, mayaṃ pana visuṃ visuṃyeva dassayissāmātyadhippāyo.
tika-abh07t0:1644_0: 4. Na vijānātīti avijjā, avindiyaṃ vā kāyaduccaritādiṃ vindati paṭilabhati, vindiyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1644_1: vā kāyasucaritādiṃ na vindati, veditabbaṃ vā catusaccādikaṃ na viditaṃ karoti, avijjamāne
tika-abh07t0:1644_2: vā javāpeti, vijjamāne vā na javāpetīti avijjā, catūsu ariyasaccesu pubbantādīsu
tika-abh07t0:1644_3: catūsu aññāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Avijjā eva paccayo avijjāpaccayo. Tato avijjāpaccayā saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti
tika-abh07t0:1644_4: saṅkhārā, kusalākusalakammāni. Te tividhā puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti.
tika-abh07t0:1644_5: Tatthakāmarūpāvacarā terasa kusalacetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro, dvādasa akusalacetanā
tika-abh07t0:1644_6: apuññābhisaṅkhāro, catasso āruppacetanā āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti evametā ekūnatiṃsa cetanā
tika-abh07t0:1644_7: saṅkhārā nāma. Paṭisandhivasena ekūnavīsatividhaṃ, pavattivasena dvattiṃsavidhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1644_8: vipākacittaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāma. Nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpaṃ. Tattha nāmaṃ idha vedanādikkhandhattayaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1644_9: rūpaṃ pana bhūtupādāyabhedato duvidhaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ, tadubhayampi idha paṭisandhiviññāṇasahagatanti
tika-abh07t0:1644_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nāmarūpapaccayāti ettha nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti sarūpekaseso
tika-abh07t0:1644_11: veditabbo. Cakkhādīni cha ajjhattikāyatanāni, kesañci matena rūpādīni cha bāhirāyatanānipi
tika-abh07t0:1644_12: vā āyatanaṃ nāma. Cha āyatanāni ca chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanaṃ. Cakkhusamphassādivasena
tika-abh07t0:1644_13: chadvāriko phasso phasso nāma. Sukhadukkhupekkhāvasena tividhā vedanā.
tika-abh07t0:1645_0: Kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti tividhā taṇhā. Chaḷārammaṇādivasena pana aṭṭhasatappabhedā
tika-abh07t0:1645_1: honti kāmupādānādivasena cattāri upādānāni. Ettha ca dubbalā taṇhā taṇhā nāma, balavatī
tika-abh07t0:1645_2: upādānaṃ. Asampattavisayapatthanā vā taṇhā tamasi corānaṃ hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya,
tika-abh07t0:1645_3: sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ corānaṃ hatthappattassa gahaṇaṃ viya. Appicchatāpaṭipakkhā
tika-abh07t0:1645_4: taṇhā, santosappaṭipakkhaṃ upādānaṃ. Pariyesanadukkhamūlaṃ taṇhā, ārakkhadukkhamūlaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1645_5: upādānanti ayametesaṃ viseso. Kammabhavo upapattibhavoti duvidho bhavo. Tattha paṭhamo
tika-abh07t0:1645_6: bhavati etasmā phalanti bhavo, so kāmāvacarakusalākusalādivasena ekūnatiṃsavidho.
tika-abh07t0:1645_7: Dutiyo pana bhavatīti bhavo, so kāmabhavādivasena navavidho. Upādānapaccayā bhavoti
tika-abh07t0:1645_8: cettha upapattibhavopi adhippeto. Bhavapaccayā jātīti kammabhavova. So hi jātiyā
tika-abh07t0:1645_9: paccayo hoti, na itaro. So hi paṭhamābhinibbattakkhandhasabhāvo jātiyeva, na ca tadeva
tika-abh07t0:1645_10: tassa kāraṇaṃ yuttaṃ. Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ taṃtaṃgatiādīsu attabhāvapaṭilābho jāti.
tika-abh07t0:1645_11: Tathānibbattassa ca attabhāvassa purāṇabhāvo jarā. Etasseva ekabhavaparicchinnassa
tika-abh07t0:1645_12: pariyosānaṃ maraṇaṃ. Ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo soko. Tasseva vacīpalāpo
tika-abh07t0:1645_13: paridevo. Kāyikadukkhavedanā dukkhaṃ. Mānasikadukkhavedanā domanassaṃ. Ñātibyasanādīhi
tika-abh07t0:1646_0: Ettha ca satipi vatthārammaṇādike paccayantare avijjādiekekapaccayaggahaṇaṃ padhānabhāvato,
tika-abh07t0:1646_1: pākaṭabhāvato cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca avijjānusayiteyeva santāne saṅkhārānaṃ vipākadhammabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1646_2: pavattanato avijjāpaccayāsaṅkhārāsambhavanti, viññāṇañca saṅkhārajanitaṃ hutvā bhavantare
tika-abh07t0:1646_3: patiṭṭhāti. Na hi janakābhāve tassuppatti siyā, tasmā saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ. Nāmarūpañca
tika-abh07t0:1646_5: saḷāyatanañca nāmarūpanissayameva chabbidhaphassassa dvārabhāvena yathārahaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh07t0:1646_6: no aññathāti nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ. Phasso ca saḷāyatanasambhaveyeva ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1646_7: phusati. Na hi dvārābhāve tassuppatti siyāti saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattañca
tika-abh07t0:1646_8: ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva vedanaṃ vedayati, no aññathāti phassapaccayā vedanā. Vedanīyesu
tika-abh07t0:1646_9: ca dhammesu assādānupassino vedanāhetukā taṇhā samuṭṭhātīti vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.
tika-abh07t0:1646_10: Taṇhāsinehapipāsitāyeva ca upādāniyesu dhammesu upādāya daḷhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-abh07t0:1646_11: Taṇhāya hi rūpādīni assādetvā assādetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjantīti taṇhā kāmupādānassa
tika-abh07t0:1646_12: paccayo. Tathā rūpādibhedegadhito “natthi dinna”ntyādinā micchādassanaṃ saṃsārato
tika-abh07t0:1646_13: muccitukāmo asuddhimagge suddhimaggaparāmāsaṃ khandhesu attattaniyagāhabhūtaṃ attavādadassanadvayañca
tika-abh07t0:1646_14: gaṇhāti, tasmā diṭṭhupādādīnampi paccayoti taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ. Yathārahaṃ sampayogānusayavasena
tika-abh07t0:1646_15: upādānapatiṭṭhitāyeva sattā kammāyūhanāya saṃvattantīti upādānaṃ bhavassa paccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1646_16: Upapattibhavasaṅkhātā ca jāti kammabhavahetukāyeva. Bījato aṅkuro viya tattha tattha
tika-abh07t0:1646_17: samupalabbhatīti bhavo jātiyā paccayo nāma. Sati ca jātiyā eva jarāmaraṇasambhavo.
tika-abh07t0:1646_18: Na hi ajātānaṃ jarāmaraṇasambhavo hotīti jāti jarāmaraṇānaṃ paccayoti evametesaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1647_0: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti yathāvuttena paccayaparamparavidhinā,
tika-abh07t0:1647_1: na pana issaranimmānādīhi etassa vaṭṭasaṅkhātassa kevalassa sukhādīhi asammissassa,
tika-abh07t0:1647_2: sakalassa vā dukkhakkhandhassa dukkharāsissa na sukhasubhādīnaṃ samudayo nibbatti
tika-abh07t0:1648: 5. Atati satataṃ gacchati pavattatīti addhā, kālo.
tika-abh07t0:1649_0: 6. Avijjāsaṅkhārā atīto addhā atītabhavapariyāpannahetūnamevettha adhippetattā, addhāggahaṇena
tika-abh07t0:1649_1: ca avijjādīnaṃ dhammānameva gahaṇaṃ tabbinimuttassa kassaci kālassa anupalabbhanato.
tika-abh07t0:1649_2: Niruddhānuppādā eva hi dhammā atītānāgatakālavasena uppādādikkhaṇattayapariyāpannā
tika-abh07t0:1649_3: ca paccuppannakālavasena voharīyanti. Jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato addhā paccuppannahetuto
tika-abh07t0:1649_4: anāgate nibbattanato. Majjhe paccuppanno addhā atītahetuto idha nibbattanakaphalasabhāvattā,
tika-abh07t0:1649_5: anāgataphalassa idha hetusabhāvattā ca majjhe viññāṇādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni paccuppanno addhā.
tika-abh07t0:1650: 8. Nanu sokaparidevādayopi aṅgabhāvena vattabbāti āha “sokādivacana”ntyādi. Sokādivacanaṃ jātiyā nissandassa amukhyaphalamattassa nidassanaṃ, na pana visuṃ aṅgadassanantyattho.
tika-abh07t0:1651_0: 9. Taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā hontīti kilesabhāvasāmaññato avijjāggahaṇena taṇhupādānāni,
tika-abh07t0:1651_1: kammabhavasāmaññato saṅkhāraggahaṇena kammabhavo gahito. Tathā taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena
tika-abh07t0:1651_2: ca avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāti sambandho. Etthāpi vuttanayena tesaṃ gahaṇena tesaṃ saṅgaho
tika-abh07t0:1652_0: 10. Atīte hetavo pañcāti sarūpato vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ, saṅgahavasena
tika-abh07t0:1652_1: gahitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ taṇhupādānabhavānañca vasena paccuppannaphalassa paccayā atītabhave
tika-abh07t0:1652_2: nibbattā hetavo pañca, idāni phalapañcakanti atītahetupaccayā idha paccuppanne nibbattaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1652_3: viññāṇādiphalapañcakaṃ. Idāni hetavo pañcāti sarūpato vuttānaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1652_4: saṅgahato laddhānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ dvinnañca vasena āyatiṃ phalassa paccayā idāni
tika-abh07t0:1652_5: hetavo pañca. Āyatiṃ phalapañcakanti jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇena vuttaṃ paccuppannahetupaccayā
tika-abh07t0:1652_6: anāgate nibbattanakaviññāṇādiphalapañcakanti evaṃ vīsati atītādīsu tattha tattha ākiriyantīti ākārā.
tika-abh07t0:1653_0: Atītahetūnaṃ, idāni phalapañcakassa ca antarā eko sandhi, idāni phalapañcakassa,
tika-abh07t0:1653_1: idāni hetūnañca antarā eko, idāni hetūnaṃ, āyatiṃ phalassa ca antarā ekoti evaṃ tisandhi.
tika-abh07t0:1653_3: eko sandhī”ti. Ettha hi hetutophalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato hetuphalasambandhabhūto
tika-abh07t0:1653_4: paṭhamo sandhi, tathā tatiyo, dutiyo pana phalato hetuno avicchedappavattibhāvato
tika-abh07t0:1653_5: phalahetusambandhabhūto. Phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa dhammassa
tika-abh07t0:1653_6: paccayoti. Saṅkhipīyanti ettha avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo cāti saṅkhepo, atītahetu,
tika-abh07t0:1653_7: etarahi vipāko, etarahi hetu āyatiṃ vipākoti cattāro saṅkhepāti catusaṅkhepā.
tika-abh07t0:1654_0: 11. Kammabhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadesoti ettha āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā bhavo
tika-abh07t0:1654_1: nāma, purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā saṅkhārāti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:1654_3: vuttadhammā. Upapattibhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadesoti pana anāgatapariyāpannā veditabbā.
tika-abh07t0:1655: 12. Pubbantassa avijjā mūlaṃ. Aparantassa taṇhā mūlanti āha avijjātaṇhāvasena dve mūlānī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1656_1: saccappaṭivedhato siddhāya appavattiyā vaṭṭaṃ nirujjhati. Abhiṇhaso abhikkhaṇaṃ jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātāya
tika-abh07t0:1656_2: mucchāya pīḷitānaṃ sattānaṃ sokādisamappitānaṃ kāmāsavādiāsavānaṃ samuppādato puna
tika-abh07t0:1656_3: avijjā ca pavattati. “Āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Etena avijjāyapi
tika-abh07t0:1656_4: paccayo dassito hoti, itarathā paṭiccasamuppādacakkaṃ abaddhaṃ siyāti. Iccevaṃ vuttanayena
tika-abh07t0:1656_5: ābaddhaṃ avicchinnaṃ anādikaṃ ādirahitaṃ tibhūmakapariyāpannattā tebhūmakaṃ kilesakammavipākavasena
tika-abh07t0:1656_6: tivaṭṭabhūtaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti paṭṭhapesi paññapesi mahāmuni sammāsambuddho.
tika-abh07t0:1659_0: 14. Evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādanayaṃ vibhāgato dassetvā idāni paṭṭhānanayaṃ dassetuṃ “hetupaccayo”tyādi
tika-abh07t0:1659_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha hinoti patiṭṭhāti etenāti hetu. Anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ hi-saddo
tika-abh07t0:1659_2: idha patiṭṭhatthoti daṭṭhabbo. Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantena
tika-abh07t0:1659_3: mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati pavattati vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ āpajjatīti
tika-abh07t0:1659_4: hetu. Hetu ca so paccayo cāti hetupaccayo. Hetu hutvā paccayo, hetubhāvena paccayoti
tika-abh07t0:1659_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Mūlaṭṭhena hetu, upakāraṭṭhena paccayoti saṅkhepato mūlaṭṭhena upakārako
tika-abh07t0:1659_6: dhammo hetupaccayo. So pana pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ, paṭisandhiyaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānañca
tika-abh07t0:1659_7: rūpānaṃ ubhayattha sampayuttānaṃ nāmadhammānañca rukkhassa mūlāni viya suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanasaṅkhātamūlaṭṭhena
tika-abh07t0:1660_0: Ālambīyati dubbalena viya daṇḍādikaṃ cittacetasikehi gayhatīti ārammaṇaṃ. Cittacetasikā
tika-abh07t0:1660_1: hi yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha pavattanti, te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo
tika-abh07t0:1660_2: nāma. Na hi so dhammo atthi, yo cittacetasikānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvaṃ na gaccheyya.
tika-abh07t0:1661_0: Na vijjati paccayuppannena saha antaraṃ etassa paccayassāti anantarapaccayo. Saṇṭhānābhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1661_1: suṭṭhu anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo. Attano attano anantaraṃ anurūpacittuppādajananasamattho
tika-abh07t0:1661_3: Byañjanamatteneva hi nesaṃ viseso. Atthato pana ubhayampi samanantaraniruddhassevādhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1661_4: Na hi tesaṃ atthato bhedo upalabbhati. Yaṃ pana keci vadanti “atthānantaratāya anantarapaccayo,
tika-abh07t0:1661_7: hi sattāhādikālaṃ niruddhaṃ phalasamāpattiyā samanantarapaccayo, tasmā abhinivesaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1661_8: akatvā byañjanamattatovettha nānākaraṇaṃ paccetabbaṃ, na atthato. Pubbadhammanirodhassa
tika-abh07t0:1661_9: hi pacchājātadhammuppādanassa ca antarābhāvena uppādanasamatthatāya nirodho anantarapaccayatā,
tika-abh07t0:1661_10: “idamito uddhaṃ, idaṃ heṭṭhā, idaṃ samantato”ti attanā ekattaṃ upanetvā viya suṭṭhu
tika-abh07t0:1661_11: anantarabhāvena uppādetuṃ samatthaṃ hutvā nirodho samanantarapaccayatāti evaṃ byañjanamattatova
tika-abh07t0:1661_12: bhedo. Nirodhapaccayassapi hi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa asaññuppattiyā purimassa
tika-abh07t0:1661_13: ca cuticittassa kālantarepi uppajjantānaṃ phalapaṭisandhīnaṃ antarā samānajātiyena
tika-abh07t0:1661_15: asamatthatāya nirantaruppādane ekattaṃ upanetvā viya uppādane ca samatthatā atthīti
tika-abh07t0:1661_16: tesampi anantarasamanantarapaccayatā labbhati, tasmā dhammato avisesepi tathā tathā
tika-abh07t0:1661_17: bujjhanakānaṃ veneyyānaṃ vasena upasaggatthavisesamattatova bhedo paccetabboti.
tika-abh07t0:1662_0: Attano anuppattiyā sahuppannānampi anuppattito pakāsassa padīpo viya sahuppannānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1662_1: sahuppādabhāvena paccayo sahajātapaccayo, arūpino catukkhandhā, cattāro mahābhūtā,
tika-abh07t0:1663_0: Aññamaññaṃ upatthambhayamānaṃ tidaṇḍaṃ viya attano upakārakadhammānaṃ upatthambhakabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1663_1: paccayo aññamaññapaccayo. Aññamaññatāvaseneva ca upakārakatā aññamaññapaccayatā,
tika-abh07t0:1663_2: na sahajātamattenāti ayametesaṃ dvinnaṃ viseso. Tathā hi sahajātapaccayabhāvīyeva
tika-abh07t0:1663_3: koci aññamaññapaccayo na hoti cittajarūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayabhāvino nāmassa upādārūpānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1663_5: hi sahajātabhāveneva attano upakārakānaṃ upakārakatā aññamaññapaccayatā siyā, tadā
tika-abh07t0:1664_0: Cittakammassa paṭo viya sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ nissayabhūtā catukkhandhā, tarupabbatādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1664_1: pathavī viya ādhāraṇatoyeva sahajātarūpasattaviññāṇadhātūnaṃ yathākkamaṃ nissayā
tika-abh07t0:1664_2: bhūtarūpaṃ, vatthu cāti ime nissayapaccayo nāma nissīyati nissitakehīti katvā, balavabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1664_3: nissayo paccayo upanissayapaccayo upa-saddassa atisayajotakattā, tassa pana bhedaṃ vakkhati.
tika-abh07t0:1665_0: Cha vatthūni, cha ārammaṇāni cāti ime paccayuppannato paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pavattamānabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1665_1: upakārako purejātapaccayo. Pacchājātapaccaye asati santānaṭṭhitihetubhāvaṃ āgacchantassa
tika-abh07t0:1665_2: kāyassa upatthambhanabhāvena upakārakā pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā pacchājātapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1665_3: So gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsā cetanā viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t0:1666_2: sajātiyadhammāva āsevanapaccayo. Bhinnajātikā hi bhinnajātikehi āsevanapaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1666_3: kusalādibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attano gatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ na sakkonti, na ca sayaṃ tato gaṇhanti,
tika-abh07t0:1666_4: te pana anantarātītāni lokiyakusalākusalāni ceva anāvajjanakiriyajavanāni cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1667_1: vipākacittacetasikā vipākapaccayo. Te hi payogena asādhetabbatāya kammassa kaṭattā
tika-abh07t0:1667_2: nipphajjamānamattato nirussāhasantabhāvā honti, na kilesavūpasamasantabhāvā. Tathā
tika-abh07t0:1667_4: pana vipākā dubbiññeyyāva. Javanappavattiyāva nesaṃ rūpādiggahitatā viññāyati.
tika-abh07t0:1668_0: Rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattena upakārakā cattāro āhārā āhārapaccayo. Satipi hi janakabhāve
tika-abh07t0:1668_1: upatthambhakattameva āhārassa padhānakiccaṃ. Janayantopi āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhento
tika-abh07t0:1668_2: va janetīti upatthambhakabhāvo va āhārabhāvo. Tesu tesu kiccesu paccayuppannadhammehi
tika-abh07t0:1669_1: jhānapaccayo. Sugatito puññato, duggahito pāpato vā niyyānaṭṭhena upakārakā sammādiṭṭhādayo maggapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1670_1: upakārakā nāmadhammā va sampayuttapaccayo. Aññamaññasambandhatāya yuttāpi samānā
tika-abh07t0:1670_2: vippayuttabhāvena visaṃsaṭṭhatāya nānattupagamanena upakārakā vatthucittacetasikā vippayuttapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1671_1: upakārakā “sahajātaṃ purejāta”ntyādinā vakkhamānadhammā atthipaccayo. Satipi hi janakatte
tika-abh07t0:1671_2: ṭhitiyaṃyeva sātisayo atthipaccayānaṃ byāpāroti upatthambhakatāva tesaṃ gahitā. Ekasmiṃ
tika-abh07t0:1671_3: phassādisamudāye pavattamāne dutiyassa abhāvato attano ṭhitiyā okāsaṃ alabhantānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1672_0: Attano sabhāvāvigamanena appavattamānānaṃ vigatabhāvena upakārakāyeva dhammā vigatapaccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1672_1: Nirodhānupagamanavasena upakārakā atthipaccayā va avigatapaccayo. Sasabhāvatāmattena
tika-abh07t0:1672_3: paccayatāviseso nesaṃ dhammāvisesepi daṭṭhabbo. Dhammānañhi samatthatāvisesaṃ sabbākārena
tika-abh07t0:1672_4: ñatvā bhagavatā catuvīsatipaccayā desitāti bhagavati saddhāya “evaṃ visesā ete dhammā”ti
tika-abh07t0:1672_5: sutamayañāṇaṃ uppādetvā cintābhāvanāmayañāṇehi tadabhisamayāya yogo karaṇīyo. Avisesepi
tika-abh07t0:1672_6: hi dhammasāmaggiyassa tathā tathā vinetabbapuggalānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā vuttopi paccayo
tika-abh07t0:1672_7: puna pakārantena vuccati ahetukadukaṃ vatvāpi hetuvippayuttadukaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1673_0: 15. Nāmaṃ catukkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ nāmaṃ tādisasseva nāmassa chadhā chahākārehi paccayo
tika-abh07t0:1673_1: hoti, tadeva nāmarūpīnaṃ samuditānaṃ pañcadhā paccayo hoti, rūpassa puna bhūtupādāyabhedassa
tika-abh07t0:1673_2: ekadhā paccayo hoti, rūpañca nāmassa ekadhā paccayo, paññattināmarūpāni nāmassa dvidhā
tika-abh07t0:1673_3: dvippakārā paccayā honti, dvayaṃ pana nāmarūpadvayaṃ samuditaṃ dvayassa tādisasseva
tika-abh07t0:1673_4: nāmarūpadvayassa navadhā paccayo ceti evaṃ paccayā chabbidhā ṭhitā.
tika-abh07t0:1674_0: 16. Vipākabyākataṃ kammavasena vipākabhāvappattaṃ kammavegakkhittapatitaṃ viya hutvā
tika-abh07t0:1674_1: pavattamānaṃ attano sabhāvaṃ gāhetvā paribhāvetvā neva aññaṃ pavatteti, na ca purimavipākānubhāvaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1674_2: gahetvā uppajjati. “Na maggapaccayā āsevane eka”nti vacanato ca ahetukakiriyesu hasituppādasseva
tika-abh07t0:1674_3: āsevanatāuddharaṇena āvajjanadvayaṃ āsevanapaccayo na hoti, tasmā javanāneva āsevanapaccayabhāvaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1675_0: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ paṭṭhānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “lokuttaro pana āsevanapaccayo nāma natthī”ti.
tika-abh07t0:1675_1: Tattha hi kusalaṃ bhinnajātikassa purecarattā na tena āsevanaguṇaṃ gaṇhāpeti, phalacittāni
tika-abh07t0:1675_2: ca javanavasena uppajjamānānipi vipākābyākate vuttanayena āsevanaṃ na gaṇhanti, na
tika-abh07t0:1675_3: ca aññaṃ gāhāpenti. Yampi “āsevanavinimuttaṃ javanaṃ natthī”ti ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-abh07t0:1675_4: vuttaṃ, tampi yebhuyyavasena vuttanti viññāyati. Itarathā ācariyassa asamapekkhitābhidhāyakattappasaṅgo
tika-abh07t0:1675_5: siyā. Maggo pana gotrabhuto āsevanaṃ na gaṇhātīti natthi bhūmiādivasena nānājātitāya
tika-abh07t0:1675_6: anadhippetattā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ paṭṭhāne “gotrabhu maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh07t0:1676_0: 17. Hetujhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni sahajātānaṃ nāma rūpānanti tayopete paṭisandhiyaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1676_1: pavattiyaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ, ubhayattha sahajātānaṃ nāmānañca hetādipaccayena
tika-abh07t0:1676_2: paccayā honti. “Sahajātarūpanti hi sabbattha paṭisandhiyaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ, pavattiyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1676_3: cittasamuṭṭhānāna”nti vakkhati. Sahajātā cetanāti antamaso cakkhuviññāṇādīhipi sahajātacetanā.
tika-abh07t0:1676_4: Sahajātānaṃ nāma rūpānanti sabbāpi cetanā nāmānaṃ, paṭisandhisahagatā cetanā kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1676_6: cetanāti vipākakkhaṇato nānākkhaṇe atītabhavādīsu nibbattā kusalākusalacetanā. Nāmarūpānanti
tika-abh07t0:1676_7: ubhayatthāpi nāmarūpānaṃ. Vipākakkhandhāti paṭisandhiviññāṇādikā vipākā arūpakkhandhā.
tika-abh07t0:1676_8: Kammasamuṭṭhānampi hi rūpaṃ vipākavohāraṃ na labhati arūpadhammabhāvena, sārammaṇabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1677_0: 18. Purejātassa imassa kāyassāti paccayadhammato pure uppannassa imassa rūpakāyassa.
tika-abh07t0:1677_1: Kathaṃ pana paccayuppannassa pure nibbattiyaṃ pacchājātassa paccayatāti? Nanu vuttaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1677_3: hetubhāvupatthambhane imassa byāpāroti na koci virodho.
tika-abh07t0:1678_0: 19. Paṭisandhiyaṃ cakkhādivatthūnaṃ asambhavato, sati ca sambhave taṃtaṃviññāṇānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1678_1: paccayabhāvānupagamanato, hadayavatthuno ca paṭisandhiviññāṇena sahuppannassa purejātakatābhāvato
tika-abh07t0:1678_3: ārammaṇapurejātaniddese āgataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pañhāvāre pana “sekkhā vā puthujjanā
tika-abh07t0:1678_4: vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantī”tyādinā avisesena paccuppannacakkhādīnampi
tika-abh07t0:1678_5: gahitattā dhammārammaṇampi ārammaṇapurejātaṃ manoviññāṇavīthiyā labbhati. Atthato
tika-abh07t0:1678_6: hetaṃ siddhaṃ, yaṃ paccuppannadhammārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manodvārikavīthi pavattati,
tika-abh07t0:1679_0: 22. Pakatiyā eva paccayantararahitena attano sabhāveneva upanissayo pakatūpanissayo.
tika-abh07t0:1679_1: Ārammaṇānantarehi asaṃmisso puthageva koci upanissayoti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā pakato
tika-abh07t0:1679_2: upanissayo pakatūpanissayo. Pakatoti cettha pa-kāro upasaggo, so attano phalassa
tika-abh07t0:1679_3: uppādanasamatthabhāvena santāne nipphāditabhāvaṃ, āsevitabhāvañca dīpeti, tasmā attano
tika-abh07t0:1679_4: santāne nipphanno rāgādi, saddhādi, upasevito vā utubhojanādi pakatūpanissayo. Tathā ceva niddisati.
tika-abh07t0:1680_0: 23. Garukatanti garuṃ katvā paccavekkhitaṃ. Tathā hi “dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā
tika-abh07t0:1680_1: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhatī”tyādinā dānasīlauposathakammapubbekatasuciṇṇajhānagotrabhuvodānamaggādīni
tika-abh07t0:1680_2: garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇavasena assa niddeso pavatto.
tika-abh07t0:1681_0: 24. “Purimā purimā kusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena
tika-abh07t0:1681_1: paccayo”tyādinā nayena anantarapaccayena saddhiṃ nānattaṃ akatvā anantarūpanissayassa
tika-abh07t0:1681_2: āgatattā vuttaṃ “anantaraniruddhā”tyādi. Evaṃ santepi attano anantaraṃ anurūpacittuppādavasena
tika-abh07t0:1682: 25. Yathārahaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca rāgādayo…pe… senāsanañcāti yojanā. Rāgādayo hi ajjhattaṃ nipphāditā, puggalādayo bahiddhā sevitā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ācariyena –
tika-abh07t0:1685_0: Atha vā ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca kusalādidhammānanti yathāṭhitavaseneva yojanā attano
tika-abh07t0:1685_1: hi rāgādayo ca attano kusalādidhammānaṃ kalyāṇamittassa saddhādike nissāya kusalaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1686_0: Tattha kāmarāgādayo nissāya kāmabhavādīsu nibbattanatthaṃ, rāgādivūpasamatthañca
tika-abh07t0:1686_2: hontīti yathārahaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ yañhi nissāya yassa yassa sambhavo, taṃ taṃ tassa
tika-abh07t0:1686_3: tassa pakatūpanissayo hoti. Paccayamahāpadeso hesa, yadidaṃ “upanissayapaccayo”ti
tika-abh07t0:1686_4: vuttaṃ. Tathā cāha “bahudhā hoti pakatūpanissayo”ti. Saddhādayoti sīlasutacāgapaññā.
tika-abh07t0:1686_5: Attano saddhādikañhi upanissāya attano dānasīlādayo, tathā kalyāṇamittānaṃ saddhādayo
tika-abh07t0:1686_6: upanissāya paresañca dānasīlādayo hontīti pākaṭametaṃ. Sukhaṃ dukkhanti kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1686_7: dukkhaṃ. Puggaloti kalyāṇamittādipuggalo. Bhojananti sappāyādibhojanaṃ, utupi tādisova.
tika-abh07t0:1687_0: 27. “Adhipati…pe… paccayā hontī”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthāretuṃ “tattha garukatamārammaṇa”ntyādi
tika-abh07t0:1687_1: vuttaṃ. Garukatamārammaṇanti paccavekkhaṇaassādādinā garukataṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Tañhi jhānamaggaphalavipassanānibbānādibhedaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1687_4: ayametesaṃ viseso. Sahajātā…pe… nāmarūpānanti chandacittavīriyavīmaṃsānaṃ, vasena
tika-abh07t0:1687_5: catubbidhopi sahajātādhipati yathārahaṃ sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ pavattiyaṃyeva sahajātādhipativasena paccayo.
tika-abh07t0:1688: 28. Rūpadhammassa arūpadhammaṃ pati sahajātapaccayatā paṭisandhiyaṃ vatthuvasena vuttāti āha “vatthuvipākā aññamañña”nti –
tika-abh07t0:1689_0: 30. Yasmā pana aññamaññupatthambhanavaseneva aññamaññapaccayatā, na sahajātamattatoti
tika-abh07t0:1689_1: pavattiyaṃ rūpaṃ nāmānaṃ aññamaññapaccayo na hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “cittacetasikā dhammā
tika-abh07t0:1689_2: aññamañña”nti. Tathā upādārūpāni ca bhūtarūpānaṃ aññamaññapaccayā na hontīti vuttaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1690_0: 31. Nanu ca “arūpino āhārā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpāna”nti vuttaṃ, evañca sati asaññīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1690_1: sahajātāhārassa asambhavato “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti kathamidaṃ nīyatīti? Vuccate
tika-abh07t0:1690_2: – manosañcetanāhāravasappavattassa kammassa, taṃsahagatānampi vā sesāhārānaṃ kammūpanissayapaccayehi
tika-abh07t0:1690_3: paccayattapariyāyaṃ gahetvā sabbasattānaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikatā vuttā, na āhārapaccayabhāvatoti.
tika-abh07t0:1691_0: 32. “Pañca pasādā”tyādīsu nanu itthindriyapurisindriyā na gahitāti? Saccaṃ na gahitā.
tika-abh07t0:1691_1: Yadipi tesaṃ liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā atthi, sā pana na paccayabhāvato. Yathā hi
tika-abh07t0:1691_2: jīvitāhārā yesaṃ paccayā honti, tesaṃ anupālakā upatthambhakā atthi, avigatapaccayabhūtā
tika-abh07t0:1691_3: ca honti, na evaṃ itthipurisabhāvā liṅgādīnaṃ kenaci upakārena upakārā honti. Kevalaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1691_4: pana yathāsakeheva kammādipaccayehi pavattamānaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ yathā itthādiggahaṇassa
tika-abh07t0:1691_5: paccayabhāvo hoti, tato aññenākārena taṃ-sahitasantāne appavattito liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā,
tika-abh07t0:1691_6: indriyatā ca nesaṃ vuccati, tasmā na tesaṃ indriyapaccayabhāvo vutto.
tika-abh07t0:1692_0: 33. Yesaṃ nāmānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ abbhantarato nikkhamantānaṃ viya pavattānaṃ, yesañca
tika-abh07t0:1692_1: rūpānaṃ nāmasannissayeneva uppajjamānānaṃ sampayogāsaṅkā hoti, tesameva vippayuttapaccayatā.
tika-abh07t0:1692_2: Rūpānaṃ pana rūpehi sāsaṅkā natthi. Vatthusannissayeneva jāyantānaṃ visayabhāvamattaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1692_3: ārammaṇanti tenāpi tesaṃ sampayogāsaṅkā natthīti yesaṃ sampayogāsaṅkā atthi, tesameva
tika-abh07t0:1693_0: 34. Sabbathā sabbākārena yathārahaṃ nāmavasena vuttaṃ tividhaṃ sahajātaṃ, duvidhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1693_1: purejātaṃ, ekavidhaṃ pacchājātañca paccayajātaṃ, āhāresu kabaḷīkāro āhāro, rūpajīvitindriyanti
tika-abh07t0:1693_2: ayaṃ pañcavidhopi atthipaccayo, avigatapaccayo ca hoti. Paccuppannasabhāvena atthibhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1693_3: tādisasseva dhammassa upatthambhakattā atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārakānameva atthibhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1693_4: upakārakatā atthipaccayabhāvoti natthi nibbānassa sabbadā bhāvino atthipaccayatā,
tika-abh07t0:1693_5: avigatapaccayatā ca. Uppādādiyuttānaṃ vā natthibhāvopakārakatāviruddho, vigatabhāvopakārakatāviruddho
tika-abh07t0:1693_6: ca upakārakabhāvo atthipaccayatādikāti na tassa tappaccayattappasaṅgo. Rūpajīvitindriyañcettha
tika-abh07t0:1693_7: ojā viya ṭhitikkhaṇeva upakārakattā sahajātapaccayesu na gayhatīti visuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1694_0: 35. Idāni sabbepi paccayā saṅkhepatopi catudhāyevāti dassetuṃ “ārammaṇū…pe… gacchantī”ti
tika-abh07t0:1694_1: vuttaṃ. Na hi so koci paccayo atthi, yo cittacetasikānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvaṃ na gaccheyya,
tika-abh07t0:1694_2: sakasakapaccayuppannassa ca upanissayabhāvaṃ na gacchati, kammahetukattā ca lokappavattiyā
tika-abh07t0:1694_3: phalahetūpacāravasena sabbepi kammasabhāvaṃ nātivattanti, te ca paramatthato lokasammutivasena
tika-abh07t0:1694_4: ca vijjamānāyevāti sabbepi catūsu samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t0:1695_0: 36. Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ tattha tattha “sahajātarūpa”nti, taṃ sabbaṃ na avisesato daṭṭhabbanti
tika-abh07t0:1695_3: sabbatthāpi pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ, paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpasaṅkhātakammajarūpānañca
tika-abh07t0:1695_4: vasena duvidhaṃ hoti. Kammassa katattā nibbattamānāni rūpāni kaṭattārūpāni.
tika-abh07t0:1696_0: 37. Iti evaṃ vuttanayena sambhavā yathāsambhavaṃ tekālikā anantarasamanantaraāsevananatthivigatavasena
tika-abh07t0:1696_1: pañcannaṃ atītakālikānaṃ, kammapaccayassa atītavattamānavasena dvikālikassa, ārammaṇaadhipatiupanissayapaccayānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1696_2: tikālikānaṃ, itaresaṃ pannarasannaṃ paccuppannakālikānañca vasena kālattayavanto,
tika-abh07t0:1696_3: nibbānapaññattivasena kālavimuttā ca, cakkhādirāgādisaddhādivasena ajjhattikā ca,
tika-abh07t0:1696_4: puggalautubhojanādivasena tato bahiddhā ca, paccayuppannabhāvena saṅkhatā ca, kathā
tika-abh07t0:1696_5: tappaṭipakkhabhāvena asaṅkhatā ca dhammā paññattināmarūpānaṃ vasena saṅkhepato tividhā
tika-abh07t0:1696_6: ṭhitā sabbathā paṭṭhāne anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne pakaraṇe catuvīsatisaṅkhātā paccayā nāmāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1700_1: tena tena pakārena ñāpetabbattā, iminā rūpādidhammānaṃ samūhasantānādiavatthāvisesādibhedā
tika-abh07t0:1700_2: sammutisaccabhūtā upādāpaññattisaṅkhātā atthapaññatti vuttā. Sā hi nāmapaññattiyā
tika-abh07t0:1700_3: paññāpīyati. Paññāpanatoti pakārehi atthapaññattiyā ñāpanato. Iminā hi paññāpetīti
tika-abh07t0:1701_1: patthaṭasaṅgahatādiākārena pariṇāmākāraṃ pariṇatabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ākāraṃ upādāya nissayaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1701_2: katvā. Tathā tathāti bhūmādivasena. Bhūmipabbatādikāti bhūmipabbatarukkhādikā santānapaññatti.
tika-abh07t0:1701_7: kālapaññatti, māsotuvesākhamāsādikā taṃtaṃnāmavisiṭṭhā māsādipaññatti ca. Asamphuṭṭhākāranti
tika-abh07t0:1701_8: taṃtaṃrūpakalāpehi asamphuṭṭhaṃ susirādiākāraṃ. Kūpaguhādikā ti kūpaguhachiddādikā
tika-abh07t0:1701_11: yogīnaṃ upaṭṭhitā uggahapaṭibhāgādibhedā nimittapaññatti. Evamādippabhedāti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsanirodhakasiṇādibhedā
tika-abh07t0:1702_0: 41. Nāmanāmakammādināmenāti nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpoti
tika-abh07t0:1702_1: imehi chahi nāmehi. Tattha atthesu namatīti nāmaṃ. Taṃ anvattharuḷhīvasena duvidhaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1702_2: sāmaññaguṇakiriyāyadicchāvasena catubbidhaṃ. Nāmameva nāmakammaṃ. Tathā nāmadheyyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1702_3: Akkharadvārena atthaṃ nīharitvā utti kathanaṃ nirutti, atthaṃ byañjayatīti byañjanaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1702_4: Abhilapatīti abhilāpo, saddagataakkharasannivesakkamo. Sā panāyaṃ nāmapaññatti vijjamānaavijjamānatadubhayasaṃyogavasena
tika-abh07t0:1702_5: chabbidhā hotīti dassetuṃ “vijjamānapaññattī”tyādi vuttaṃ, etāya paññāpentīti “rūpavedanā”tyādinā pakāsenti.
tika-abh07t0:1703_0: 42. Ubhinnanti vijjamānāvijjamānānaṃ dvinnaṃ. Pañcābhiññā, āsavakkhayañāṇanti cha
tika-abh07t0:1703_1: abhiññā assāti chaḷabhiñño. Ettha ca abhiññānaṃ vijjamānattā, tappaṭilābhino puggalassa
tika-abh07t0:1703_2: avijjamānattā ca ayaṃ vijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti nāma. Tathā itthiyā avijjamānattā,
tika-abh07t0:1703_3: saddassa ca vijjamānattā itthisaddoti avijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti. Pasādacakkhuno,
tika-abh07t0:1703_4: tannissitaviññāṇassa ca vijjamānattā cakkhuviññāṇanti vijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti.
tika-abh07t0:1703_5: Rañño ca puttassa ca sammutisaccabhūtattā rājaputtoti avijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti.
tika-abh07t0:1704_1: anussaraṇena ārammaṇakaraṇena pavattāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā pavattito anantaraṃ uppannassa
tika-abh07t0:1704_3: atthassa nāma”nti pubbeyeva gahitasaṅketopanissayassa gocarā ārammaṇabhūtā tato nāmaggahaṇato
tika-abh07t0:1704_4: paraṃ yassā sammutiparamatthavisayāya nāmapaññattiyā anusārena anugamanena atthā
tika-abh07t0:1704_6: lokasaṅketena nimmitā lokavohārena siddhā, manodvāraggahitā akkharāvalibhūtā paññatti
tika-abh07t0:1705_0: Ettha ca sotaviññāṇavīthiyā anantarabhāviniṃ manodvārikavīthimpi sotaviññāṇavīthiggahaṇeneva
tika-abh07t0:1705_1: saṅgahetvā “sotaviññāṇavīthiyā”ti vuttaṃ. Ghaṭādisaddañhi suṇantassa ekamekaṃ saddaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1705_2: ārabbha paccuppannātītārammaṇavasena dve dve javanavārā, buddhiyā gahitanāmapaṇṇattibhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1705_3: akkharāvalimārabbha ekoti evaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā anantarāya atītasaddārammaṇāya
tika-abh07t0:1705_4: javanavīthiyā anantaraṃ nāmapaññattiyā gahaṇaṃ, tato paraṃ atthāvabodhoti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1710_0: 1. Ito paccayaniddesato paraṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ samanaṭṭhena samathasaṅkhātānaṃ, aniccādivividhākārato
tika-abh07t0:1710_1: dassanaṭṭhena vipassanāsaṅkhātānañca dvinnaṃ bhāvanānaṃ duvidhampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ duvidhabhāvanākammassa
tika-abh07t0:1710_3: kammaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ bhāvanāvīthiñca yathākkamaṃ samathavipassanānukkamena pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1713: 3. Rāgo va caritā pakatīti rāgacaritā. Evaṃ dosacaritādayopi. Caritasaṅgahoti mūlacaritavasena puggalasaṅgaho, saṃsaggavasena pana tesaṭṭhi caritā honti. Vuttañhi –
tika-abh07t0:1716_0: Ettha hi rāgacaritā dosacaritā mohacaritā rāgadosacaritā rāgamohacaritā dosamohacaritā
tika-abh07t0:1716_1: rāgadosamohacaritāti evaṃ rāgādike tike sattakamekaṃ. Tathā saddhācaritā buddhicaritā
tika-abh07t0:1716_3: saddhādikepi tike ekanti evaṃ dve tike amissetvā cuddasa caritā honti. Rāgāditike
tika-abh07t0:1716_4: pana ekadvitikamūlavasena saddhāditikena saha yojite rāgasaddhācaritā rāgabuddhicaritā
tika-abh07t0:1716_8: mohamūlanayepi ekanti evaṃ ekamūlanaye sattakattayaṃ hoti. Yathā cettha, evaṃ dvimūlakanayepi
tika-abh07t0:1716_10: Timūlakanaye pana “rāgadosamohasaddhācaritā”tyādinā ekaṃ sattakanti evaṃ missato
tika-abh07t0:1716_11: sattasattakavasena ekūnapaññāsa caritā honti. Iti imā ekūnapaññāsa, purimā ca cuddasāti
tika-abh07t0:1716_12: tesaṭṭhi caritā daṭṭhabbā. Keci pana diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ “catusaṭṭhī”ti vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh07t0:1719_0: 4. Bhāvanāya paṭisaṅkhārakammabhūtā, ādikammabhūtā vā pubbabhāgabhāvanā parikammabhāvanā
tika-abh07t0:1719_1: nāma. Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya gotrabhūpariyosānā kāmāvacarabhāvanā upacārabhāvanā
tika-abh07t0:1719_2: nāma. Appanāya samīpacārittā gāmūpacārādayo viya. Mahaggatabhāvappattā appanābhāvanā
tika-abh07t0:1719_3: nāma appanāsaṅkhātavitakkapamukhattā. Sampayuttadhammehi ārammaṇe appento viya pavattatīti
tika-abh07t0:1719_4: vitakko appanā. Tathā hi so “appanā byappanā”ti niddiṭṭho. Tappamukhatāvasena pana
tika-abh07t0:1722_0: 5. Parikammassa nimittaṃ ārammaṇattāti parikammanimittaṃ, kasiṇamaṇḍalādi. Tadeva
tika-abh07t0:1722_1: cakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ viya manasā uggahetabbaṃ nimittaṃ, uggaṇhantassa vā nimittanti uggahanimittaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1722_2: Tappaṭibhāgaṃ vaṇṇādikasiṇadosarahitaṃ nimittaṃ upacārappanānaṃ ārammaṇattāti paṭibhāganimittaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1723_0: 6. Pathavīyeva kasiṇaṃ ekadese aṭṭhatvā anantassa pharitabbatāya sakalaṭṭhenāti pathavīkasiṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1723_2: Tathā āpokasiṇādīsupi. Tattha pathavādīni cattāri bhūtakasiṇāni. Nīlādīni cattāri
tika-abh07t0:1723_3: vaṇṇakasiṇāni, paricchinnākāso ākāsakasiṇaṃ, candādiāloko ālokakasiṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1724_0: 7. Uddhaṃ dhumātaṃ sūnaṃ chavasarīraṃ uddhumātaṃ, tadeva kucchitaṭṭhenauddhumātakaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1724_1: Evaṃ sesesupi. Setarattādinā vimissitaṃ yebhuyyena nīlavaṇṇaṃ chavasarīraṃ vinīlakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1724_2: visesato nīlakanti katvā. Vissavantapubbakaṃ vipubbakaṃ. Majjhe dvidhā chinnaṃ vicchiddakaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1724_3: Soṇasiṅgālādīhi vividhākārena khāyitaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ. Soṇasiṅgālādīhi vividhenākārena
tika-abh07t0:1724_4: khaṇḍitvā tattha tattha khittaṃ vikkhittakaṃ. Kākapadādiākārena satthena hanitvā
tika-abh07t0:1724_5: vividhaṃ khittaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ. Lohitapaggharaṇakaṃ lohitakaṃ. Kimikulapaggharaṇakaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1725_0: 8. Anu anu saraṇaṃ anussati, arahatādibuddhaguṇārammaṇā anussati buddhānussati. Svākkhātatādidhammaguṇārammaṇā
tika-abh07t0:1725_2: Akhaṇḍatādinā suparisuddhassa attano sīlaguṇassa anussaraṇaṃ sīlānussati. Vigatamalamaccheratādivasena
tika-abh07t0:1725_3: attano cāgānussaraṇaṃ cāgānussati. “Yehi saddhādīhi samannāgatā devā devattaṃ gatā,
tika-abh07t0:1725_4: tādisā guṇā mayi santī”ti evaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇānussaraṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1725_7: gatā pavattā sati kāyagatāsati. Ānañca apānañca ānāpānaṃ, assāsapassāsā, tadārammaṇā sati ānāpānassati.
tika-abh07t0:1726_0: 9. Mijjati siniyhatīti mettā, mittesu bhavāti vā mettā, sā sattānaṃ hitasukhūpasaṃharaṇalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh07t0:1727: 10. Gamanapariyesanaparibhogādipaccavekkhaṇavasena kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭikūlanti pavattā saññā āhāre paṭikūlasaññā.
tika-abh07t0:1728: 11. Pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ salakkhaṇato kesādisasambhārādito ca vavatthānaṃ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1732_0: 13. Idāni tassa tassa puggalassa caritānukūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “caritāsu panā”tyādimāha.
tika-abh07t0:1732_1: Rāgo va caritaṃ pakati etassāti rāgacarito, rāgabahulo puggalo, rāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato
tika-abh07t0:1732_2: asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ tassa sappāyaṃ. Ānāpānaṃ mohacaritassa, vitakkacaritassa ca sappāyaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1732_3: buddhivisayabhāvena mohappaṭipakkhattā, vitakkasandhāvanassa nivārakattā ca. Cha
tika-abh07t0:1733: 17. Maraṇaupasamasaññāvavatthānāni buddhicaritassa sappāyāni gambhīrabhāvato buddhiyā eva visayattā.
tika-abh07t0:1734_1: Tatthāpīti tesu dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu. Puthulaṃ mohacaritassa sappāyaṃ sambādhe okāse
tika-abh07t0:1734_2: cittassa bhiyyosomattāya sammuyhanato. Khuddakaṃ vitakkacaritassa sappāyaṃ mahantārammaṇassa
tika-abh07t0:1734_3: vitakkasandhāvanapaccayattā. Ujuvipaccanīkato ceva atisappāyatāya cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Rāgādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1734_4: pana avikkhambhikā, saddhādīnaṃ vā anupakārikā kasiṇādibhāvanā nāma natthi.
tika-abh07t0:1737_0: 19. Sabbatthāpīti cattālīsakammaṭṭhānesupi natthi appanā, buddhaguṇādīnaṃ paramatthabhāvato,
tika-abh07t0:1737_1: anekavidhattā, ekassapi gambhīrabhāvato ca. Buddhānussatiādīsu dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu
tika-abh07t0:1737_2: appanāvasena samādhissa patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā appanābhāvaṃ appatvā samādhi upacārabhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1737_3: patiṭṭhāti. Lokuttarasamādhi, pana dutiyacatutthāruppasamādhi ca sabhāvadhammepi
tika-abh07t0:1737_4: bhāvanāvisesavasena appanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Visuddhibhāvanānukkamavasena hi lokuttaro appanaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1737_5: pāpuṇāti. Ārammaṇasamatikkamabhāvanāvasena āruppasamādhi. Appanāppattasseva hi catutthajjhānasamādhino
tika-abh07t0:1738: 21. Pañcapi jhānāni etesamatthi, tattha niyuttānīti vā pañcakajjhānikāni.
tika-abh07t0:1739_0: 22. Asubhabhāvanāya paṭikūlārammaṇattā caṇḍasotāya nadiyā arittabalena nāvā viya
tika-abh07t0:1739_1: vitakkabaleneva tattha cittaṃ pavattatīti asubhakammaṭṭhāne avitakkajjhānāsambhavato
tika-abh07t0:1740: 23. Mettākaruṇāmuditānaṃ domanassasahagatabyāpādavihiṃsānabhiratīnaṃ pahāyakattā domanassappaṭipakkhena somanasseneva sahagatatā yuttāti “mettādayo tayo catukkajjhānikā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh07t0:1741_0: 24. “Sabbe sattā sukhitā hontu, dukkhā muccantu, laddhasukhasampattito mā vigacchantū”ti
tika-abh07t0:1744: 26. Yathārahanti taṃtaṃārammaṇānurūpato. Kassaci ārammaṇassa aparibyattatāya “pariyāyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1746_0: 28. Pathavīmaṇḍalādīsu nimittaṃ uggaṇhantassāti ādimhi tāva catupārisuddhisīlaṃ visodhetvā
tika-abh07t0:1746_2: upasaṅkamitvā attano cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ ananurūpavihāraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1746_4: katvā kasiṇamaṇḍalādīni purato katvā ānāpānakoṭṭhāsādīsu cittaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīditvā
tika-abh07t0:1746_6: nimittaṃ uggaṇhantassa. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana bhāvanā visuddhimaggato
tika-abh07t0:1746_7: gahetabbā. Duvidhampi hi bhāvanāvidhānaṃ idha ācariyena atisaṅkhepato vuttaṃ, tadatthadassanatthañca
tika-abh07t0:1746_8: vitthāranaye āhariyamāne atippapañco siyāti mayampi taṃ na vitthāressāma. Yadā pana
tika-abh07t0:1746_9: taṃ nimittaṃ cittena samuggahitanti evaṃ pavattānupubbabhāvanāvasena yadā taṃ parikammanimittaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1746_10: cittena sammā uggahitaṃ hoti. Manodvārassa āpāthamāgatanti cakkhuṃ nimmīletvā, aññattha
tika-abh07t0:1746_11: gantvā vā manasi karontassa kasiṇamaṇḍalasadisameva hutvā manodvārikajavanānaṃ āpāthaṃ āgataṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1748_0: 30. Cittasamādhānavasena puggalopi samāhitoyevāti vuttaṃ “tathā samāhitassā”ti. Tappaṭibhāganti
tika-abh07t0:1748_1: uggahanimittasadisaṃ, tatoyeva hi taṃ “paṭibhāganimitta”nti vuccati. Taṃ pana uggahanimittato
tika-abh07t0:1748_2: atiparisuddhaṃ hoti. Vatthudhammavimuccitanti paramatthadhammato vimuttaṃ, vatthudhammato
tika-abh07t0:1748_3: vā kasiṇamaṇḍalagatakasiṇadosato vinimuttaṃ. Bhāvanāya nibbattattā bhāvanāmayaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1750_1: paraṃ agantvā aparāparaṃ jhānaṅgāvajjanasamatthatā āvajjanavasitā nāma. Samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1750_2: katipayabhavaṅgato paraṃ agantvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ samāpajjituṃ samatthatā samāpajjanavasitā
tika-abh07t0:1750_3: nāma. Setu viya sīghasotāya nadiyā oghaṃ bhavaṅgavegaṃ upacchinditvā yathāparicchinnakālaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1750_4: jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā bhavaṅgapātato rakkhaṇayogyatā adhiṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1750_5: Yathā paricchinnakālaṃ anatikkamitvā jhānato vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1750_6: Atha vā yathāparicchinnakālato uddhaṃ gantuṃ adatvā ṭhapanasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasitā
tika-abh07t0:1750_7: nāma. Yathāparicchinnakālato anto avuṭṭhahitvā yathākālavaseneva vuṭṭhānasamatthatā
tika-abh07t0:1750_8: vuṭṭhānavasitā nāmāti alamatippapañcena. Paccavekkhaṇavasitā pana āvajjanavasitāya
tika-abh07t0:1750_9: eva siddhā. Āvajjanānantarajavanāneva hi paccavekkhaṇajavanāni nāma. Vitakkādioḷārikaṅgaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1750_10: pahānāyāti dutiyajjhānādīhi vitakkādioḷārikaṅgānaṃ jhānakkhaṇe anuppādāya. Padahatoti
tika-abh07t0:1750_11: parikammaṃ karontassa. Tassa pana upacārabhāvanā nipphannā nāma hoti vitakkādīsu
tika-abh07t0:1751_2: parikammaṃ karontassāti “anantaṃ ākāsaṃ, anantaṃ ākāsa”nti ākāsaṃ ārabbha parikammaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1751_3: karontassa, na pana kevalaṃ “anantaṃ ananta”nti. Evaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanepi. “Ananta”nti
tika-abh07t0:1751_4: avatvāpi “ākāso ākāso, viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa”nti manasi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1752: 39. “Santametaṃ, paṇītameta”nti parikammaṃ karontassāti abhāvamattārammaṇatāya “etaṃ santaṃ, etaṃ paṇīta”nti bhāventassa.
tika-abh07t0:1753_0: 40. Avasesesu cāti kasiṇādīhi saha appanāvahakammaṭṭhānato avasesesu buddhānussatiādīsu
tika-abh07t0:1753_1: aṭṭhasu, saññāvavatthānesu cāti dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu. Parikammaṃ katvāti “so bhagavā
tika-abh07t0:1753_2: itipi arahaṃ, itipi sammāsambuddho”tyādinā vuttavidhānena parikammaṃ katvā. Sādhukamuggahiteti
tika-abh07t0:1753_4: parikammabhāvanā samāhitā nipphajjati. Upacāro ca sampajjatīti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhento
tika-abh07t0:1754_0: 41. Abhiññāvasena pavattamānanti abhivisesato jānanaṭṭhena abhiññāsaṅkhātaṃ iddhividhādipañcalokiyābhiññāvasena
tika-abh07t0:1754_2: cittaṃ paridametvā abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā upekkhekaggatāyogato anurūpattā ca rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānameva
tika-abh07t0:1754_3: abhiññānaṃ pādakaṃ patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ pathavādikasiṇārammaṇaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ, taṃ samāpajjitvā
tika-abh07t0:1754_4: tato vuṭṭhāya. Adhiṭṭheyyādikamāvajjetvāti iddhividhañāṇassa parikammakāle adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1754_5: vikubbanīyaṃ satādikaṃ komārarūpādikaṃ, dibbasotassa parikammakāle thūlasukhumabhedaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1754_6: saddaṃ, cetopariyañāṇassa parikammakāle parassa hadayaṅgatavaṇṇadassanena sarāgādibhedaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1754_8: pubbe nivutthakkhandhaṃ, dibbacakkhussa parikammasamaye obhāsapharitaṭṭhānagataṃ rūpaṃ vā āvajjetvā.
tika-abh07t0:1755_0: Parikammaṃ karontassāti “sataṃ homi, sahassaṃ homī”tyādinā parikammaṃ karontassa.
tika-abh07t0:1755_2: ārammaṇesu. Ettha hi iddhividhañāṇassa tāva pādakajjhānaṃ, kāyo, rūpādiadhiṭṭhāne
tika-abh07t0:1755_3: rūpādīni cāti cha ārammaṇāni. Tattha pādakajjhānaṃ atītameva, kāyo paccuppanno, itaraṃ
tika-abh07t0:1755_4: paccuppannamanāgataṃ vā. Dibbasotassa pana saddoyeva, so ca kho paccuppanno. Paracittavijānanāya
tika-abh07t0:1755_5: pana atīte sattadivasesu, anāgate sattadivasesu ca pavattaṃ parittādīsu yaṃ kiñci
tika-abh07t0:1756_0: Saṅgahakārā pana “cattāropi khandhā”ti vadanti, kathaṃ panassā paccuppannacittārammaṇatā,
tika-abh07t0:1756_1: nanu ca āvajjanāya gahitameva iddhicittassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, āvajjanāya ca paccuppannacittamārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1756_2: katvā nirujjhamānāya taṃsamakālameva parassa cittampi nirujjhatīti āvajjanajavanānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1756_3: kālavasena ekārammaṇatā na siyā, maggaphalavīthito aññattha āvajjanajavanānaṃ kathañca
tika-abh07t0:1756_4: nānārammaṇatā na adhippetāti? Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva santatiaddhāpaccuppannārammaṇatā
tika-abh07t0:1756_5: yojitā. Ānandācariyo pana bhaṇati “pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paccuppannādivibhāgaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1756_6: akatvā kevalaṃ ‘imassa cittaṃ jānāmi’cceva parikammaṃ katvā punapi pādakajjhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1756_7: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya aviseseneva cittaṃ āvajjetvā tiṇṇaṃ, catunnaṃ vā parikammānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1756_8: anantaraṃ cetopariyañāṇena parassa cittaṃ paṭivijjhati rūpaṃ viya dibbacakkhunā.
tika-abh07t0:1756_9: Pacchā kāmāvacaracittena sarāgādivavatthānampi karoti nīlādivavatthānaṃ viya. Tāni
tika-abh07t0:1756_10: ca sabbāni abhimukhībhūtacittārammaṇāneva, aniṭṭhe ca ṭhāne nānārammaṇatādoso natthi
tika-abh07t0:1756_12: ca nāmagottāni, nibbānañca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, dibbacakkhussa pana rūpameva paccuppannanti
tika-abh07t0:1757_0: 42. Idāni ārammaṇānaṃ bhedena abhiññābhedaṃ dassetuṃ “iddhividhā”tyādimāha. Adhiṭṭhānādi
tika-abh07t0:1757_1: iddhippabhedo etissāti iddhividhā. Dibbānaṃ sotasadisatāya, dibbavihārasannissitatāya
tika-abh07t0:1757_2: ca dibbañca taṃ sotañcāti dibbasotaṃ. Paresaṃ cittaṃ viññāyati etāyāti paracittavijānanā.
tika-abh07t0:1757_3: Attano santāne nivutthavasena ceva gocaranivāsavasena ca pubbe atītabhavesu khandhādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1757_4: anussaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussati. Vuttanayena dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu.
tika-abh07t0:1757_6: dibbacakkhuvaseneva ijjhanti. Na hi tesaṃ visuṃ parikammaṃ atthi. Tattha anāgataṃsañāṇassa
tika-abh07t0:1757_7: tāva anāgate sattadivasato paraṃ pavattanakaṃ cittacetasikaṃ dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-abh07t0:1757_8: pavattanakañca yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Tañhi savisaye sabbaññutaññāṇagatikanti.
tika-abh07t0:1757_9: Yathā kammūpagañāṇassa pana kusalākusalasaṅkhātā cetanā, cattāropi vā khandhā ārammaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1763_0: 43. Aniccādivasena vividhākārena passatīti vipassanā, aniccānupassanādikā bhāvanāpaññā.
tika-abh07t0:1763_1: Tassā kammaṭṭhānaṃ, sāyeva vā kammaṭṭhānanti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Tasmiṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhāne
tika-abh07t0:1764_0: 44. Aniccatāyeva lakkhaṇaṃ lakkhitabbaṃ, lakkhīyati anenāti vā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ. Udayavayapaṭipīḷanasaṅkhātadukkhabhāvo
tika-abh07t0:1764_1: va lakkhaṇanti dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ. Paraparikappitassa attano abhāvo anattatā, tadeva
tika-abh07t0:1765: 45. Tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ anu anu passanā aniccānupassanādikā.
tika-abh07t0:1766_0: 46. Khandhādīnaṃ kalāpato sammasanavasappavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ sammasanañāṇaṃ. Uppādabhaṅgānupassanāvasappavattañāṇaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1766_1: udayabbayañāṇaṃ. Udayaṃ muccitvā vaye pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ. Saṅkhārānaṃ bhayato
tika-abh07t0:1766_2: anupassanāvasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ, diṭṭhabhayānaṃ ādīnavato pekkhaṇavasena
tika-abh07t0:1766_3: pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ, diṭṭhādīnavesu nibbindanavasappavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1766_4: Nibbinditvā saṅkhārehi muccitukamyatāvasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ. Muccanassa
tika-abh07t0:1766_5: upāyasampaṭipādanatthaṃ puna saṅkhārānaṃ pariggahavasappavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1766_6: Paṭisaṅkhātadhammesu bhayanandīvivajjanavasena ajjhupekkhitvā pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1766_7: Purimānaṃ navannaṃ kiccanipphattiyā, upari ca sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1767: 47. Attasuññatāya suññato. Saṃyojanādīhi vimuccanaṭṭhena vimokkho. Niccanimittādino abhāvato animitto. Paṇihitassa taṇhāpaṇidhissa abhāvato appaṇihito.
tika-abh07t0:1768_0: 49. Yo naṃ pāti, taṃ mokkheti apāyādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ, tadeva kāyaduccaritādīhi
tika-abh07t0:1768_1: saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, samādhānopadhāraṇaṭṭhena sīlañcāti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Manacchaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1768_2: indriyānaṃ rūpādīsu saṃvaraṇavasena pavattaṃ sīlaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Micchājīva
tika-abh07t0:1768_3: vivajjanena ājīvassa parisuddhivasappavattaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ. Paccaye sannissitaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1769: 50. Cittavisuddhi nāma cittassa vinīvaraṇabhāvāpādanavasena visodhanato, cittasīsena niddiṭṭhattā, visuddhattā cāti vā katvā.
tika-abh07t0:1770_0: 51. “Dhammānaṃ sāmaññasabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ, kiccasampattiyo raso, upaṭṭhānākāro, phalañca
tika-abh07t0:1770_1: paccupaṭṭhāna”nti evaṃ vuttānaṃ lakkhaṇādīnaṃ “phusanalakkhaṇo phasso, kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā
tika-abh07t0:1770_3: saṅkhepato ca pariggaho paccattalakkhaṇādivasena paricchijja gahaṇaṃ dukkhasaccavavatthānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1770_4: diṭṭhivisuddhi nāma “nāmarūpato attā natthī”ti dassanato diṭṭhi ca attadiṭṭhimalavisodhanato
tika-abh07t0:1771_0: 52. Paccayapariggahoti nāmañca rūpañca paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva avijjātaṇhāupādānakammahetuvasena
tika-abh07t0:1771_2: visesato ca yonisomanasikārādicatucakkasampattiyā kusalaṃ, tabbipariyāyena akusalaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1771_3: kusalākusalavasena vipāko bhavaṅgādivasena āvajjanaṃ, khīṇāsavasantānavasena kiriyajavanaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1771_4: āvajjanañca uppajjatīti evaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena tīsu addhāsu nāmarūpappavattiyā
tika-abh07t0:1771_6: kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntyādikāya soḷasavidhāya,
tika-abh07t0:1771_7: “sattharikaṅkhatī”tyādikāya aṭṭhavidhāya ca kaṅkhāya vitaraṇato atikkamanato kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
tika-abh07t0:1772_1: paccayavavatthānavasena ca pariggahitesu lokuttaravajjesu tibhūmipariyāpannesu nāmarūpesu
tika-abh07t0:1772_3: āgataṃ khandhādinayaṃ ārabbha kalāpavasena piṇḍavasena saṅkhipitvā yaṃ atīte jātaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1772_4: rūpaṃ, taṃ atīteva niruddhaṃ. Yaṃ anāgate bhāvi rūpaṃ, tampi tattheva nirujjhissati.
tika-abh07t0:1772_5: Yaṃ paccuppannaṃ, taṃ anāgataṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati, tathā ajjhattabahiddhasukhumaoḷārikahīnapaṇītarūpādayo.
tika-abh07t0:1772_6: Tasmā “aniccaṃ attādivasena na iccaṃ anupagantabbaṃ khayaṭṭhena khayagamanato, dukkhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1772_7: bhayaṭṭhena bhayakarattā, anattā asārakaṭṭhena attasārādiabhāvenā”ti ca “cakkhuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1772_8: aniccaṃ…pe… mano. Rūpaṃ…pe… dhammā. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1772_9: anattā”tyādinā atītādiaddhāvasena, atītādisantānavasena, atītādikhaṇavasena ca sammasanañāṇena
tika-abh07t0:1773_0: Sammasanañāṇe pana uppanne puna tesveva saṅkhāresu “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo,
tika-abh07t0:1773_1: taṇhākammaāhārasamudayā rūpasamudayo, tathā avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho, taṇhākammaāhāranirodhā
tika-abh07t0:1773_2: rūpanirodho”ti evaṃ rūpakkhandhe vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhesupi āhāraṃ apanetvā
tika-abh07t0:1773_3: “phassasamudayā phassanirodhā”ti ca evaṃ phassaṃ pakkhipitvā, viññāṇakkhandhe “nāmarūpasamudayā
tika-abh07t0:1773_5: ca, paccaye anāmasitvā paccuppannakkhandhesu nibbattilakkhaṇamattassa, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇamattassa
tika-abh07t0:1773_6: ca dassanena khaṇavasena cāti ekekasmiṃ khandhe paccayavasena catudhā, khaṇavasena
tika-abh07t0:1773_7: ekadhā cāti pañcadhā udayaṃ, pañcadhā vayanti dasadasaudayabbayadassanavasena samapaññāsākārehi
tika-abh07t0:1773_8: udayabbayañāṇena udayabbayaṃ samanupassantassa āraddhavipassakassa yogino vipassanācittasamuṭṭhāno
tika-abh07t0:1773_10: pīti, tathā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā kāyacittavasena duvidhā passaddhi, balavasaddhindriyasaṅkhāto
tika-abh07t0:1773_14: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgabhūtā tatramajjhattupekkhā, manodvāre āvajjhanupekkhā cāti duvidhāpi
tika-abh07t0:1773_15: upekkhā, obhāsādīsu uppannesu “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo”tyādinā
tika-abh07t0:1773_16: nayena tattha ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumataṇhā rūpanikanticāti obhāsādīsu dasasu vipassanupakkilesesu
tika-abh07t0:1773_17: uppannesu “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā obhāsādayo uppannapubbā addhā maggappattosmi,
tika-abh07t0:1773_18: phalappattosmī”ti aggahetvā “ime obhāsādayo taṇhādiṭṭhimānavatthutāya na maggo, atha
tika-abh07t0:1773_19: kho vipassanupakkilesā eva, tabbinimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggo”ti
tika-abh07t0:1773_20: evaṃ maggāmaggalakkhaṇassa vavatthānaṃ nicchayanaṃ maggāmaggassa jānanato, dassanato,
tika-abh07t0:1773_21: amagge maggasaññāya visodhanato ca maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1774_0: 54. Yāvānulomāti yāva saccānulomañāṇā. Nava vipassanāñāṇānīti khandhānaṃ udayañca
tika-abh07t0:1774_1: vayañca jānanakaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ, udayaṃ muñcitvā bhaṅgamattānupekkhakaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t0:1774_2: bhaṅgavasena upaṭṭhitānaṃ sīhādīnaṃ viya bhāyitabbākārānupekkhakaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ, tathānupekkhitānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1774_3: ādittagharassa viya ādīnavākārānupekkhakaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ, diṭṭhādīnavesu nibbindanavasena
tika-abh07t0:1774_4: pavattaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ, jālādito macchādikā viya tehi tebhūmakadhammehi muccitukāmatāvasena
tika-abh07t0:1774_6: viya punappunaṃ sammasanavasappattaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ, cattabhariyo puriso
tika-abh07t0:1774_7: viya diṭṭhādīnavesu tesu saṅkhāresu upekkhanākārappavattaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ, aniccādilakkhaṇavipassanatāya
tika-abh07t0:1774_8: heṭṭhā pavattānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vipassanāñāṇānaṃ, uddhaṃ maggakkhaṇe adhigantabbānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1774_9: sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammānañca anulomato maggavīthiyaṃ gotrabhuto pubbe pavattaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1774_10: saccānulomikañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ navamaṃ anulomañāṇanti imāni nava ñāṇāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā
tika-abh07t0:1774_11: paṭipadābhāvato tilakkhaṇajānanaṭṭhena, paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena, paṭipakkhato visuddhattā
tika-abh07t0:1775_0: 55. Vipassanāya paripāko vipassanāparipāko, saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ. Taṃ āgamma paṭicca.
tika-abh07t0:1775_1: Idāni appanā uppajjissatīti “idāni appanāsaṅkhāto lokuttaramaggo uppajjissatī”ti
tika-abh07t0:1775_2: vattabbakkhaṇe. Yaṃ kiñcīti saṅkhārupekkhāya gahitesu tīsu ekaṃ yaṃ kiñci.
tika-abh07t0:1776_0: 56. Vipassanāya matthakappattiyā sikhāppattā. Anulomañāṇasahitatāya sānulomā. Sā
tika-abh07t0:1776_1: eva saṅkhāresu udāsīnattā saṅkhārupekkhā. Yathānurūpaṃ apāyādito, saṅkhāranimittato
tika-abh07t0:1776_2: ca vuṭṭhahanato vuṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ gacchatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī.
tika-abh07t0:1778_0: 58. Parijānantoti “ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito ūnādhika”nti paricchijja jānanto. Sacchikarontoti
tika-abh07t0:1778_1: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paccakkhaṃ karonto. Maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāvasenāti maggasaccasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh07t0:1778_4: bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passatī”tyādi āgamato ca sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1779_0: 59. Dve tīṇi phalacittāni pavattitvāti magguppattiyā anurūpato dve vā tīṇi vā phalacittāni
tika-abh07t0:1779_1: apanītaggimhi ṭhāne uṇhattanibbāpanatthāya ghaṭehi abhisiñcamānamudakaṃ viya samucchinnakilesepi
tika-abh07t0:1779_2: santāne darathapaṭippassambhakāni hutvā pavattitvā, tesaṃ pavattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1780_0: 60. Idāni paccavekkhaṇāya bhūmiṃ dassetuṃ “maggaṃ phalañcā”tyādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “imināva
tika-abh07t0:1780_1: vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti maggaṃ paccavekkhati. Tato “ayaṃ nāma me ānisaṃso laddho”ti
tika-abh07t0:1780_2: tassa phalaṃ, tato “ayaṃ nāma me dhammo ārammaṇato sacchikato”ti nibbānañca paṇḍito
tika-abh07t0:1780_3: paccavekkhati. Tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīne kilese, “ime nāma avasiṭṭhā”ti
tika-abh07t0:1780_4: avasiṭṭhakilese paccavekkhati vā, na vā. Koci sekkho paccavekkhati, koci na paccavekkhati.
tika-abh07t0:1780_5: Tattha kāmacārotyadhippāyo. Tathā hi mahānāmo sakko “ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1780_6: appahīno”ti appahīne kilese pucchi. Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ natthi
tika-abh07t0:1780_7: sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā, tasmā tiṇṇaṃ sekkhānaṃ pannarasa arahato cattārīti ekūnavīsati
tika-abh07t0:1781_0: Chabbisuddhikamenāti sīlacittavisuddhīnaṃ vasena mūlabhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ, diṭṭhivisuddhiādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1781_1: vasena sarīrabhūtānaṃ catunnanti etāsaṃ channaṃ visuddhīnaṃ kamena. Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1781_2: jānanatā, paccakkhakaraṇato, kilesamalehi visuddhattā ca ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1785_0: 61. Tattha tasmiṃ uddese. Saṅkhāresu “yo attābhiniveso kammassa kārako phalassa ca
tika-abh07t0:1785_1: vedako eso me attā”ti evaṃ abhiniveso daḷhaggāho, taṃ muñcantī “anattā”ti pavattā
tika-abh07t0:1785_2: anupassanāva attasuññatākārānupassanato suññatānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ paṭipakkhato
tika-abh07t0:1785_3: vimuttivasena vimokkhasaṅkhātassa lokuttaraṃ maggaphalassa dvāraṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t0:1786_0: 62. Saṅkhāresu “anicca”nti pavattā anupassanā anicce “nicca”nti pavattaṃ saññācittadiṭṭhivipallāsasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1787_0: 63. “Dukkha”nti pavattānupassanā saṅkhāresu “etaṃ mama, etaṃ sukha”ntyādinā nayena
tika-abh07t0:1787_1: pavattaṃ kāmabhavataṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāpaṇidhiṃ taṇhāpatthanaṃ muñcantī dukkhākāradassanena
tika-abh07t0:1788: 64. Tasmāti yasmā etāsaṃ tissannaṃ etāni tīṇi nāmāni, tasmā yadi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā anattato vipassati. Maggo suññato nāma vimokkho hoti āgamanavasena laddhanāmattā.
tika-abh07t0:1789: 66. Vipassanāgamanavasenāti vipassanāsaṅkhātāgamanavasena. Āgacchati etena maggo, phalañcāti vipassanāmaggo idha āgamanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t0:1790_1: yathāladdhamaggassa phalabhūtaṃ attano attano phalaṃ uppajjamānampi maggāgamanavasena
tika-abh07t0:1790_2: alabhitvā vipassanāgamanavaseneva tīṇi nāmāni labhati phalasamāpattikāle tadā maggappavattābhāvena
tika-abh07t0:1790_4: taṇhāpaṇidhirahitattā ca suññataanimittaappaṇihitanāmavantaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattattā
tika-abh07t0:1790_5: tassa vasena. Sarasavasenāti rāgādisuññatattā, rūpanimittādiārammaṇarahitattā, kilesapaṇidhirahitattā
tika-abh07t0:1790_6: attano guṇavasena. Sabbatthāti maggavīthiyaṃ, phalasamāpattivīthiyañca. Sabbesampīti
tika-abh07t0:1793_0: 68. Sattakkhattuṃ sattasu vāresu kāmasugatiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ paramaṃ etassāti
tika-abh07t0:1793_1: sattakkhattuparamo na pana aṭṭhamādikāmabhavagāmītyadhippāyo. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1793_2: “na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti. Rūpārūpasugatibhavaṃ pana sattavārato parampi gacchatīti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t0:1795: 70. Khīṇā cattāro āsavā etassāti khīṇāsavo. Dakkhiṇārahesu aggattā aggadakkhiṇeyyo.
tika-abh07t0:1799_1: diṭṭheva dhamme cittanirodhaṃ patvā viharaṇaṃ. Anāgāmīnañcāti kāmarūpabhavaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1799_2: aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnameva anāgāmīnaṃ, tathā khīṇāsavānañca. Tatthāti nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ.
tika-abh07t0:1799_3: Yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ gantvāti evaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ yuganaddhabhāvāpādanavasena
tika-abh07t0:1799_4: yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, tāva gantvā. Adhiṭṭheyyādikanti kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ṭhapetvā visuṃ
tika-abh07t0:1799_6: puretaraṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ, sattāhabbhantare āyusaṅkhārappavattiolokananti catubbidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā.
tika-abh07t0:1807_0: (Ka) cārittena kulācārena sobhite visālakule udayo nibbatti yassa, tena, kammādivisayāya
tika-abh07t0:1807_1: saddhāya abhivuddho parisuddho ca dānasīlādiguṇānaṃ udayo yassa, tena, nampavhayena
tika-abh07t0:1807_2: nampanāmakena, parānukampaṃ sāsane sukhotaraṇaparipācanalakkhaṇaṃ parānuggahaṃ, paṇidhāya
tika-abh07t0:1807_3: patthetvā yaṃ pakaraṇaṃ patthitaṃ abhiyācitaṃ, taṃ ettāvatā pariniṭṭhitanti yojanā.
tika-abh07t0:1808_0: (Kha) tena pakaraṇappasutena vipulena puññena paññāvadātena ariyamaggapaññāparisuddhena
tika-abh07t0:1808_1: sīlādiguṇena sobhitā. Tatoyeva lajjino bhikkhū, dhaññānaṃ adhivāsabhūtaṃ, uditoditaṃ
tika-abh07t0:1808_2: accantappasiddhaṃ, mūlasomaṃ nāma vihāraṃ, puññavibhavassa udayasaṅkhātāya maṅgalatthāya
tika-abh07t0:1808_3: āyukantaṃ maññantu, tattha nivāsino bhikkhū īdisā hontūtyadhippāyo.
